Walk It Off.embed: {"title":"Walk It Off","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Adept Athletics, Novice Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2013 Extended Action"}],"description":"Remove one Injury from yourself and regain 1\/4th of your maximum Hit Points. This Injury removal doesn\u2019t count against the natural healing limit on Injuries each day.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.63"}}

Inspired Training.embed: {"title":"Inspired Training","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Training][Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Charm, Untrained Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Special"}],"description":"The target becomes Inspired until the end of the effect duration. Inspired Pok\u00e9mon gain a +1 bonus to Evasion and +2 to Save Checks.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.60"}}

Major Gift - Sky Spirit.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Sky Spirit","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"To use Sky Spirit, the current Weather must be Clear as a result of Defog or Air Lock. For the next five rounds, foes within 10 meters of you have their Sky and Levitate Capabilities halved. Allies within 10 meters of you add 10 to their Initiative."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Clear Skies"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.63"}}

Trick Shot.embed: {"title":"Trick Shot","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders][Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Marksman Orders"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"While this Feature is Bound, decrease the Accuracy Roll of the target\u2019s damaging ranged attacks by -2. The Critical Hit range of those attacks is increased by +3. This Feature does not affect Moves without an AC value.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.61"}}

Brutal Training.embed: {"title":"Brutal Training","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Training][Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Intimidate, Untrained Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Special"}],"description":"The target becomes Brutal until the end of the effect duration. Brutal Pok\u00e9mon increase the Critical-Hit and Effect Range of all attacks by +1.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.60"}}

Press.embed: {"title":"Press","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Adept Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your own Pok\u00e9mon."}],"description":"You hit your Pok\u00e9mon, and they lose 1\/6th of their Max Hit Points and are cured of Sleep. Raise any two of their Stats by +1 CS each, and you may add half of your Intimidate Rank to any Skill Checks made this round to make this Pok\u00e9mon obey orders. Using Press on a Pok\u00e9mon may make them dislike you.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.59"}}

Commander's Voice.embed: {"title":"Commander's Voice","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Two Features with the [Orders] tag"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Special","value":"If this is used to use Focused Command and another [Order] that has targets, the second Order applies to both Pok\u00e9mon you are commanding that turn. Commander\u2019s Voice doesn\u2019t allow you to use Focused Command as a Swift Action."}],"description":"You may give two different [Orders] as a single Standard Action, or you may give one set of [Orders] as a Swift Action.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.60"}}

Reckless Advance.embed: {"title":"Reckless Advance","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders][Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ravager Orders"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"While this Feature is Bound, increase the damage rolls of the target\u2019s damaging melee attacks by +8, and these attacks Trip targets on Accuracy Rolls of 18+. When the target of Reckless Advance hits with a damaging melee attack, they become Vulnerable for one full round.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.61"}}

Strike Again!.embed: {"title":"Strike Again!","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ravager Orders"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"The target may immediately take an additional Standard Action to use an At-Will attack.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.61"}}

Agility Training.embed: {"title":"Agility Training","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Training][Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Athletics, Untrained Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Special"}],"description":"The target becomes Agile until the end of the effect duration. Agile Pok\u00e9mon gain a +1 bonus to Movement Capabilities and +4 to Initiative.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.60"}}

Ravager Orders.embed: {"title":"Ravager Orders","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Expert Command or Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Reckless Advance and Strike Again! Orders.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.61"}}

Species Savant.embed: {"title":"Species Savant","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"3 different individual Pok\u00e9mon of the same evolutionary line"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"When you take Species Savant, choose a single Evolutionary Family. Your Pok\u00e9mon of your Chosen Evolutionary Family have each of their Base Stats increased by +1.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.59"}}

Focused Training.embed: {"title":"Focused Training","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Training][Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Special"}],"description":"The target becomes Focused until the end of the effect duration. Focused Pok\u00e9mon gain a +1 bonus to Accuracy Rolls and +2 to Skill Checks.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.60"}}

Marksman Orders.embed: {"title":"Marksman Orders","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Expert Perception or Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Trick Shot and Long Shot Orders.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.61"}}

Type Expertise.embed: {"title":"Type Expertise","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2][+Any]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Level 9, 3 Moves of the Chosen Type in your Move List"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Each Rank, choose a Type of which you know at least 3 Moves. You gain STAB for the chosen Type. STAB is never applied to Struggle Attacks.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.63"}}

Focused Command.embed: {"title":"Focused Command","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Master Command, one of Focus, Guile, Intimidate, or Pok\u00e9mon Education at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Standard Action + Swift Action"}],"description":"You may have a second Pok\u00e9mon take a turn this round, but both Pok\u00e9mon can only take At-Will actions that round. Additionally, both Pok\u00e9mon receive a -5 Penalty on all Damage Rolls. You may pay 1 AP at the beginning of the round to lift the Frequency Restriction OR the Damage Penalty for the remainder of the round, or pay 2 AP to lift both.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.60"}}

Brace for Impact.embed: {"title":"Brace for Impact","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders][Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Guardian Orders"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"While this Feature is Bound, once a round, when the target uses a self-targeting Status Move, they may gain 5 Damage Reduction until the end of their next turn. They may also activate this effect as a Standard Action.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Defender.embed: {"title":"Defender","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Adept Athletics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Using the Intercept Maneuvers requires only a Shift Action Interrupt.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.63"}}

Dive (Feature).embed: {"title":"Dive","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Adept Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Shift Action, Interrupt"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You are targeted by a Ranged 1-Target Attack, or are in a Cone, Burst, Blast, or Line."}],"description":"You may immediately Shift 1 Meter, and then become Tripped. This Feature cannot be used if you are Stuck, Grappled, or otherwise impaired from Shifting. This Feature causes you to dodge Ranged attacks aimed at you, and may let you avoid Cones, Bursts, Blasts, or Lines if the shift removes you from the area of effect.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.63"}}

Sentinel Stance.embed: {"title":"Sentinel Stance","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Guardian Orders"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"Until the end of your next turn, the target may attempt to Intercept attacks for allies as a Shift Action. If they do so, they gain 10 Damage Reduction against the attack. If the target is also under the effect of Brace for Impact, they may gain 5 Damage Reduction from it as if they had used a self-targeting Status Move.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Precision Orders.embed: {"title":"Precision Orders","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Expert Command or Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Pinpoint Strike and Perfect Aim Orders.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Trickster Orders.embed: {"title":"Trickster Orders","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Expert Charm or Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Capricious Whirl and Dazzling Dervish Orders.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Guardian Orders.embed: {"title":"Guardian Orders","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Expert Charm or Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Brace for Impact and Sentinel Stance Orders.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Fighter's Versatility.embed: {"title":"Fighter's Versatility","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Any]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Learned two Scene or Daily Moves"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You gain Initiative."}],"description":"You may give up use of a Scene or Daily Move to regain use of a Scene or Daily Move which you have already used. You may give up use of a Daily Move to regain use of a Scene Move, but not vice-versa.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.63"}}

Multi-Tasking.embed: {"title":"Multi-Tasking","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"20 Speed Stat, Master Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Swift Action"}],"description":"You may take two Standard Actions instead of one this turn, but both actions must have an At-Will Frequency.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.63"}}

Blur (Feature).embed: {"title":"Blur","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Expert Acrobatics, Expert Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Attacks and Moves targeting you that don\u2019t require an Accuracy Check now require one, as though they had Accuracy Check of 2. You may only apply half of your Evasion to these Attacks and Moves.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.63"}}

Dazzling Dervish.embed: {"title":"Dazzling Dervish","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Trickster Orders"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"Until the end of their next turn, the target adds their non-stat Evasion to their Movement Capabilities and whenever they attack a foe or Shift through a square occupied by a foe, that foe suffers a -3 penalty to all rolls until the end of their next turn. This effect may only affect a foe once per round.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Signature Move.embed: {"title":"Signature Move","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Any]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Learned four Moves"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose a Move you know. Increase the Move\u2019s Frequency one step, as if you had used a PP Up. This choice cannot be changed once made. This Feature may not select Moves known through temporary means, nor can these Moves be used to qualify for this Feature.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.63"}}

Capricious Whirl.embed: {"title":"Capricious Whirl","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders][Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Trickster Orders"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"While this Feature is Bound, the target has a +3 bonus to its Evasion but deals 5 less damage with all damaging attacks.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Major Gift - Realm Portal.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Realm Portal","description":"Target: Area","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"You open a small portal through your patron\u2019s realm to any location you have visited within 20 miles. The portal lasts for two minutes, during which any living thing which voluntarily wishes to enter the portal may do so; any conscious trainers or Pok\u00e9mon forced through the portal involuntarily will not be affected by the portal. After the two minutes are up or when you step through the portal, it collapses."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"One Creation Trio Major Gift"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Pinpoint Strike.embed: {"title":"Pinpoint Strike","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders][Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Precision Orders"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"Increase the Accuracy and Effect Range of the target\u2019s damaging attacks by +2. These attacks deal 5 less damage, before applying weakness and resistance.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Pok\u00e9Maniac.embed: {"title":"Pok\u00e9Maniac","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Adept Pok\u00e9mon Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"Make a Pokemon Education Check with a DC of 10. If you succeed, you determine the target\u2019s Level, Types, Nature, and Abilities.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.64"}}

Elite Trainer.embed: {"title":"Elite Trainer","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ace Trainer"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose Agility Training, Brutal Training, Focused Training, or Inspired Training. You gain the chosen Feature, even if you do not meet the prerequisites. When training, you may apply up to two different [Training] Features on each of your Pok\u00e9mon. If you already have all of these Features, instead pick another Feature for which you qualify.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.75"}}

Champ in the Making.embed: {"title":"Champ in the Making","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"4 Ace Trainer Features, Master Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Drain 1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use Ace Trainer to give Pok\u00e9mon Trained Stats"}],"description":"Choose two Trained Stats for each Pok\u00e9mon instead of one. A Pok\u00e9mon may only have two Trained Stats this way.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.75"}}

Major Gift - Negate Emotion.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Negate Emotion","description":"Target: Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer within 8 meters","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"The Target becomes immune to Enraged, Confused, and Infatuation Status for the remainder of the encounter and are cured of the Status Afflictions if they currently have them. However, the Target is treated as if their Intimidate, Charm, Intuition and Guile Skills were at Pathetic Rank for the next fifteen minutes. The target becomes immune to further uses of Negate Emotion for 24 hours."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Emotion's Heart"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"3 AP - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.60"}}

Skill Monkey.embed: {"title":"Skill Monkey","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Three Skills at Adept Rank or higher"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You make a Skill Check"}],"description":"You may re-roll the triggering Skill Check with a +2 Bonus, taking the new result. This Feature may be used to re-roll a specific roll only once.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.64"}}

Top Percentage.embed: {"title":"Top Percentage","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ace Trainer, Expert Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon levels up to a Level evenly divisible by 5"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains an extra Tutor Point. Top Percentage may be used on a single Pok\u00e9mon a maximum of 4 times. Once a Pok\u00e9mon has gained 4 Tutor Points in this way, increase each of that Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Base Stats by +1.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.75"}}

Let Me Help You With That.embed: {"title":"Let Me Help You With That","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Full Action, Interrupt"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"An allied Trainer fails a Skill Check in a Skill you have Ranked at Novice or higher."}],"description":"The ally may re-roll the Skill Check with a Bonus equal to your Skill Rank.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.64"}}

Pok\u00e9 Ball Crafter.embed: {"title":"Pok\u00e9 Ball Crafter","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Basic Balls, Pok\u00e9 Ball Repair, Expert Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You may craft Dusk, Dive, Heal, Luxury, Net, Nest, Quick, Repeat, or Timer Balls for $700. Requires access to a Pok\u00e9 Ball Tool Box.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.64"}}

Critical Moment.embed: {"title":"Critical Moment","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elite Trainer, Adept Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pokemon with [Training] Features applied"}],"description":"The bonuses from your Pokemon\u2019s [Training] are tripled until the end of your next turn.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.75"}}

Major Gift - Magma Armor.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Magma Armor","description":"You gain the Magma Armor Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Vulcan's Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.65"}}

Perseverance.embed: {"title":"Perseverance","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ace Trainer"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains an Injury"}],"description":"The target instead does not gain an Injury. Perseverance may activate only once per Scene per target.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.75"}}

Major Gift - Air Lock.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Air Lock","description":"You gain the Air Lock Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Clear Skies"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.63"}}

Decisive Director.embed: {"title":"Decisive Director","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Coordinator"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"Add or subtract X from the target\u2019s Initiative until the end of your next turn. X is equal to your Charm Rank doubled.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.83"}}

Complex Orders.embed: {"title":"Complex Orders","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Commander, at least two Features with the [Orders] Tag that have targets"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Shift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You give [Orders] that have targets."}],"description":"You may choose a different Order to give to each Target. You must pay all AP costs and follow Frequency restrictions for all Orders used in this way.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.81"}}

Ace Trainer.embed: {"title":"Ace Trainer","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Drain 1 AP \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You spend at least half an hour training your Pok\u00e9mon"},{"name":"Note","value":"Just to clarify, this Feature Drains 1 AP per training session, not per Pok\u00e9mon. So train as many as you can to get the most out of this Feature!"}],"description":"For each Pok\u00e9mon that has been trained during this time, choose a Stat besides HP; that Stat becomes Trained until an Extended Rest is taken. The default State of Trained Stats is +1 Combat Stages instead of 0. A Pok\u00e9mon may have only one Trained Stat at a time.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.75"}}

Scheme Twist.embed: {"title":"Scheme Twist","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Commander, Master Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You give [Orders] with a Daily or Scene Frequency that have Targets."}],"description":"You may target up to two additional Allies with the [Orders].","footer":{"text":"Core: p.81"}}

Innovation.embed: {"title":"Innovation","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Adaptable Performance"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pok\u00e9mon with at least 1 Tutor Point."}],"description":"The target loses 1 Tutor Point, and then learns a Move created with Innovation. See the next section on page 84 for details on creating Moves for this Feature. A Pok\u00e9mon may only have one Move created by Innovation at a time.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.83"}}

Coordinator.embed: {"title":"Coordinator","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Grace, Novice Charm, Command, Guile, Intimidate, or Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may reroll a single Appeal Roll or Damage Roll. This Ability may be used only once per Contest, and once per Pok\u00e9mon per Scene.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.83"}}

Adaptable Performance.embed: {"title":"Adaptable Performance","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Coordinator"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Turn to use a Move in a Contest"}],"description":"Choose two of your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Moves. Your Pok\u00e9mon may perform your Contest Move as if had the Contest Typing of one of your chosen Moves, and had the effects of the other. You may not use either move on the next round of the contest. This effect may be used once per Contest.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.83"}}

Mobilize.embed: {"title":"Mobilize","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Commander"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Any Ally"}],"description":"The target cannot provoke Attacks of Opportunity on their next turn. Mobilize may target an Ally only once per encounter.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.81"}}

Flexible Preparations.embed: {"title":"Flexible Preparations","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Adaptable Performance, Adept Charm, Command, Guile, Intimidate, or Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pok\u00e9mon that has Contest Stats from Poffins"}],"description":"The target may reallocate up to 2d6 of Poffin-Derived Contest Stats from one Contest Stat to another. This effect lasts until the end of the day.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.83"}}

Inspirational Support.embed: {"title":"Inspirational Support","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Cheer Brigade, Adept Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You may trigger Cheerleader as a Free Action when your Pok\u00e9mon with Friend Guard activate an Ability or Status Move that affects only allies.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.93"}}

Leadership.embed: {"title":"Leadership","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Commander"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You may use [Orders] that have targets to target any Ally, even if normally those [Orders] would only let you apply the effect to your own Pokemon. Any other conditions still apply.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.81"}}

Battle Conductor.embed: {"title":"Battle Conductor","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Leadership"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You give [Orders] with a Frequency of At-Will that have targets"}],"description":"You may target up to two additional Allies with the [Orders].","footer":{"text":"Core: p.81"}}

Tip the Scales.embed: {"title":"Tip the Scales","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Commander, Expert Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You give [Orders] that have targets."}],"description":"Your [Orders] with an At-Will Frequency instead target all allies within 10 Meters.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.81"}}

Commander.embed: {"title":"Commander","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose one of Ravager Orders, Marksman Orders, Trickster Orders, Guardian Orders, or Precision Orders. You gain the chosen Feature, even if you do not meet its prerequisites.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.81"}}

Major Gift - Dream Augury.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Dream Augury","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"You fall into a deep sleep and have a dream that portends of things to come. If this Major Gift is gained through Cresselia, you learn hints of a favorable situation that will arise soon. If this Major Gift is gained through Darkrai, you learn hints of a dangerous or mournful situation that will arise soon."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Dream Mastery"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP - Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.65"}}

Gleeful Interference.embed: {"title":"Gleeful Interference","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Cheer Brigade, Adept Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with the Friend Guard Ability hits a foe with a damaging attack"}],"description":"The triggering foe gains a -2 penalty to Accuracy for one full Round.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.93"}}

Cheerleader.embed: {"title":"Cheerleader","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Inspired Training, Novice Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"X AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use [Orders]"}],"description":"Choose Cheered, Excited, or Motivated. All allies affected by the triggering effect gain the chosen condition.  This Feature costs 0 AP if the triggering effect affects only one ally, and costs 1 AP if it affects two or more.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.93"}}

Dabbler.embed: {"title":"Dabbler","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Hobbyist, Expert General Education or Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"At the Level 5, 10, 20, 30, and 40 Character Advancement Level Milestones, if you choose to gain Bonus Stats, you also gain an Edge for which you qualify. If you choose Bonus Edges or Features, you also gain +2 to your choice of Attack or Special Attack. This applies retroactively.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.86"}}

Egg Tutor.embed: {"title":"Egg Tutor","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Move Tutor"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points."}],"description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points, and learns any Move from its Egg Move List. A Pok\u00e9mon may be targeted by Egg Tutor only one time.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.88"}}

Move Tutor.embed: {"title":"Move Tutor","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mentor, one Mentor Skill at Expert Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points."}],"description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points, and learns any move from its Tutor List.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.88"}}

Lessons.embed: {"title":"Lessons","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mentor"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Charm","value":"Empowered Development"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Intimidate","value":"Corrective Learning"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Intuition","value":"Changing Viewpoints"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Pok\u00e9mon Education","value":"Versatile Teachings"}],"description":"You may perform any Mentor Lesson for which you qualify.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.164"}}

Lifelong Learning.embed: {"title":"Lifelong Learning","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Move Tutor, one Mentor Skill at Master Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may have up to 4 Moves from their Move List come from TMs or Move Tutors.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.88"}}

Expand Horizons.embed: {"title":"Expand Horizons","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mentor"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains 3 Tutor Points. A Pok\u00e9mon may be targeted by Expand Horizons only once.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.88"}}

Gotta Catch 'Em All.embed: {"title":"Gotta Catch 'Em All","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Advanced Capture Techniques Rank 3"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your make a Capture Roll."}],"description":"You may switch the rolled digits on your 1d100 roll. For example, if you roll a 91, that can be switched to a 19. This does not turn a roll of 1 into a \u201cNatural\u201d roll of 100.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.78"}}

Guidance.embed: {"title":"Guidance","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mentor"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s base Move List limit is increased by +1 (Reminder","value":"The default Move List Limit is 6)."}],"description":",","footer":{"text":"Core: p.88"}}

Look and Learn.embed: {"title":"Look and Learn","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Hobbyist, Expert General Education or Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"x2 Uses \u2013 Extended Action"}],"description":"When you activate Look and Learn, you may gain any of the Features listed on page 86 of the Core handbook even though they are Features from other Classes. You do not need to meet their normal prerequisites, but you must meet the Prerequisites listed. Look and Learn can be used two times; once to learn a Feature from the Scene Features List, and once to learn a Feature from the Action Point Features List.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.86"}}

Dilettante.embed: {"title":"Dilettante","description":"You gain both an Edge and a General Feature from the lists on page 86 of the Core handbook. You may gain the chosen Edge and Feature even if you do not meet the Skill prerequisites. You must meet any other Prerequisites. Whenever you gain a Feature or Edge this way, change any Skill Rank applications or Skill Checks mandated directly by the Edge or Feature into your choice of General Education or Perception Skill Checks or Rank applications instead.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 4]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"All Ranks Prerequisites","value":"Hobbyist"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.86"}}

Cheer Brigade.embed: {"title":"Cheer Brigade","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Cheerleader"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points remaining"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon loses 2 Tutor Points and gains the Friend Guard Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.93"}}

Staying Power.embed: {"title":"Staying Power","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Enduring Soul"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon Takes a Breather"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may \u201cTake a Breather\u201d even if it is Confused or Enraged, and it does not Trip or have to Shift away from enemies as part of the action. You may choose whether or not your Pok\u00e9mon resets their Combat Stages to default.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.99"}}

Hobbyist.embed: {"title":"Hobbyist","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice General Education, Novice Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Special","value":"You may count Hobbyist Features as \u201cGeneral Features\u201d for the purposes of any effect that would grant you a General Feature."}],"description":"You gain three Skill Edges for which you qualify.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.86"}}

Enduring Soul.embed: {"title":"Enduring Soul","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Athletics and Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You may add to your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s HP stat when they level up, ignoring Base Relation, and you do not need to \u201ccorrect\u201d Stats due to this inflated HP.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.99"}}

Effective Methods.embed: {"title":"Effective Methods","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Duelist"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points remaining"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon loses 2 Tutor Points and gains your choice of the Exploit or Tolerance Ability. You may only target a Pok\u00e9mon once with Effective Methods.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.96"}}

Seize The Moment.embed: {"title":"Seize The Moment","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Duelist, Master Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon would gain Momentum while already at 6 Momentum"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon loses 6 Momentum, and then gains +1 Momentum. Your Pok\u00e9mon may immediately make an attack as an Interrupt, but this attack must target only a Tagged Foe. If the attack misses, it still deals damage as if it had the Smite keyword. If the attack hits, it\u2019s automatically a Critical Hit. If it would have already been a Critical Hit, your Pok\u00e9mon gains Hit Points equal to half of its maximum Hit Points. May be used only once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon .","footer":{"text":"Core: p.97"}}

Keep Fighting!.embed: {"title":"Keep Fighting!","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"5 Cheerleader Features, Master Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon or an Ally Trainer with over 1 Hit Point is reduced to 0 Hit Points or lower: "}],"description":"That Ally\u2019s Hit Point count is reduced to 1 instead, and then gains Temporary Hit Points equal to your charm rank doubled.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.94"}}

Shrug Off.embed: {"title":"Shrug Off","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Staying Power"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Once per day, each of your Pok\u00e9mon may spend Shift Action to remove 1 Injury from themselves; this may also be activated as a Free Action whenever your Pok\u00e9mon Take a Breather.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.99"}}

Duelist.embed:
{"title":"Duelist","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Focused Training, Novice Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will – Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pokémon or Trainer"}, {"name":"Momentum", "value":"Mechanic – Momentum:
» Your Pokémon begins each Scene with 0 Momentum.
» At the end of each Combat round, your Pokémon gains +1 Momentum.
» Whenever your Pokémon hits a Tagged foe, they gain +1 Momentum.
» Your Pokémon has a maximum of 6 Momentum. So use a d6 to track it.
» All Momentum is lost when your Pokémon Faints, your Pokémon is recalled, or combat ends"}],"description":"The Foe becomes Tagged; or if the foe is already Tagged, the foe loses the Tag. Only one foe can be Tagged this way at a time. If a new Foe is Tagged, all other Tags are lost. Your Pokémon under the effects of Focused Training gain half their Momentum (rounded up) as a Bonus to Accuracy and Evasion against Tagged Foes, but as long as a Foe is Tagged, they do not benefit from Focused Training’s Accuracy Bonus against other foes.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.96"}}

Mentor.embed: {"title":"Mentor","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Two of Charm, Intimidate, Intuition, or Pok\u00e9mon Education at Novice Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pok\u00e9mon with at least 1 Tutor Point remaining"},{"name":"Special","value":"When you take Mentor, choose two of Charm, Intimidate, Intuition, and Pok\u00e9mon Education to become your Mentor Skills. The Skills you choose must be at Novice Rank or higher."}],"description":"The target loses 1 Tutor Point, and then learns a move from its tutor list marked with a (N), or any move on its level-up list learned at X Level or lower, where X is the target\u2019s current Level plus the sum of your Mentor Skill Ranks. Note that despite being Tutored, these Moves count as if they were \u201cnatural\u201d for organizational purposes.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.88"}}

Directed Focus.embed: {"title":"Directed Focus","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Effective Methods"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Whenever your Pok\u00e9mon with the Exploit or Tolerance Ability are targeted by [Orders], deal Super- Effective Damage, or take Super-Effective Damage, they gain +1 Momentum after all effects of the Move or Order are resolved.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.96"}}

Rider.embed: {"title":"Rider","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mounted Prowess, Agility Training, Novice Acrobatics or Athletics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"While you are Mounted on a Pokemon under the effects of Agility Training, the bonuses from Agility Training are doubled.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.103"}}

Lean In.embed: {"title":"Lean In","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ride as One"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You and your Mount both take Damage from a Burst, Blast, Cone, or Line"}],"description":"Both you and your Mount Resist the attack one step further.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.103"}}

Type Methodology.embed: {"title":"Type Methodology","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Effective Methods, Adept Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"}],"description":"Effects depend on whether your Pok\u00e9mon has the Tolerance or Exploit ability. \u00bb\u00bb Whenever your Pok\u00e9mon with Tolerance takes Super-Effective damage from a Tagged foe, your Pok\u00e9mon may lose 2 Momentum to Resist that attack one step. \u00bb\u00bb Whenever your Pok\u00e9mon with Exploit deals Resisted damage to a Tagged foe, your Pok\u00e9mon may lose 2 Momentum to increase the effectiveness of the attack one step.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.96"}}

Emergency Release.embed: {"title":"Emergency Release","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Juggler, Expert Acrobatics or Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Shift Action"}],"description":"You may Release a Pok\u00e9mon as an Interrupt.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.101"}}

Cavalier's Reprisal.embed: {"title":"Cavalier's Reprisal","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ride as One, Expert Acrobatics or Athletics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"An adjacent foe hits your Mount with an attack"}],"description":"You may make a Struggle Attack against the triggering foe.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.103"}}

Not Yet!.embed: {"title":"Not Yet!","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Enduring Soul, Expert Athletics or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon is Fainted, but is not at less than -100% Hit Points"}],"description":"Before fainting, the targeted Pok\u00e9mon gains an Injury, and may then use a Move as an Interrupt. When the Move is resolved, the Pok\u00e9mon then immediately faints. This consumes a Command as normal. This cannot be used with the Move Explosion, Flail, Pain Split, Reversal or Selfdestruct.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.99"}}

Vim and Vigor.embed: {"title":"Vim and Vigor","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Shrug Off, Master Athletics or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points"}],"description":"You spend an hour with the target. The target loses 2 Tutor Points, and gains the Vigor Ability. Vim and Vigor may target a Pok\u00e9mon only once","footer":{"text":"Core: p.99"}}

Conqueror's March.embed: {"title":"Conqueror\u2019s March","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ramming Speed, Adept Acrobatics or Athletics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with Run Up"}],"description":"This round, if being used as a Mount, the target may use Dash, Burst, Blast, Cone, or Line range Moves with a range of Pass instead of their usual range.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.103"}}

Juggler.embed: {"title":"Juggler","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Quick Switch, Novice Acrobatics, Novice Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Using Quick Switch costs only 1 AP. Whenever you send a Pok\u00e9mon into an encounter from a Pok\u00e9 Ball, they receive a +10 bonus to their Initiative during that round.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.101"}}

Ride as One.embed: {"title":"Ride as One","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Rider"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"While you are Mounted, you and your Mount each use the highest of each other\u2019s Speed Evasion. If both you and your Mount have the same Speed Evasion, you instead each receive a +1 bonus to Speed Evasion. Whenever one of you receives Initiative, either of you may take your turn. When the next person would receive initiative, the person that did not take their turn then takes it.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.103"}}

Ramming Speed.embed: {"title":"Ramming Speed","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Rider"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will - Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points"}],"description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points and gains the Run Up Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.103"}}

Round Trip.embed: {"title":"Round Trip","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Juggler, Adept Acrobatics or Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Move"}],"description":"You may immediately switch your Pok\u00e9mon that just performed a Move for another of your Pok\u00e9mon. This effect lets Pok\u00e9mon with the Trapped condition switch out.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.101"}}

Bounce Shot.embed: {"title":"Bounce Shot","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Juggler"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You throw a Pok\u00e9 Ball"}],"description":"After hitting its mark or landing, your Pok\u00e9 Ball bounces 3 meters in any direction. You may have your Pok\u00e9 Ball trigger captures or releases before or after the bounce.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.101"}}

Juggling Show.embed: {"title":"Juggling Show","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Juggler"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You may roll an additional Xd6 during the Introduction Stage of a Contest, where X is half of your Acrobatics Rank. You may choose any Contest Stat to attempt to gain Dice for with this roll.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.101"}}

Sleight.embed: {"title":"Sleight","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"4 Trickster Features, Master Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may activate Sleight as an Interrupt to immediately take their turn and use a Status-Class Move as a Standard Action. If this Move targets a foe, it ignores Substitute and Defensive Abilities, and Blessings may not be activated against the Move.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.108"}}

Overrun.embed: {"title":"Overrun","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Conqueror's March, Expert Acrobatics or Athletics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Mount with Run Up makes a Damage Roll for a Dash or Pass Move"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon adds their Speed Stat in addition to their normal attacking Stat to their Damage Roll. The target gains Damage Reduction against this attack equal to their own Speed Stat.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.103"}}

Pain Resistance.embed: {"title":"Pain Resistance","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Taskmaster, Adept Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with 1 or more injuries takes Damage"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains X Damage Reduction against the triggering attack, where X is its Tick Value multiplied by the number of Injuries it has. This may be triggered once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.105"}}

Stacked Deck.embed: {"title":"Stacked Deck","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Trickster, Adept Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits a foe suffering from a Status Affliction or one of the other conditions in the table on page 108 of the Core handbook"}],"description":"Choose a Status Affliction or condition the triggering target is suffering from; the target suffers an additional effect according to the table. Stacked Deck may only affect a foe once per Scene.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.108"}}

Bag of Tricks.embed: {"title":"Bag of Tricks","description":"You gain two Trickster Techniques of your choice.\nTrickster Techniques: Mind Games, Escape Artist, Shell Game, Impromptu Trick","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"All Ranks Prerequisites","value":"Trickster"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.108"}}

Quick Healing.embed: {"title":"Quick Healing","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Taskmaster"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"}],"description":"Your Hardened Pok\u00e9mon may use Quick Healing to remove up to three injuries, and gains two Ticks of Hit Points for each Injury removed this way.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.105"}}

Strike of the Whip.embed: {"title":"Strike of the Whip","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Taskmaster, Press"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use Press"}],"description":"You may apply 1 or more of the following effects to the Pok\u00e9mon hit by Press: \u00bb\u00bb Give the target 1 Injury and a Tick of Temporary Hit Points. \u00bb\u00bb Spend 1 AP and cure the target of Confusion, Infatuation, Rage, and Suppression. \u00bb\u00bb Use an [Orders] with targets you have on the target as a Free Action.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.105"}}

Flourish.embed: {"title":"Flourish","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Trickster"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Status-Class Moves that affect foes ignore non-Stat Evasion. They may Critically Hit like damaging Moves on a roll of 20. Upon such a Critical Hit, choose one effect from the list below. This Critical Hit rate may be modified as normal. \u00bb\u00bb If the Move inflicts a Status Affliction with a Save Check, all affected targets get a -4 penalty to their first Save Check. \u00bb\u00bb If the Move lowers Combat Stages, then pick a Stat that the Move lowers and lower it by 1 additional Combat Stage. \u00bb\u00bb Your Pok\u00e9mon gains a Tick of Temporary Hit Points.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.108"}}

Savage Strike.embed: {"title":"Savage Strike","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Taskmaster"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points"}],"description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points, and gains the Cruelty Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.105"}}

Desperate Strike.embed: {"title":"Desperate Strike","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Savage Strike, Expert Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon triggers Cruelty, or scores a Critical Hit with damaging attack."}],"description":"Your Pokemon may apply the effects of Cruelty to the attack without expending Cruelty\u2019s Frequency. Cruelty\u2019s effects may be purchased as if the foe had additional injuries equal to the number of injuries on the user. Desperate Strike may be used once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.106"}}

Trickster.embed: {"title":"Trickster","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits a foe with a Status-Class Move or a foe triggers your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Hazard"}],"description":"After the Move is resolved, your Pok\u00e9mon may perform a Dirty Trick or Manipulate Maneuver on that foe as a Free Action. The Maneuver automatically hits, but the target must be in range for the chosen Maneuver. Use your own Guile to resolve Manipulate Rolls.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.108"}}

Deadly Gambit.embed: {"title":"Deadly Gambit","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"5 Taskmaster Features, Master Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon is the target of a foe\u2019s damaging melee attack"}],"description":"The triggering attack automatically hits as if it was a Critical Hit. Before damage resolves, your Pok\u00e9mon may use a 1-Target damaging attack on the foe making the triggering attack as an Interrupt, Frequency allowing, and also automatically hits as a Critical Hit. Damage for both attacks then resolve at the same time.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.106"}}

Encore Performance.embed: {"title":"Encore Performance","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"3 Trickster Features, Expert Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Status-Class move that does not target foes."}],"description":"Choose one of the following. \u00bb\u00bb Your Pok\u00e9mon gains +1 Combat Stage in any Stat in which they haven\u2019t gained a Combat Stage this turn. \u00bb\u00bb Your Pok\u00e9mon gains a second Standard Action this round that must be used to make an At-Will action that does not trigger Encore Performance. \u00bb\u00bb If your Pok\u00e9mon is placing Hazards, they may place an additional two units. \u00bb\u00bb If your Pok\u00e9mon is activating a Weather Effect, it lasts an additional two turns. \u00bb\u00bb If your Pok\u00e9mon is activating a Blessing, it gains one additional use.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.108"}}

Stat Stratagem.embed: {"title":"Stat Stratagem","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch] [Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Stat Link, Stat Training, Master Focus or Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"},{"name":"Attack Effect","value":"The target\u2019s damaging Melee Attacks have their Critical Hit Range increased by 1 for each positive Combat Stage they have in Attack, up to a maximum of +3."},{"name":"Defense Effect","value":"The target gains a +2 bonus to Save Checks against Paralysis, Sleep, and Freeze for each positive Combat Stage they have in Defense, up to a maximum of +6."},{"name":"Special Attack Effect","value":"The target\u2019s damaging Ranged Attacks have their Effect Range increased by 1 for each positive Combat Stage they have in Special Attack, up to a maximum of +3."},{"name":"Special Defense Effect","value":"The target gains a +2 bonus to Save Checks against Confusion, Rage, and Infatuation for each positive Combat Stage they have in Special Defense, up to a maximum of +6."},{"name":"Speed Effect","value":"The target\u2019s Movement Capabilities are increased by 1 for each positive Combat Stage they have in Speed, up to a maximum of +3."}],"description":"While this Feature is Bound, the target has the following bonuses based on your Chosen Stat:","footer":{"text":"Core: p.113"}}

Tornado Charge.embed: {"title":"Tornado Charge","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Celerity, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Special"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains Initiative"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains 2 additional Standard Actions this turn. Your Pok\u00e9mon may also Shift between taking each action, so long as their total Movement does not exceed their Movement Capabilities. All three of your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Standard Actions this turn must be used to perform Zephyr Shield, or Flying-Type Moves with a Frequency of At-Will or EOT. Tornado Charge may be used only once per day per Pok\u00e9mon.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.123"}}

Zephyr Shield.embed: {"title":"Zephyr Shield","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Celerity, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Special"}],"description":"Your Flying-Type Pok\u00e9mon may activate Zephyr Shield as a Standard Action Interrupt, or as a Shift Action during their turn. If they do, until the end of the user\u2019s next turn, all ranged attacks targetting them take a -1 penalty to Accuracy and -10 penalty to damage, they become immune to the effects of Moves with the Powder keyword, and they do not lose Hit Points from Weather effects. Additionally, if Zephyr Shield is used as a Standard Action, that Pok\u00e9mon may use the Resolution Effect of a Flying-Type Move with the Set- Up keyword on their next turn, skipping the Set-Up phase.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.123"}}

Suggestion.embed: {"title":"Suggestion","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Honed Mind, Master Focus or Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 1 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Pok\u00e9mon or Trainers"}],"description":"You smoothly plant a thought into the subject\u2019s head that lasts as long as this Feature is Bound. They won\u2019t know exactly why or how they thought of it; they will naturally assume they thought of it themselves, and their brain will attempt to get there as logically as it can. The target may not necessarily act on the Suggestion, especially if it is against their nature. Using Suggestion to plant a specific thought may cause the target to think about a specific subject, dredging up surface thoughts related to the matter. Using this on a target leaves discoverable psychic residue. You may only use Suggestion as long as you have the Telepathy Capability, though you may keep it Bound without having Telepathy active.","footer":{"text":"BntD: p.69"}}

Mark of Vision.embed: {"title":"Mark of Vision","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Oracle, Adept Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 1 AP \u2013 Extended Action "},{"name":"Target","value":"A willing Trainer"}],"description":"You mark the target with a mystical power which allows you to close your eyes and focus to perceive the world with their senses from their perspective. You may Bind this Ability multiple times, each time on a different target, but you may only concentrate on one Mark of Vision at a time, and you may only have a number of Marks at one time equal to half your Perception Rank. A target may choose to end this effect at any time, or to deny you access to their senses temporarily without ending the effect entirely. You have a rough sense of how far away and in what direction marked targets are.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.186"}}

Ambient Aura.embed: {"title":"Ambient Aura","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Aura Reader, Expert Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use a Move with the Aura keyword"},{"name":"Aura Blessings","value":"\u00bb You create an energy barrier around you or an ally within 5 meters granting Damage Reduction equal to your Intuition Rank tripled until the end of your next turn.\n\u00bbYou cure yourself of a Volatile Status Affliction.\n\u00bbGain the Blindsense Capability until the end of the Scene."}],"description":"You gain an Aura Blessing that can be spent any time as a Free Action Interrupt. When you spend an Aura Blessing, you choose one of the effects below. You may only have one Aura Blessing at a time, and you must have the Aura Pulse Capability to use Ambient Aura.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.177"}}

Aura Mastery.embed: {"title":"Aura Mastery","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Aura Guardian, Expert Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose two of Aura Sphere, Focus Blast, Drain Punch, or Focus Punch. You learn the chosen Moves.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.177"}}

Stat Ace.embed:
{"title":"Stat Ace","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ace Trainer or Style Expert, 3 Pokémon with the chosen stat of 15 or more
Or
3 Pokémon with the chosen stat as their Highest Stat and at 20 or higher, Adept Command or Focus
"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Note","value":"When you take Stat Ace, choose Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, or Speed. This becomes your Pokémon’s Chosen Stat. You may take Stat Ace multiple times, choosing different Stats each time. If using Style Expert to qualify for Stat Ace, your Chosen Stat must be the Stat that correlates to your Chosen Contest Stat. Beauty is Special Attack, Cool is Attack, Cute is Speed, Smart is Special Defense, and Tough is Defense.  You may use the Stat in place of "Stat" in all Stat Ace features on this sheet, e.g. "Attack Ace" or "Special Defense Link"."}],"description":"Your Pokémon have their Chosen Base Stat increased by +1, and by +1 more for every 10 Levels they have (for example, a Level 20 Pokémon would have your Chosen Stat’s base value increased by +3). Additionally, your Pokémon may ignore Base Relations, as long as they are adding to the Stat chosen for Stat Ace, and you do not need to “correct” Stats due to this inflated Stat Value. ","footer":{"text":"Core: p.112"}}

Playing God.embed: {"title":"Playing God","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Chemistry Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Chemist, Expert Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Cost","value":"$3500"}],"description":"Choose Castform, Grimer, Koffing, Magnemite, Porygon, Solosis, Trubbish, or Voltorb. Using your chemistry set, you create an artificial Egg of the Chosen Pok\u00e9mon, that hatches within a day. The resulting Pokemon is born at level 5, with the Nature and Ability of your choice (Abilities chosen from its species\u2019 Basic Abilities). Additionally, you may enhance the Pokemon in several ways. Choose a number of upgrades below equal to your Technology Education Rank. \u00bb\u00bb The Pok\u00e9mon is of an unusual coloration, gaining a +2d6 Bonus to the Introduction Stage of a Contest toward a single Contest Stat. \u00bb\u00bb The Pok\u00e9mon adds a Move from its Egg Move or Move Tutor List to its Inheritance List. This may be performed up to 3 times. \u00bb\u00bb Increase one of the Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Base Stats by +1. This counts as use of a Vitamin. This may be performed up to 5 times.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.144"}}

Psionic Sight.embed: {"title":"Psionic Sight","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Psychic)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You are able to visibly see any Psychic Residue left on Humans or Pok\u00e9mon due to the effects of Psionic abilities. Each Human or Pok\u00e9mon leaves distinct Psychic Residue on their targets; you are easily able to distinguish which targets have been affected by the same Psionic, though to identify that Psionic you need to have a way of knowing their signature (such as simply seeing them do it, and seeing the resulting signature).","footer":{"text":"Core: p.64"}}

Major Gift - Glitch Message.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Glitch Message","description":"Target: Electronic Communication","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"You must use Glitch Message targeting one instance of electronic communication you are currently aware of in your vicinity, such as an email being typed at the computer next to you or a text message someone is sending. You may view and edit the contents of the message before it gets electronically transmitted without the sender being aware of an issue. On extended communications such as a phone call or video conference, Glitch Message works on one minute\u2019s worth of communication per activation."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Intuitive Sabotage"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.70"}}

Major Gift - Heart Swap.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Heart Swap","description":"You learn the Move Heart Swap.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Sailor's Guardian"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.60"}}

Prehistoric Bond.embed: {"title":"Prehistoric Bond","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Paleontology Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fossil Restoration, Expert Pokemon Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"The remains of a Fossil you revived"},{"name":"HP \u2013 Relic Crown","value":"The holder gains a +2 Bonus to all Save Checks."},{"name":"Attack \u2013 Primal Frame","value":"The holder\u2019s damaging attacks have their Critical Hit Range extended by +1."},{"name":"Defense \u2013 Prehistoric Razors","value":"When a foe hits the holder with a damaging Melee Attack, the holder may cause them to lose a Tick of Hit Points as a Reaction."},{"name":"Special Attack \u2013 Primal Cloak","value":"The holder\u2019s damaging attacks have their Effect Range extended by +1."},{"name":"Special Defense \u2013 Prehistoric Aegis","value":"The holder gains 5 Damage Reduction against Ranged Attacks."},{"name":"Speed \u2013 Relic Sash","value":"The holder gains +2 Evasion against Status Moves."}],"description":"You also produce a Held Item from the remnants of the Fossil. The effect of this Held Item is based on the highest Base Stat of the individual Pok\u00e9mon being Revived, counting the effects of Nature but no other effects that alter Base Stats. If there is a tie, the GM decides which Base Stat is used. This Held Item may only be used by Pok\u00e9mon revived from Fossils.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.146"}}

Major Gift - Amorphous.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Amorphous","description":"You gain the Amorphous Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Alien Countenance"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.69"}}

Major Gift - Lava-blooded.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Lava-blooded","description":"Static Effect: You are immune to the ambient heat of volcanic areas. Unless you come into direct contact with molten rock, you will not be harmed. You resist Fire Type Moves by one step.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Vulcan's Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static \/ Scene - Free Action, Interrupt"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene Effect"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.65"}}

Major Gift - God Crusher.embed: {"title":"Major Gift \u2013 God Crusher","description":"You gain the Godslayer Feature. If you already possess the Godslayer Feature, you may instead take another Feature for which you qualify for instead. When using Godslayer, the AC is now 8, and you do not suffer from feedback.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift \u2013 World Serpent\u2019s Embrace"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Major Gift - Dark Aura.embed: {"title":"Major Gift \u2013 Dark Aura","description":"You gain the Dark Aura Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift \u2013 Touch of the Flayed One"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Major Gift - Probability Control.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Probability Control","description":"You gain the Probability Control Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Catastrophe Sense OR Minor Gift - Perfect Timing"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.59, 64"}}

Major Gift - Drain Will.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Drain Will","description":"Target: Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer within 8 meters","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"You and the Target make opposed Focus Checks. If you win the Check, the Target is unable to take Shift or Standard Actions for their next 1d2 turns. Regardless of whether or not you won the Check, the Target suffers a -3 penalty to all rolls for the rest of the encounter, or for fifteen minutes outside of combat. The target becomes immune to further uses of Drain Will for 24 hours."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Force of Will"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"3 AP - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.60"}}

Major Gift - Diamond Storm.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Diamond Storm","description":"You learn the Move Diamond Storm.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Magic Bounce"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.61"}}

Major Gift - Mark of Loyalty.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Mark of Loyalty","description":"Target: Your Pok\u00e9mon","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Treat the Target as if it were one Loyalty higher for the rest of this turn."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Stoic Stature"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP - Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.59"}}

Pact Gift - Sacred Fire.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Sacred Fire","description":"You learn the Move Sacred Fire.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Ho-Oh and Shared Tower Duo Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

Pact Gift - Origin Tutor.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Origin Tutor","description":"Target: Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 3 Tutor Points","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon loses 3 Tutor Points and may make use of any TM or Tutoring effect to learn a single Move regardless of what it is normally capable of learning. It must still pay any Tutor Point costs for this effect. You may only target a Pok\u00e9mon once with Origin Tutor."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Mew Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Activate Once\/10 - Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

Pact Gift - Psystrike.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift \u2013 Psystrike","description":"You learn the Move Psystrike.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Twin Souls, Expanded Horizons, Mental Suggestion"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.69"}}

Pact Gift - Land's Wrath.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift \u2013 Land\u2019s Wrath","description":"You learn the Move Land\u2019s Wrath.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All of Zygarde\u2019s Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Enticing Beauty.embed: {"title":"Enticing Beauty","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Beautiful Ballet Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily\/10 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"The target acts as a Bait item as if it had the Alluring Capability. Add its number of Beauty Dice from Poffins as a Bonus to all d20 lure rolls.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.115"}}

Beautiful Ballet.embed: {"title":"Beautiful Ballet","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 3d6 in their Beauty Stat from Poffins may activate Beautiful Ballet as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves. X is the Rank of the chosen Move.\nRank 1: Captivate, Mist\nRank 2: Lovely Kiss, Mean Look","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"X AP \u2013 Special"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Style Expert, Beauty as Chosen Stat, Novice Intuition"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":"Expert Intuition"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.115"}}

Style Expert.embed: {"title":"Style Expert","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"3 Pok\u00e9mon with 3d6 in a specific certain Contest Stat from Poffins\nOr\nCoordinator, 1 Pokemon with 3d6 in a specific certain Constat Stat from Poffins"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Note","value":"When you take Style Expert, choose from Beauty, Cool, Cute, Smart, or Tough. This becomes your Chosen Contest Stat. You may take Style Expert multiple times, each time choosing a different Contest Stat"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gain +2d6 to your chosen Contest Stat. These dice are counted as if coming from Poffins. ","footer":{"text":"Core: p.115"}}

Style Flourish.embed: {"title":"Style Flourish","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"3 Style Expert Features"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action:"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Move of your Chosen Type"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Re-Roll all dice that result in 1s. This effect may only be used once per Contest."},{"name":"Battle Effect","value":"The target gains +1 CS in the Stat corresponding to your chosen Contest Type, after the Move and all effects have been resolved. This may only affect a target once per Scene."}],"description":",","footer":{"text":"Core: p.115"}}

Style Entrainment.embed: {"title":"Style Entrainment","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"4 Style Expert Features"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Swift Action, Priority (Limited)"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains one of the following Abilities corresponding to your chosen Contest Stat for the rest of the Scene, even if it is switched out. Style Entrainment may only grant one Ability to a Pok\u00e9mon at a time. If it is used a second time on the same target, it replaces the first granted Ability. \u00bb\u00bb Beauty gives Gentle Vibe or Serene Grace \u00bb\u00bb Cool gives Defiant or Sniper \u00bb\u00bb Cute gives Cute Charm or Cute Tears \u00bb\u00bb Smart gives Analytic or Anticipation \u00bb\u00bb Tough gives Sturdy or Intimidate","footer":{"text":"Core: p.115"}}

Major Gift - March of the Colossus.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - March of the Colossus","description":"Target: Trainer or Pok\u00e9mon","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"For the next three rounds, the target has their Attack and Speed halved. At the end of the third round, increase the target\u2019s Attack and Speed by two Combat Stages each."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Hands of the Creator"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.66"}}

Major Gift - Seed Flare.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Seed Flare","description":"You learn the Move Seed Flare.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Pure Breathing, Major Gift - Sprouter"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.60"}}

Major Gift - Hydration.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Hydration","description":"You gain the Hydration Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Sailor's Guardian"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.60"}}

Signature Technique.embed: {"title":"Signature Technique","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elite Trainer, Expert Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points remaining"}],"description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points. Choose one Move on the Target\u2019s Move List. That Move becomes the target\u2019s Signature Technique, and you may apply one of the modifications listed below to the Move. The Move being modified must fit the category of the modification, and you must have the associated Training Feature to apply a modification. A Pok\u00e9mon may only have one Signature Technique at a time. If you choose to teach a Pok\u00e9mon a different Signature Technique, the old one is lost, and 1 Tutor Point is refunded. 1 Tutor Point is also refunded if the Pok\u00e9mon ever forgets a Signature Technique Move.\n\nSee ```Signature Technique List``` for more details.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.75"}}

Gleeful Steps.embed: {"title":"Gleeful Steps","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Cute Cuddle Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Cute-Type Move"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Treat the Move as if it were one step more aligned with the Contest Type. If the Move would be opposing the Contest Type, it is instead neutral. If it is neutral, it is instead matching. You may activate this effect only once per Contest."},{"name":"Battle Effect","value":"The triggering Pok\u00e9mon may immediately shift up to half their Movement speed in meters in any direction after their attack is resolved. You may activate Gleeful Steps only once per Pok\u00e9mon per Scene."}],"description":",","footer":{"text":"Core: p.116"}}

Let's Be Friends!.embed: {"title":"Let's Be Friends!","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Cute Cuddle Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily\/5 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon:"}],"description":"The target may attempt to improve the disposition of a Wild Pok\u00e9mon as if making a Charm Check. They roll their Cute Dice from Poffins and add their number of Cute Dice from Stats as a modifier. For example, a Pok\u00e9mon with 4d6 Cute from Poffins and 3d6 Cute from Speed rolls 4d6+3 in place of a Charm Check.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.116"}}

Major Gift - Aura Break.embed: {"title":"Major Gift \u2013 Aura Break","description":"You gain the Aura Break Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift \u2013 World Serpent\u2019s Embrace"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Cute Cuddle.embed: {"title":"Cute Cuddle","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 3d6 in their Cute Stat from Poffins may activate Cute Cuddle as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves. X is the Rank of the chosen Move.\nRank 1: Charm, Block\nRank 2: Teeter Dance, Attract","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"X AP \u2013 Special"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Style Expert, Cute as Chosen Stat, Novice Charm"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":"Expert Charm"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.116"}}

Macho Charge.embed: {"title":"Macho Charge","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Tough Tumble Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Tough-Type Move"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Treat the Move as if it were one step more aligned with the Contest Type. If the Move would be opposing the Contest Type, it is instead neutral. If it is neutral, it is instead matching. You may activate this effect only once per Contest."},{"name":"Battle Effect","value":"All targets hit by the Move are pushed away from the triggering Pok\u00e9mon by 3 meters. You may activate Macho Charge only once per Pok\u00e9mon per Scene."}],"description":",","footer":{"text":"Core: p.117"}}

Action Hero Stunt.embed: {"title":"Action Hero Stunt","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Cool Conduct Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily\/10 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon makes a Skill Check for a dramatic, high risk action:  "}],"description":"Instead of using a Skill for this Check, your Pok\u00e9mon rolls their Cool Dice from Poffins and adds their number of Cool Dice from Stats as a modifier. For example, a Pok\u00e9mon with 5d6 Cool from Poffins and 2d6 from Attack rolls 5d6+2. An example trigger is charging into a burning building for a heroic rescue. Skill Checks invoked by Intercepting attacks, Combat Maneuvers, Moves, and Abilities don\u2019t trigger this Feature.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.116"}}

Learn From Your Mistakes.embed: {"title":"Learn From Your Mistakes","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Smart Scheme Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily\/5 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon fails a Skill Check:"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may re-roll the Skill Check with a Bonus equal to its number of Smart Dice from Poffins.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.117"}}

Unconquerable.embed: {"title":"Unconquerable","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Tyrant's Roar, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Dragon-Type Move while they have 3 or more Status Afflictions"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon is cured of up to three Status Afflictions.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.121"}}

Smart Scheme.embed: {"title":"Smart Scheme","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 3d6 in their Smart Stat from Poffins may activate Smart Scheme as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves.
