X is the Rank of the chosen Move.\nRank 1: Fake Tears, Calm Mind\nRank 2: Taunt, Flatter","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"X AP \u2013 Special"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Style Expert, Smart as Chosen Stat, Novice Guile"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":"Expert Guile"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.117"}}

Major Gift - Shared Mortality.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Shared Mortality","description":"Target: An Allied Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer.","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Add your remaining Hit Points with those of your Target. You may split these Hit Points as you wish between you and your Target."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"One Mortality Duo Major Gift"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.67"}}

Major Gift - Fairy Aura.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Fairy Aura","description":"You gain the Fairy Aura Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Bounty of Life"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Major Gift - Space Distortion.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Space Distortion","description":"Target: Pok\u00e9mon or Trainers","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Exchange the positions of up to three target Pok\u00e9mon or Trainers within 10 meters."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Realm Portal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Major Gift - Expanded Horizons.embed: {"title":"Major Gift \u2013 Expanded Horizons","description":"You gain either the Telepath or Telekinetic Capability. If you possess both of these from their respected Trainer Classes, you instead gain the Godslayer Feature.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift \u2013 Twin Souls"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.69"}}

Black-Out Strike.embed: {"title":"Black-Out Strike","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Clever Ruse, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits with a damaging Dark- Type Move"}],"description":"After the triggering attack is resolved, the target of the attack gains an Injury and falls asleep. If this attack would put them are 3 or more injuries or at or under 25% of their maximum Hit Points, the target instead becomes Fainted. Black-Out Strike may be used only once per Scene.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.120"}}

Devious.embed: {"title":"Devious","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Clever Ruse, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Dark-Type Pok\u00e9mon uses a Move with the Social keyword."}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may immediately use a naturally Dark-Typed Status-Class Move or a Move with the Social keyword as a Free Action. This must be a different Move than the triggering Move, and must follow all Frequency limitations. Devious may be used only once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.120"}}

Sneak Attack.embed: {"title":"Sneak Attack","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Clever Ruse, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Dark-Type Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"While this Feature is bound, when attacking foes that are Fainted, Flanked, Flinched, Sleeping, Stuck, Tripped, unaware of your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s presence, or otherwise do not expect an attack, the target gains a +2 bonus to Accuracy Rolls and a bonus to Damage Rolls equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.120"}}

Disruption Order.embed: {"title":"Disruption Order","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Insectoid Utility, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits with a Bug-Type Move"}],"description":"Until the end of user\u2019s next turn, all targets hit by the Move are Slowed, suffer a -X to Accuracy Rolls, and are Flinched by Damaging Attacks on 16+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.120"}}

Chitin Shield.embed: {"title":"Chitin Shield","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Insectoid Utility, Type Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Bug-Type Pok\u00e9mon is hit by a Status-Class Move"}],"description":"The effect misses, and your Pokemon becomes immune to that Move for the rest of the Scene. Chitin Shield may be triggered once per Scene per Pokemon.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.120"}}

Insectoid Utility.embed: {"title":"Insectoid Utility","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Bug as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Threaded","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may use its Threaded attack to perform Combat Maneuvers, including Grapple and Push."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Wallclimber","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon becomes Immune to Push and Trip effects."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Naturewalk","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon cannot be Slowed or Stuck in its appropriate Terrains."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Sky","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon has a +1 bonus to its Speed Evasion."}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with the following Capabilities have the upgrades below applied to them.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.120"}}

Major Gift - Flash Fire.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Flash Fire","description":"You gain the Flash Fire Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Elemental Soul"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.58"}}

Major Gift - Phasing.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Phasing","description":"You gain the Phasing Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Alien Countenance"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.69"}}

Iterative Evolution.embed: {"title":"Iterative Evolution","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Insectoid Utility, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits with a damaging Bug-Type attack"}],"description":"While this Feature is bound, if the triggering attack would deal Super-Effective Damage, it gains a +2 Bonus to Accuracy Check. If it would deal Neutral Damage, it gains a Bonus to its Damage Roll equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank. If it would be resisted, it is resisted one step less. This is calculated after applying any other effects that would modify effectiveness before the Accuracy Roll is made, such as the Tinted Lens Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.120"}}

Highlander.embed: {"title":"Highlander","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Tyrant's Roar, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Dragon-Type Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"While this Feature is Bound, the target gains X Damage Reduction against Dragon-Type attacks, and gain a +X Bonus to Damage Rolls with Dragon-Typed attacks against other Dragon-Typed targets. X is equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.121"}}

Type Refresh.embed: {"title":"Type Refresh","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch] [Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Standard Acrion"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"The target regains one use of a Scene-Frequency Move of your Chosen Type, and refreshes the Frequency of all EOT-Frequency Moves of your chosen Type. A Target can be affected by Type Refresh only once per Scene.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.119"}}

Rule of Cool.embed: {"title":"Rule of Cool","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Cool Conduct Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Cool-Type Move"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Treat the Move as if it were one step more aligned with the Contest Type. If the Move would be opposing the Contest Type, it is instead neutral. If it is neutral, it is instead matching. You may activate this effect only once per Contest."},{"name":"Battle Effect","value":"The triggering Move\u2019s Crit Range is increased by 3, and the Moves with the Priority or Interrupt Keywords may not be activated in reaction to this Move. You may activate Rule of Cool only once per Pok\u00e9mon per Scene."}],"description":",","footer":{"text":"Core: p.116"}}

Brawler.embed: {"title":"Brawler","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Close Quarters Mastery, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon makes a Struggle Attack"}],"description":"This Struggle Attack has a range of Burst 1, Friendly instead of the usual range, and deals Fighting-Type Damage.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.122"}}

Fey Trance.embed: {"title":"Fey Trance","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fairy Lights, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pokemon"}],"description":"While this Feature is bound, whenever the target uses a 1-Target Move with the Social Keyword or a Fairy-Type Status Move, the foe hit by the triggering Move becomes Infatuated with your Pokemon, and immediately Shifts towards your Pokemon, forfeiting their next Shift Action. This may affect a specific foe only once per Scene.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.122"}}

Face Me Whelp.embed: {"title":"Face Me Whelp","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Close Quarters Mastery, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"While your Pok\u00e9mon is adjacent to a foe they Marked, that foe gains a -X penalty to Accuracy Rolls and a -10 penalty to Damage Rolls on attacks that do not target the Pok\u00e9mon that Marked them. X is equal to half your Type-Linked Skill Rank.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.122"}}

Move Sync.embed: {"title":"Move Sync","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"3 Type Ace Features"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 1 Tutor Point."}],"description":"The target loses 1 Tutor Point. Pick a Move in the target\u2019s Move List. The picked move is now permanently of your Chosen Type, and may have different effects. See the Types Changes section on page 468 of the Core handbook for more information and suggestions. A Pok\u00e9mon may have only one Move-Sync\u2019d Move in their Move List at a time; to Sync a new Move, the old Move must be forgotten.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.119"}}

Overload.embed: {"title":"Overload","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Lockdown, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"While this Feature is Bound, whenever the target hits a foe with an Electric Attack, they may choose to have the foe lose Hit Points equal to the target\u2019s Tick value plus your Type-Linked Skill Rank. If they do, the target loses a Tick of Hit Points after the attack is resolved.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.121"}}

Lockdown.embed: {"title":"Lockdown","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Electric as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Damaging Electric Attack would inflict Paralysis on an already Paralyzed foe"}],"description":"For 1 full round, that foe is instead Stuck and may only use At-Will Frequency Moves.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.121"}}

Shocking Speed.embed: {"title":"Shocking Speed","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Lockdown, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"}],"description":"You may activate this Feature to have your Electric-Type Pok\u00e9mon may use an Electric-Type Move with a Frequency of At-Will as if it had Priority (Advanced).","footer":{"text":"Core: p.121"}}

Patch Cure.embed: {"title":"Patch Cure","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Apothecary Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Apothecary, Adept Medicine Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Restorative Item"}],"description":"You distill the target, gaining 3 Restorative Patches. Restorative Patches have the same effect as the items from which they were created, but can only be applied as an Extended Action. Recipe - Super Cures","footer":{"text":"Core: p.141"}}

This Will Not Stand.embed: {"title":"This Will Not Stand","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Tyrant's Roar, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Dragon-Type Pok\u00e9mon takes a Critical Hit or Massive Damage"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains +1 Combat Stage in each of Attack, Special Attack, and Speed. This Will Not Stand may trigger only once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.121"}}

Arcane Favor.embed: {"title":"Arcane Favor","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fairy Lights, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Fairy-Type Move"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon and all allies on the Field gain a +1 Bonus to all rolls for one full round.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.122"}}

Major Gift - Relic Song.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Relic Song","description":"You learn the Move Relic Song.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Soundproof"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.61"}}

Fairy Rite.embed: {"title":"Fairy Rite","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fairy Lights, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Special"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon creates Fairy Lights as a Standard Action"}],"description":"Your Fairy-Type Pok\u00e9mon may activate Fairy Rite as a Standard Action to lose any number of Hit Points, up to a maximum equal to your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Level, and heal an adjacent Ally by that many Hit Points. Then, if your Fairy-Type Pok\u00e9mon has any Fairy Lights, they may immediately expend any Fairy Lights to gain a Tick of Hit Points, or cause an ally within 6 meters to gain a Tick of Hit Points.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.122"}}

Chain Lightning.embed: {"title":"Chain Lightning","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Lockdown, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits with a damaging 1-target Electric Attack"}],"description":"Pick another Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer within 3 meters of the target of the attack. You may repeat the triggering attack against the target, with a -5 Damage penalty. If you hit, you may repeat the attack a third time against a foe within 3 meters of the second target, this time with a -10 Damage penalty. The third target cannot be the same as the original target.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.121"}}

Celerity.embed: {"title":"Celerity","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Flying as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Flying-Type Pok\u00e9mon, or a Pok\u00e9mon with a Sky or Levitate Speed"}],"description":"While this Feature is Bound, add your Type-Linked Skill to the target\u2019s Initiative. Additionally, if the Target uses a Disengage Maneuver, they may Shift as if Slowed instead of shifting only 1 Meter.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.123"}}

Boo!.embed: {"title":"Boo!","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ghost Step, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon reappears after using Ghost Step, or the set-up phase of Phantom Force or Shadow Force"}],"description":"The next Ghost-Type attack the target makes that turn gains the Smite keyword and can\u2019t be Intercepted or avoided in any way (Dodge, Parry, Shield Moves, etc).","footer":{"text":"Core: p.124"}}

Fan The Flames.embed: {"title":"Fan The Flames","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Brightest Flame, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a 1-Target Fire-Type Move"}],"description":"Instead of its usual range, the attack may be performed as if it had a range of Burst 1 if melee, or Cone 2 if ranged.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.123"}}

Gale Strike.embed: {"title":"Gale Strike","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Celerity, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Flying-Type Move with an Accuracy Check"}],"description":"You may roll the Accuracy Check twice, and resolve using either result. If both results would hit and you resolve the attack using the lower result, Gale Strike\u2019s Frequency is not expended.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.123"}}

Ghost Step.embed: {"title":"Ghost Step","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Ghost as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"}],"description":"Your Ghost-Type Pok\u00e9mon may activate this Feature by spending a Shift Action to remove themselves from the field. They may not be targeted in any way during this time. At the beginning of their next turn, they reappear in any square of their choice that they could have Shifted to from their previous location. Each Pok\u00e9mon may activate Ghost Step only once per Scene.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.124"}}

Pact Gift - Lunar Dance.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Lunar Dance","description":"You learn the Move Lunar Dance.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Dreamspinner"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.65"}}

Incandescence.embed: {"title":"Incandescence","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Brightest Flame, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Fire-Type Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"While this Feature is Bound, the target adds both their Attack and Special Attack Stat to all damaging Fire-Type Attacks, instead of one or the other. This does not stack with Twisted Power.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.123"}}

Foiling Foliage.embed: {"title":"Foiling Foliage","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Grass as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with a Grass-Type Status Move"}],"description":"Pick a Grass-Type Status-Class Move known by the target. The chosen Move no longer takes up a Move Slot. A Pok\u00e9mon may have only one Move bypass the Move Limit at a time; if a new Move is chosen for a Pok\u00e9mon, the previous Move loses this effect.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.124"}}

Vampirism.embed: {"title":"Vampirism","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ghost Step, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits an adjacent foe with a Ghost-Type Move"}],"description":"Choose a Stat. The triggering foe loses a Tick of Hit Points and a Combat Stage in that Stat. Your Pok\u00e9mon gains 1 Combat Stage in the chosen Stat, and a Tick of Temporary Hit Points.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.124"}}

Major Gift - Mist Ball.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Mist Ball","description":"You learn the Move Mist Ball.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Sight Sharing"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.59"}}

Major Gift - Pure Breathing.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Pure Breathing","description":"You are immune to the Moves Rage Powder, Poison Gas, Poisonpowder, Sleep Powder, Smog, Smokescreen, Spore, Stun Spore, and Sweet Scent.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Plant Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.60"}}

Major Gift - Bad Dreams.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Bad Dreams","description":"You gain the Bad Dreams Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Oneiromancy, Major Gift - Dream Augury"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.65"}}

Earthroil.embed: {"title":"Earthroil","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mold the Earth, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"}],"description":"Your Ground-Type Pok\u00e9mon may activate Earthroil as a Shift Action to use a damaging Ground-Type Move as it had a range of Line 4 or Burst 1 instead of its usual range, and as if it had the Groundsource keyword. 1-Target Moves performed this way take a -5 penalty to their Damage Rolls.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.125"}}

Mold the Earth.embed: {"title":"Mold the Earth","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Ground as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with the Groundshaper Capability uses a Ground-Type Move"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may use the Groundshaper Capability as a Free Action. When used this way, Groundshaper creates Spike Hazards in each square turned into Rough or Slow Terrain. If you wish, instead of Groundshaper\u2019s normal range, you may choose to affect the square targeted by the attack and all cardinally adjacent squares. If the triggering Move is a Burst, Blast, Line, or Cone, you may choose to affect all squares in the targeted area instead.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.125"}}

Cross-Pollinate.embed: {"title":"Cross-Pollinate","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Foiling Foliage, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Grass-Type Pok\u00e9mon uses a damaging Grass-Type Move"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may immediately use a Grass-Type Status-Class move as a Free Action.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.124"}}

Polar Vortex.embed: {"title":"Polar Vortex","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glacial Ice, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"While this Stratagem is bound, your Pok\u00e9mon may activate Moves and Abilities as if they were in Hail.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.125"}}

New Normal.embed: {"title":"New Normal","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Extra Ordinary, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits with a Normal-Type Move with conditional modifiers which increase or decrease its damage"}],"description":"You use the highest damage value for the triggering Move. New Normal may only be used once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon. New Normal may not raise a Move\u2019s Damage Base above 14; if a Move would have its Damage Base raised above that value, it is instead raised to 14. (Examples: Return is DB 9, Wring Out never has its damage decreased due to the target\u2019s Hit Points, Retaliate is DB 14.)","footer":{"text":"Core: p.126"}}

Deep Cold.embed: {"title":"Deep Cold","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glacial Ice, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits with a damaging Ice-Type Move"}],"description":"The target is Frozen, and has their Attack, Special Attack, and Speed Combat Stages lowered by 1 each. The target is automatically cured of the Frozen Condition after 1 full round. A foe may be affected by Deep Cold only once per Scene.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.125"}}

Extra Ordinary.embed: {"title":"Extra Ordinary","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Normal as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Normal-Type Pok\u00e9mon with Last Chance or Normal Strategist"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains the Last Chance or Normal Strategist Ability, whichever one they do not already have. Extra Ordinary can target a Pok\u00e9mon only once.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.126"}}

Desert Heart.embed: {"title":"Desert Heart","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mold the Earth, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"While this Stratagem is bound, your Pok\u00e9mon may activate Moves and Abilities as if they were in a Sandstorm.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.125"}}

Plainly Perfect.embed: {"title":"Plainly Perfect","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Extra Ordinary, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"While this Feature is bound, instead of rolling for damage with Normal-Type Moves, your Pok\u00e9mon acts as if they rolled the maximum value on their Damage Dice Roll. Plainly Perfect only works for the first instance of the Damage Dice Roll on Critical Hits.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.126"}}

Upheaval.embed: {"title":"Upheaval","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mold the Earth, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses the Groundshaper Capability, or a Move with the Groundsource keyword"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may make a Trip Attempt as a Free Action against any Pok\u00e9mon targeted by the Move, or standing on a square changed by the Groundshaper capability. Your Pok\u00e9mon gains a bonus to their Combat Roll equal to half of your Type-Linked Skill Rank.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.125"}}

Corrosive Blight.embed: {"title":"Corrosive Blight","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Potent Venom, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits a foe with a Poison-Type Attack"}],"description":"The target gains the Blight Condition for one full round. Blighted targets lose a Tick of Hit Points upon being hit by any attack. If the attack is Poison-Typed, the Blight effect\u2019s duration is refreshed.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.126"}}

Miasma.embed: {"title":"Miasma","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Potent Venom, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon misses with a Poison-Type Move"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may use either Smokescreen or Poison Gas as if they were on their Move List. When used this way, these Moves ignore Frequency Limitations, and are used as a Ranged Blast 3, with the blast centered on the square targeted by the triggering attack. Poison-Type Pok\u00e9mon are not negatively affected by Smoke Screens created this way. Your Pok\u00e9mon may also trigger Miasma deliberately as a Standard Action.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.126"}}

Gneiss Aim.embed: {"title":"Gneiss Aim","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Gravel Before Me, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon misses with a Damaging Rock- Type Move"}],"description":"The Move gains the Smite keyword for that use.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.127"}}

Potent Venom.embed: {"title":"Potent Venom","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Poison as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Poison-Type Pok\u00e9mon inflicts Poison on a foe"}],"description":"The foe does not necessarily lose Special Defense Combat Stages from Poison; instead, they lose Combat Stages in the Combat Stat of your choice. Whenever the target loses Hit Points from Poison, they lose additional Hit Points equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.126"}}

Psychic Resonance.embed: {"title":"Psychic Resonance","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Psionic Sponge, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits a foe with a Psychic-Type Status Move"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may use the Move Encore against the triggering foe, as if it was on their Move List.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.127"}}

Gravel Before Me.embed: {"title":"Gravel Before Me","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Rock as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Rock-Type Pok\u00e9mon misses all targets with a Rock-Type attack, receives an Injury, suffers a Critical Hit, or Faints."}],"description":"Create a Stealth Rock Hazard adjacent to your Pok\u00e9mon.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.127"}}

Polished Shine.embed: {"title":"Polished Shine","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Steel as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"The Effect Range of your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Steel-Type Moves is increased by +2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.128"}}

Mindbreak.embed: {"title":"Mindbreak","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Psionic Sponge, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Psychic-Type Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"While this Feature is Bound, the target\u2019s damaging Psychic-Type Moves gain a +1 Bonus to Effect Range and a +3 Bonus to Damage Rolls for each of the following conditions that the target is suffering: Bad Sleep, Confusion, Curse, Disabled, Flinch, Infatuation, Rage, or Suppression.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.127"}}

Psionic Sponge.embed: {"title":"Psionic Sponge","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Psychic as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Special"}],"description":"Your Psychic-Type Pok\u00e9mon may activate Psychic Sponge as a Shift Action to add a Psychic Type Move known by an ally within X meters to their Move List until the end of their turn. This does not allow them to have duplicate Moves in their Move List. This Feature may only be used once per Pok\u00e9mon per Scene, and X is equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.127"}}

Bigger and Boulder.embed: {"title":"Bigger and Boulder","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Gravel Before Me, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits with a damaging Rock-Type Move"}],"description":"All targets hit by the triggering Move are pushed a number of meters equal to half your Type-Linked Skill Rank or less, and they become Vulnerable for one full round. Create a Stealth Rock Hazard adjacent to each foe hit this way.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.127"}}

Debilitate.embed: {"title":"Debilitate","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Potent Venom, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Poison-Type Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"While this Feature is Bound, when the target sucessfully hits a Poisoned or Blighted foe with a Poison- Type Move, the foe gains a -2 penalty to Accuracy Rolls and Evasion for one full round.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.126"}}

Iron Grit.embed: {"title":"Iron Grit","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Polished Shine, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"}],"description":"When this Feature becomes Bound, the target gains +1 Defense Combat Stage. While the Feature remains bound, the target\u2019s Defense Stat cannot be lowered, and its Defense Combat Stages cannot be lowered.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.128"}}

Force of Will.embed: {"title":"Force of Will","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Psionic Sponge, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Psychic-Type Status Move with a range of Blessing, Field, Hazard, or Self."}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may immediately use another Psychic-Type Status Move from its Move List with a range of Blessing, Field, Hazard, or Self.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.127"}}

Chef.embed: {"title":"Chef","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Basic Cooking, Novice Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"}],"description":"You may use any Chef Recipe for which you qualify. Recipes - Meal Planner, Salty Surprise, Spicy Wrap, Sour Candy, Dry Wafer, Bitter Treat, Sweet Confection","footer":{"text":"Core: p.131"}}

Chronicler.embed: {"title":"Chronicler","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Swift Action, Interrupt"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pok\u00e9mon, Trainer, Move, or Location."}],"description":"You make Record of the target. Records can be placed in an Archive as an Extended Action. When you take Chronicler, you gain one Archive.\nFor more details, see```Chronicler Archive List```","footer":{"text":"Core: p.134"}}

Complex Aftertaste.embed: {"title":"Complex Aftertaste","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Accentuated Taste"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You or an ally trades in a Digestion\/Food Buff from an item with a Taste"}],"description":"The target gains a Digestion\/Food Buff according to the Taste of the Snack granting the Buff. This Digestion\/Food Buff matches that of the corresponding basic Tasty Snack recipe. Recipe - Leftovers","footer":{"text":"Core: p.131"}}

Dumplings.embed: {"title":"Dumplings","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"4 Chef Features, Master Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Ingredient 1","value":"Leftovers, Preserves, or a Snack made with Chef"},{"name":"Ingredient 2","value":"Leftovers or Preserves"},{"name":"May Playtest Errata","value":"Dumplings cannot be used to make other Dumpling items."}],"description":"You mix the two ingredients into one Snack that has the same effect as its ingredients. The two ingredients must be different items.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.131"}}

Glacial Ice.embed: {"title":"Glacial Ice","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Ice as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Your Ice-Type Pok\u00e9mon gain Damage Reduction equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank against Fighting, Fire, Rock, and Steel-Typed Attacks from which they would take Super-Effective Damage.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.125"}}

Dietician.embed: {"title":"Dietician","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Chef, Expert Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Your Pokemon can benefit from a maximum of 7 Vitamins. Recipe - Vitamins","footer":{"text":"Core: p.131"}}

Archival Training.embed: {"title":"Archival Training","description":"You gain an Archive you have not previously obtained.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"All Ranks Prerequisites","value":"Chronicler"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.134"}}

Finisher.embed: {"title":"Finisher","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Hunter, Adept Stealth, Adept Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You and your Pok\u00e9mon gain a +5 bonus to Damage Rolls against Fainted, Flinched, Sleeping, Stuck, Slowed, Trapped, or Tripped targets.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.159"}}

Flood!.embed: {"title":"Flood!","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Water as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"}],"description":"Your Water-Type Pokemon may activate Flood! as a Shift Action to use a damaging Water-Type Move as if had a range of Line 4 or Close Blast 2 instead of its usual range.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.128"}}

Fishbowl Technique.embed: {"title":"Fishbowl Technique","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Flood!, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"While this Stratagem is bound, your Pok\u00e9mon may activate Moves and Abilities as if they were in Rainy Weather.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.128"}}

Culinary Appreciation.embed: {"title":"Culinary Appreciation","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Chef"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points remaining"}],"description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points and gains the Gluttony Ability. Recipe - Bait Mixer","footer":{"text":"Core: p.131"}}

Hits the Spot.embed: {"title":"Hits the Spot","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Chef"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You or your Pok\u00e9mon trade in a Digestion\/Food Buff"}],"description":"The target gains Temporary Hit Points equal to your Intuition Rank doubled. These Temporary Hit Points stack from any Temporary Hit Points granted by Accentuated Taste, the Digestion\/Food Buff or by the Lunchbox Ability. Recipe - Hearty Meal","footer":{"text":"Core: p.131"}}

Aqua Vortex.embed: {"title":"Aqua Vortex","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Flood!, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits with a damaging Water- Type attack"}],"description":"All targets of the attack are put in a Vortex, and take a penalty to all Damage Rolls equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank while in the Vortex.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.128"}}

Fountain of Life.embed: {"title":"Fountain of Life","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Flood!, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Water-Type Pok\u00e9mon hits with a damaging Water-Type attack"}],"description":"You may choose to take a penalty to the Damage Roll for the attack up to triple your Type-Linked Skill Rank or up to half the rolled damage for the triggering attack, whichever is lower. Your Pok\u00e9mon gains twice that value in Temporary Hit Points and may cure themselves of one Status Affliction. Fountain of Life may only be used once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.128"}}

Dress to Impress.embed: {"title":"Dress to Impress","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Versatile Wardrobe, two Fashionista Skills at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Chic Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains the effect of all items in extra slots granted by Versatile Wardrobe for one full round. Dress to Impress may only target a Pok\u00e9mon once per Scene.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.137"}}

Researcher.embed: {"title":"Researcher","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"An Education Skill at Novice Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Choose two Researcher Fields of Study. You may take Features from those Fields with this instance of Researcher. Gain one Feature from a chosen Researcher Field for which you qualify. Note","value":"Researcher is broken up into multiple Fields of Study. You may not take Features from a Field of Study you haven\u2019t chosen with the base Researcher Feature. You may take Researcher any number of times, each time choosing two different Fields of Study."}],"description":",","footer":{"text":"Core: p.140"}}

Targeted Profiling.embed: {"title":"Targeted Profiling","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Profile Album, Expert Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"Until the end of your next turn, the target acts as if they had the Mold Breaker Ability against all Pok\u00e9mon and Trainers in your Profile Archive and gains a +2 bonus to Accuracy Rolls against these targets.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.134"}}

Versatile Wardrobe.embed: {"title":"Versatile Wardrobe","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fashionista, two Fashionista Skills at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points remaining"}],"description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points and then becomes Chic. Chic Pok\u00e9mon gain two extra Held Item slots with which they can carry Held Items. However, the items in these slots have no effect and are not treated as equipped. As a Swift Action on their turn, Chic Pok\u00e9mon may swap a currently active Held Item with an item stored in these slots. Chic Pok\u00e9mon may not carry multiple items of the same type or with repeated effects.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.137"}}

Accessorize.embed: {"title":"Accessorize","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Dashing Makeover, one Fashionista Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You may wear and benefit from two Accessory Slot Items at once. The two items must be of different types and must not share an effect. For example, a Fire Brace cannot be paired with another Fire Brace or a Fire Plate, but it could be paired with an Ice Brace, a Fire Booster, or a Stat Booster.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.137"}}

Major Gift - Life Force.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Life Force","description":"You gain the Life Force Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Two Major Gifts from the Tower Duo"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

Parfumier.embed: {"title":"Parfumier","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fashionista, one Fashionista Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Whenever you create an Incense Held Item, choose Sweet Scent or Aromatic Mist. While your Pok\u00e9mon is holding that Incense Item in an active Held Item slot, they add the chosen Move to their Move List. Recipe - Incense Maker","footer":{"text":"Core: p.137"}}

Herb Lore.embed: {"title":"Herb Lore","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Botany Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Seed Bag Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Energy Powder","value":"A Sitrus Berry or Tiny Mushroom creates x2 Energy Powders. A Revival Herb creates x3 Heal Powders"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Poultice","value":"x1 Energy Powder and x1 Heal Powder create x3 Poultices."}],"description":"You may create Energy Powder, Heal Powder, or Poultices from ingredients, as listed below.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.143"}}

Dashing Makeover.embed: {"title":"Dashing Makeover","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fashionista"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Trainer or Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"When you activate Dashing Makeover, choose one Equipment or Held Item you can create. While this Feature is Bound, the target gains the effects of the chosen item, as long as they would normally be able to equip it (e.g.: Trainers cannot equip Incense Items).They do not need to take up an Equipment or Held Item slot to gain this benefit. A target may only be affected by one instance of Dashing Makeover at a time. Recipe - Practical Fashion","footer":{"text":"Core: p.137"}}

Observation Party.embed: {"title":"Observation Party","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Travel Album, Adept Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"While they are in a Location in your Travel Archive, your Pok\u00e9mon have the Ability you chose when gaining Travel Archive and gain a +2 bonus to Perception Checks to notice the environment.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.134"}}

Style is Eternal.embed: {"title":"Style is Eternal","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fashionista"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon is Disarmed or would have their Held Item removed by another effect such as Thief or Covet"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon instead retains their Held Item. Style is Eternal may only be used once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon. Recipe - Focused Fashion","footer":{"text":"Core: p.137"}}

Major Gift - See the Wired.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - See the Wired","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"For the next 5 minutes you can see networks as a visual overlay when you look at people communicating electronically. You view this in the form of lines of light arcing from devices to the other devices they are communicating with."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Intuitive Sabotage"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.71"}}

Live and Learn.embed: {"title":"Live and Learn","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[General Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Adept General Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You or your Pok\u00e9mon miss with an attack, fail a Skill Check, or fail a Save Check"}],"description":"Add half of your General Education Rank to the next roll of the same type that the triggering user makes.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.140"}}

Caustic Chemistry.embed: {"title":"Caustic Chemistry","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Chemistry Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Chemist, Expert Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit with a Pester Ball or apply a Repel to a Pok\u00e9mon"},{"name":"Recipe - Pester Balls","value":"Shut Down"}],"description":"Make a Technology Education Roll. Warping Ground.embed: {"title":"Warping Ground","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Warper"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Gravity and Trick.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.195"}}

Major Gift - Sun Blanket.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Sun Blanket","description":"You gain the Sun Blanket Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Elemental Soul"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.58"}}

Psionic Analysis.embed: {"title":"Psionic Analysis","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Occultism Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Witch Hunter, Master Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"You are able to analyze Psychic Residue and can determine the following information about the Trainer or Pok\u00e9mon that left the residue","value":","},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb If they\u2019re Human, which of the following Class Features they have","value":"Telepath, Telekinetic, Warper"}],"description":"\u00bb\u00bb Whether they are a Human or a Pok\u00e9mon \u00bb\u00bb Which Psychic-Type Moves they know","footer":{"text":"Core: p.145"}}

Chemical Warfare.embed: {"title":"Chemical Warfare","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Chemistry Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Chemist, Adept Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You throw a Pester Ball"},{"name":"Recipes - Pester Ball","value":"Pain"}],"description":"The Pester Ball creates a Blast 2, affecting all targets in the area.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.144"}}

Witch Hunter.embed: {"title":"Witch Hunter","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Occultism Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Psionic Sight Feature, even if you do not meet the prerequisites. If you already had the Psionic Sight Feature, you instead gain another Feature for which you qualify.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.145"}}

Chemist.embed: {"title":"Chemist","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Chemistry Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Repel Crafter"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Recipes - Enhancers, Pester Balls","value":"Disorient"}],"description":"You may craft any Chemistry Recipe for which you qualify.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.144"}}

Don't Look Away.embed: {"title":"Don't Look Away","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Pack Tactics, Adept Stealth, Adept Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You or your Pok\u00e9mon with Pack Hunt or Teamwork hits with an Attack of Opportunity"}],"description":"The hit foe loses a Tick of Hit Points, and is Slowed for 1 round. Skill Trainer.embed: {"title":"Skill Trainer","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Pokemon Caretaking Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Pusher"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You Train your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"For each of your Pok\u00e9mon that has been Trained during this time, choose a Skill; that Skill becomes Pushed until an Extended Rest is taken. Pok\u00e9mon rolls +1d6 with Pushed Skills, unless that would cause you to roll more than 6d6; if so, that Pok\u00e9mon rolls with a +3 Bonus instead. A Pok\u00e9mon may have only one Pushed Skill at a time.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.147"}}

Pusher.embed: {"title":"Pusher","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Pokemon Caretaking Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Pokemon Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gain the Basic Ranged Attacks, Aura Pulse, Enticing Bait, Extended Invisibility, Far Reading, Precise Threadings, Seismometer, TK Mastery, and Trail Sniffer Poke Edges automatically if they qualify for them, without having to invest any Tutor Points.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.147"}}

Survivalist.embed: {"title":"Survivalist","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"One Time Use \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Choose a Terrain in which you have spent at least three nights. You gain Naturewalk for that terrain and a +2 bonus to Athletics, Acrobatics, Stealth, Perception, and Survival Checks in that terrain. When you have 2 Survivalist Features, you may choose a second Terrain. When you have 4 Survivalist Features, you may choose a third terrain. When you have 6 Survivalist Features, you may choose a fourth terrain. The terrains are","value":"Grassland, Forest, Wetlands, Ocean, Tundra, Mountain, Cave, Urban, Desert"}],"description":",","footer":{"text":"Core: p.149"}}

Egg Moves tutored this way do not count against the limit of 3 for TM and Tutor Moves.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.146"}}

Pact Gift - Blue Flare.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Blue Flare","description":"You learn the Move Blue Flare.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Reshiram and Shared Tao Trio Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.67"}}

Major Gift - Shatter Memory.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Shatter Memory","description":"Target: Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer within 8 meters","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Choose an effect: The Target has one Ability disabled at random or two Moves disabled at random for the remainder of the Encounter. Re-Balancing.embed: {"title":"Re-Balancing","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Pokemon Caretaking Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Pusher, Master Pokemon Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pok\u00e9mon with 2 Tutor Points"}],"description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points, and gains one of the following: +1 to all Base Stats, +2 to two different Base Stats, or +3 to a single Base Stat. The target then redistributes their Stat Points. A Pok\u00e9mon may be targeted by Re-Balancing only once.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.147"}}

This One's Special, I Know It.embed: {"title":"This One's Special, I Know It","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Pokemon Caretaking Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Pusher"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Special \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A hatching egg."}],"description":"The Pok\u00e9mon is born with special qualities, determined by the GM.
