Hunter's Reflexes.embed: {"title":"Hunter's Reflexes","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Hunter, Adept Stealth or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You and your Pok\u00e9mon may make up to three Attacks of Opportunity each round, instead of only one. Additionally, your attacks always consider you to be adjacent to your target for the purposes of benefiting from your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Teamwork Ability, and count as Melee attacks for the purposes of triggering their Pack Hunt Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.159"}}

Traceur.embed: {"title":"Traceur - Urban Terrain","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"The city is your jungle. You gain a +1 Bonus to your Jump Capabilities. Add half your Survival Rank to your Evasion against Push, Trip, and Attack of Opportunity Maneuvers.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.151"}}

Athlete.embed: {"title":"Athlete","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Athletics, One of Athletic Prowess, Mounted Prowess, Power Boost, Stamina, or Swimmer"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"}],"description":"After an hour of exercise, an Athlete may choose two different Stats besides HP; both of those stats become Trained Stats. The default State of Trained Stats is +1 Combat Stages instead of 0. An Athlete may have two Trained Stats at a time.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.155"}}

Major Gift - Barrier.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Barrier","description":"You learn the Move Barrier.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Motherly Compassion"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

Dune Walker.embed: {"title":"Dune Walker - Desert Terrain","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Your long hours in the unforgiving desert have made you inured to sand and heat. You\u2019re immune to the effects of Sandstorm, Sand-Attack, and Sand Tomb, and you gain 5 Damage Reduction against Fire-Type attacks.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.151"}}

Cave Dweller.embed: {"title":"Cave Dweller - Cave Terrain","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Your eyes are used to very low levels of light. You do not suffer Blindness for being in Low-Light conditions. If you would be Totally Blinded by complete darkness, you instead suffer the penalties of Blindness, and may make Survival Checks instead of Acrobatics to avoid becoming Tripped. You are immune to Stealth Rock Hazards.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.151"}}

Surefooted.embed: {"title":"Surefooted - Mountain Terrain","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You\u2019re not afraid of precarious ledges and steep hills. You gain a +2 Bonus to Skill Checks made to climb, balance, or maintain footing \u2013 including resisting Push and Trip maneuvers. Whenever you take falling damage, ignore one meter and receive one less Injury when determining damage.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.151"}}

Arctic Pilgrim.embed: {"title":"Arctic Pilgrim - Tundra Terrain","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Neither deep slow nor slippery ice can deter you. You are immune to the effects of Hail and to the Frozen condition, and gain 5 Damage Reduction against Ice-Type attacks.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.151"}}

Deep Diver.embed: {"title":"Deep Diver - Ocean Terrain","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You love nothing better than the smell of the sea. Your Swimming Capability is equal to your Overland Capability instead of half. Additionally, you may hold your breath underwater for a number of minutes equal to your Survival Rank before you start suffocating.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.151"}}

Major Gift - White Yang.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - White Yang","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"All allies within 5 meters may choose to increase all movement speeds by 2, raise their Attack and Special Attack Stats by 1 Combat Stage, and decrease their Accuracy by 2 for the next three rounds."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Hero of Truth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.67"}}

Terrain Talent.embed: {"title":"Terrain Talent","description":"You gain two Terrain Talents, chosen from the Terrains for which you gained Naturewalk from Survivalist.\u00bb\u00bb Grassland: Plains Runner\u00bb\u00bb Forest: Forest Ranger\u00bb\u00bb Wetlands: Marsh Stomper\u00bb\u00bb Ocean: Deep Diver\u00bb\u00bb Tundra: Arctic Pilgrim\u00bb\u00bb Mountain: Surefooted\u00bb\u00bb Cave: Cave Dweller\u00bb\u00bb Urban: Traceur\u00bb\u00bb Desert: Dune Walker","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Survivalist, 2 Mastered Terrains"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":"Survivalist, Master Survival, 4 Mastered Terrains"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.150"}}

Pact Gift - V-Create.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - V-Create","description":"You learn the Move V-Create.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Victini Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.66"}}

Major Gift - The Empty Tao.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - The Empty Tao","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"For the next three rounds, all Pok\u00e9mon and Trainers within 5 meters of you have all Combat Stages locked to zero."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Hero of Balance"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.67"}}

Marsh Stomper.embed: {"title":"Marsh Stomper - Wetland Terrain","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You can handle the toxic fauna and flora of the marshes. You do not lose Hit Points from Poison and lose only 1 instead of 2 Combat Stages from Poison. You still count as Poisoned for the purpose of Moves and effects.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.151"}}

Pact Gift - Hyper Beam.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Hyper Beam","description":"You learn the Move Hyper Beam.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Rayquaza Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Major Gift - Mind Lock.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Mind Lock","description":"You gain the Mind Lock Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Alien Countenance"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.69"}}

Hunter.embed: {"title":"Hunter","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Survival, Novice Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose Teamwork or Pack Hunt. You gain the Chosen Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.159"}}

Choreographer.embed: {"title":"Choreographer","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Dance Form; Adept Acrobatics, Athletics, or Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points"}],"description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Point and learns a Dance Move created by yourself. Choreographer may target a Pok\u00e9mon multiple times.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.157"}}

Adrenaline Rush.embed: {"title":"Adrenaline Rush","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Athlete, Expert Athletics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You are lowered to half or your Maximum Hit Points or less"}],"description":"You gain +1 Combat Stage in each of your Trained Stats, are cured of up to two Status Afflictions, and gain a Tick of Temporary Hit Points. Adrenaline Rush may be used only once per Scene","footer":{"text":"Core: p.155"}}

Dancer.embed: {"title":"Dancer","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Acrobatics; Novice Athletics or Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose Spinning Dance or Own Tempo. You gain the chosen Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.157"}}

Beguiling Dance.embed: {"title":"Beguiling Dance","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Dance Form"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"When creating Dance Moves, you can choose to create a Dance Move that has Range","value":"4, 1 Target, AC 3, and lowers a Combat Stat (chosen at creation) by -2 Combat Stages. This Move is otherwise the same as other Dance Moves you could create except that Dance Moves created with this template have the Contest Effect Excitement instead of Get Ready!."}],"description":",","footer":{"text":"Core: p.157"}}

Pack Tactics.embed: {"title":"Pack Tactics","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Hunter"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will - Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points"}],"description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points and gains the Pack Hunt or Teamwork Ability. You may only target a Pok\u00e9mon with Pack Tactics only once.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.159"}}

Power Pirouette.embed: {"title":"Power Pirouette","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Dance Form; Expert Acrobatics, Athletics, or Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You perform a Dance Move"}],"description":"Choose one effect: \u00bb\u00bb All adjacent targets are Confused. \u00bb\u00bb You gain +1 Combat Stage to a Stat of your choice not raised by the triggering Move. \u00bb\u00bb Destroy all Hazards within 5 meters, and remove Leech Seed, Trapped, and Stuck from yourself.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.157"}}

Dance Practice.embed: {"title":"Dance Practice","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Dancer"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points"}],"description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points and gains your choice of Spinning Dance or Own Tempo. Dance Practice may target a Pok\u00e9mon only once.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.157"}}

Athletic Moves.embed: {"title":"Athletic Moves","description":"You learn two Athlete Moves marked with the Rank of this Feature you are taking or lower.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 3]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Athlete"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":"Expert Athletics"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":"Master Athletics"},{"name":"Rank 1 Moves","value":"Bind, Block, Slam, Strength"},{"name":"Rank 2 Moves","value":"Body Slam, Take Down, Extreme Speed"},{"name":"Rank 3 Moves","value":"Mega Kick, Facade, Retaliate"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.155"}}

Coaching.embed: {"title":"Coaching","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Training Regime"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon makes a Combat Maneuver"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains a bonus based on the type of Combat maneuver they are making. This Feature may be triggered once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon. \u00bb\u00bb Your Pok\u00e9mon gains a +1d6 bonus to Opposed Acrobatics, Athletics, Combat, or Stealth Skill Checks. \u00bb\u00bb If your Pok\u00e9mon was Sprinting, they double their Movement Capabilities instead of increasing by 50%. \u00bb\u00bb If your Pok\u00e9mon was making an Attack of Opportunity, they automatically hit. \u00bb\u00bb You may also activate this Feature to let them Intercept for any Ally regardless of Loyalty, and they automatically succeed on the Skill Check to do so.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.155"}}

Major Gift - Time Stop.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Time Stop","description":"Take an additional Shift Action and Standard Action.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Realm Portal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Swift Action, Interrupt"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Passing Waltz.embed: {"title":"Passing Waltz","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Dance Practice, Master Acrobatics, Athletics, or Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You or one of your Pok\u00e9mon with Own Tempo or Spinning Dance uses a Dance Move"}],"description":"Choose an ally within 3 meters of the triggering target. That ally gains Combat Stages from the triggering Move instead of the user.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.157"}}

Musical Ability.embed: {"title":"Musical Ability","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Musician"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose Drown Out or Soundproof. You gain the chosen Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.164"}}

Provocateur.embed: {"title":"Provocateur","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"One of Confidence Artist, Intimidating Presence, or Charmer"},{"name":"Frequency","value":","},{"name":"Static Effect","value":"You learn the Moves Sweet Kiss and Taunt."},{"name":"Note","value":"Provocateur Skills are Charm, Guile, and Intimidate."}],"description":",","footer":{"text":"Core: p.166"}}

Martial Artist.embed: {"title":"Martial Artist","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [Special]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Basic Martial Arts, Novice Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Choose one of the following abilities","value":"Guts [+HP], Inner Focus [+Speed], Iron Fist [+Defense], Limber [+Speed], Reckless [+Attack], Technician [+Speed]. You gain the chosen Ability and its associated tag. Whenever you gain any Martial Artist Feature, you also gain the associated tag."}],"description":",","footer":{"text":"Core: p.161"}}

My Kung-Fu is Stronger.embed: {"title":"My Kung-Fu is Stronger","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Special]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Martial Training Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"A foe provokes an Attack of Opportunity"}],"description":"You may use Rock Smash instead of an unarmed Struggle Attack. If you do, Rock Smash\u2019s Effect Range is increased by +2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.162"}}

Voice Lessons.embed: {"title":"Voice Lessons","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Noise Complaint"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You and your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Moves with the Sonic keyword gain the Friendly keyword. Voice Lessons may not affect the Move Perish Song. Additionally, whenever your Pok\u00e9mon use a Move with the Sonic Keyword in a Contest, they may roll +1d6.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.164"}}

Mixed Messages.embed: {"title":"Mixed Messages","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Provocateur, two Provocateur Skills at Adept Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Lovely Kiss and Torment.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.166"}}

Noise Complaint.embed: {"title":"Noise Complaint","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Cacophony, Expert Charm or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Uproar and Hyper Voice.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.164"}}

Power Chord.embed: {"title":"Power Chord","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Noise Complaint, Master Charm or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You play a Song"}],"description":"Make a Charm or Focus Check, and add your Special Attack. Foes in the area of effect take Special Normal-Type Damage equal to the result.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.164"}}

Push Buttons.embed: {"title":"Push Buttons","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Provocateur"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Your Social Moves\u2019 Frequency is not Expended if they miss. You gain the Demoralize Edge, even if you do not meet the prerequisites. Its effects for Status Moves now trigger on 18+, and Social Moves that activate this \u201cCrit\u201d Range cause their targets to lose a tick of Hit Points. If you already have Demoralize, you may gain another Edge for which you meet the prerequisites.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.166"}}

Second Strike.embed: {"title":"Second Strike","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Special]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Martial Training Rank 1, Expert Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You attempt to use a Grapple, Push, Trip, or Disarm Combat Maneuver but fail the Opposed Roll"}],"description":"You may immediately use Rock Smash or a Struggle Attack against your target as a Free Action.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.162"}}

Expend Momentum.embed: {"title":"Expend Momentum","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Duelist"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon under the effects of Focused Training"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Spend 1 Momentum","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon regains use of a EOT Frequency Move."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Spend 2 Momentum","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon automatically rolls an 11 on one d20 Roll of your choice on their next turn."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Spend 3 Momentum","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon regains a use of Scene Frequency Move. May be chosen only once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon."}],"description":"Apply one of the following effects on the target by spending that much Momentum.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.96"}}

Cacophony.embed: {"title":"Cacophony","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mt. Moon Blues, Adept Charm or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Screech and Metal Sound.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.164"}}

Quick Wit.embed: {"title":"Quick Wit","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Provocateur, a Provocateur Skill at Adept Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x3 \u2013 Swift Action"}],"description":"You may make a Manipulate Maneuver or use a Social Move you know, Frequency allowing.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.166"}}

Mt. Moon Blues.embed: {"title":"Mt. Moon Blues","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Musician"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Sing and Supersonic","footer":{"text":"Core: p.164"}}

Rogue.embed: {"title":"Rogue","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Two of Acrobatics, Athletics, or Stealth at Novice Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Note","value":"Rogue Skills are Acrobatics, Athletics, and Stealth."}],"description":"You learn the Moves Feint Attack and Thief.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.169"}}

Underhanded Tactics.embed: {"title":"Underhanded Tactics","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Rogue, a Rogue Skill at Expert Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain your choice of Ambush or Cruelty.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.169"}}

Roughneck.embed: {"title":"Roughneck","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Athletics, Intimidating Presence"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit a foe with an Attack"}],"description":"The foe loses a Combat Stage in the Stat of your choice.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.171"}}

Enchanting Gaze.embed: {"title":"Enchanting Gaze","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Quick Wit, two Provocateur Skills at Expert Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"}],"description":"Choose a Manipulate Maneuver effect; apply that Effect to all foes in a Cone 2. This ignores Frequency Limitations with that Maneuver and automatically succeeds against all targets without an opposed roll.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.167"}}

Street Fighter.embed: {"title":"Street Fighter","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Unexpected Attacks, two Rogue Skills at Expert Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Assurance and Payback.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.169"}}

Cutthroat.embed: {"title":"Cutthroat","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack] [Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Rogue"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You may use Rogue Moves as Weapon Moves when wielding Small Melee Weapons or Short Ranged Weapons. If you do, Rogue Moves instead have the same Range as your Weapon. Additionally, you may qualify for Weapon Moves for Small Melee or Short Ranged Weapons and resist Disarm Maneuvers when wielding such Weapons using any Rogue Skill.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.169"}}

Malice.embed: {"title":"Malice","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Roughneck, Adept Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Mean Look and Chip Away.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.171"}}

Scoundrel's Strike.embed: {"title":"Scoundrel's Strike","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Underhanded Tactics, Street Fighter"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit with a Rogue Move"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Ambush","value":"For 1 Full Round, the target is Slowed, cannot make Attacks of Opportunity, and takes a -2 penalty to all rolls."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Cruelty","value":"For 1 Full Round, the target loses 5 Hit Points upon being hit by any damaging attack."}],"description":"The target loses Hit Points equal to your highest Rogue Skill Rank doubled, and an additional effect based on whether you have the Ambush or Cruelty Ability. You may use Scoundrel\u2019s Strike only once per Scene per target.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.169"}}

Mettle.embed: {"title":"Mettle","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Roughneck"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"You take Massive Damage or Intercept a Damaging Attack."}],"description":"Resolve Damage as if the triggering attack was resisted one step. The triggering foe then loses 2 Combat Stages in the Attack Stat used by the triggering Attack.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.171"}}

Unexpected Attacks.embed: {"title":"Unexpected Attacks","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Rogue, two Rogue Skills at Adept Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Pursuit and Sucker Punch.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.169"}}

Dirty Fighting.embed: {"title":"Dirty Fighting","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Rogue, a Rogue Skill at Adept Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit a foe with Weapon Attack"}],"description":"After the attack is Resolved, you may immediately use the Dirty Trick Maneuver if the target is within range. You automatically hit with Dirty Trick, but must still make an Opposed Roll.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.169"}}

Menace.embed: {"title":"Menace","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Roughneck"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit a foe with the Terrorize Manipulation"}],"description":"Until their next turn, the target has their Initiative lowered to 0. For one full round, attacks against them cause them to Flinch on 17+ or have their existing Flinch Range increased by +4.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.77"}}

Soft Landing.embed: {"title":"Soft Landing - Reckless Ability","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP - Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You take fall damage, or miss with Jump Kick or High Jump Kick"}],"description":"undefined  When taking fall damage, calculate the result as if you had fallen X meters less, where X is half your Combat Rank. If you miss with Jump Kick or High Jump Kick, you lose no Hit Points as a result.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.162"}}

Quick Switch.embed: {"title":"Quick Switch","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Acrobatics or Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon Faints; or an opponent sends out a Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"You may return and send out a Pok\u00e9mon as a Free Action. You may perform this Feature on your turn without a Trigger. Pok\u00e9mon sent out by Quick Switch cannot trigger another trainer\u2019s Quick Switch. When you swap Pok\u00e9mon using Quick Switch, you do not lose a Pok\u00e9mon turn.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.59"}}

Quick Reflexes.embed: {"title":"Quick Reflexes","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Tumbler, Expert Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Dodge Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.173"}}

Whirlwind Strikes.embed: {"title":"Whirlwind Strikes - Technician Ability","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP - Full Action"}],"description":"undefined You may use Rock Smash, targeting against any number of adjacent foes. You do not count as Flanked for one full round.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.162"}}

Pummeling Momentum.embed: {"title":"Pummeling Momentum - Iron Fist Ability","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP - Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit a foe with a Move affected by Iron Fist"}],"description":"undefined  You Tag the triggering foe and gain a +1 bonus to your Accuracy Rolls and Evasion against that foe. Each subsequent time that you hit the Tagged foe with a Move affected by Iron Fist, this bonus increases by +1, to a maximum of your Combat Rank. If you ever spend a turn without successfully hitting your Tagged foe, the foe loses their Tag and the bonus is lost.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.162"}}

Aerialist.embed: {"title":"Aerialist","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Tumbler"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Aerial Ace and Splash.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.173"}}

Bend Like the Willow.embed: {"title":"Bend Like the Willow - Limber Ability","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP - Free Action, Interrupt"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"An adjacent foe initiates a Disarm, Grapple, Push, or Trip Maneuver against you, and either misses or fails the Opposed Check."}],"description":"undefined  You may attempt the same Combat Maneuver against the triggering foe as a Free Action.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.162"}}

Aura Reader (Feature).embed: {"title":"Aura Reader","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Aura Guardian"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Swift Action"}],"description":"You gain the Aura Reader Capability for the rest of the scene. If your Intuition is Adept Rank or higher, you also gain the Aura Pulse Capability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.177"}}

Tough as Nails.embed: {"title":"Tough as Nails","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"3 Roughneck Features, Master Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Endure and Slack Off.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.171"}}

Tumbler.embed: {"title":"Tumbler","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Acrobat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Run Away Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.173"}}

Aura Guardian.embed: {"title":"Aura Guardian","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Fighting)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose two of Detect, Vacuum Wave, or Force Palm. You learn the chosen Moves.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.177"}}

Death From Above.embed: {"title":"Death From Above","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Aerialist, Expert Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Acrobatics and Bounce.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.173"}}

Quick Gymnastics.embed: {"title":"Quick Gymnastics","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Tumbler"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit with an Attack; you make a Jump; or you stand up from being Tripped"}],"description":"You may may Shift 2 Meters. You don\u2019t count as Flanked or trigger Attacks of Opportunity until the end of your next turn. Additionally, if you activate this Feature, the triggering action does not provoke Attacks of Opportunity.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.173"}}

Heightened Intensity.embed: {"title":"Heightened Intensity - Inner Focus Ability","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP - Shift Action"}],"description":"undefined You may use Focus Energy as a Free Action.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.162"}}

Strange Energy.embed: {"title":"Strange Energy","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Warping Ground, Space Distortion"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Heal Block and Magic Coat.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.195"}}

Cruel Gaze.embed: {"title":"Cruel Gaze","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Roughneck, Expert Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Glare and Headbutt.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.171"}}

Wrestlemania.embed: {"title":"Wrestlemania - Guts Ability","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP - Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You begin your turn with Dominance in a Grapple"}],"description":"undefined  This turn, you may perform two different Grappling Effects as a Full Action instead of just one.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.162"}}

Hex Maniac.embed: {"title":"Hex Maniac","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose Cursed Body or Omen. You gain the Chosen Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.182"}}

Power Conduit.embed: {"title":"Power Conduit","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Channeler, Adept Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Channeled Pok\u00e9mon "},{"name":"Choose One Effect","value":","}],"description":"\u00bb\u00bb Trade all Combat Stages for a single Stat between two Channeled Pok\u00e9mon \u00bb\u00bb Transfer a Coat from one Channeled Pok\u00e9mon to another. \u00bb\u00bb Give up a use of Scene or Daily Move from one willing Channeled Pok\u00e9mon to regain use of a Scene Move which another Channeled Pok\u00e9mon has used. This effect may only refresh a Move for each Pok\u00e9mon once per Scene.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.180"}}

Diffuse Pain.embed: {"title":"Diffuse Pain","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Hex Maniac Studies Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use a Status-Class Move gained from Hex Maniac Studies"}],"description":"Choose an additional target for the Move.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.182"}}

Malediction.embed: {"title":"Malediction","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Hex Maniac Studies Rank 1, Expert Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action "},{"name":"Trigger","value":"A foe within 5 meters misses all targets with an attack"}],"description":"Use a Status-Class Move gained from Hex Maniac Studies targeting the triggering foe as a Free Action, Frequency-permitting.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.182"}}

Grand Hex.embed: {"title":"Grand Hex","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Hex Maniac Studies Rank 3, Master Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit a foe with Hex"}],"description":"Regain one use of a Move gained from Hex Maniac Studies that can inflict a Status Affliction that the triggering target has. If you activated the conditional damage boost for Hex, its Frequency is not expended. You may only activate Grand Hex once per target per Scene.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.182"}}

Pain Dampening.embed: {"title":"Pain Dampening","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Channeler, Expert Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"A Channeled Pok\u00e9mon would be Fainted by a damaging attack"}],"description":"Choose any number of Channeled Pok\u00e9mon, which must include the triggering Pok\u00e9mon. Instead\\ of resolving the attack normally, divide the damage from the attack by the number of chosen Pok\u00e9mon. Each chosen Pok\u00e9mon then loses that many Hit Points. For each chosen Pok\u00e9mon that Resists or is Immune to the Type of the triggering attack, subtract your Intuition Rank from the damage of the attack before all calculations.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.180"}}

Hex Maniac Studies.embed: {"title":"Hex Maniac Studies","description":"Learn two Hex Maniac Moves. You may choose any Move marked with the Hex Maniac Studies Rank you are taking or lower. Use Curse as if you were a Ghost-type Pokemon.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 3][+HP]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Hex Maniac"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":"Hex Maniac"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":"Hex Maniac, Expert Occult Education"},{"name":"Rank 1 Moves","value":"Confuse Ray, Curse, Hypnosis, Spite, Will-O-Wisp"},{"name":"Rank 3 Move","value":"Hex"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.182"}}

Battle Synchronization.embed: {"title":"Battle Synchronization","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Channeler"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x3 \u2013 Standard Action"}],"description":"For one full round, whenever a Channeled Pok\u00e9mon successfully hits a foe, all Channeled Pok\u00e9mon gain +1 Accuracy and +1 Evasion against that foe for the duration of this Feature.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.179"}}

Shared Senses.embed: {"title":"Shared Senses","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Channeler"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 1 AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Channeled Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"You Imprint the target for the duration of this Feature. You receive all sensory information being sensed by Imprinted Pok\u00e9mon, and Imprinted Pok\u00e9mon are not subject to the distance limit on Channeling. If you have Imprinted more than one Pok\u00e9mon, you may only concentrate on the senses of one Pok\u00e9mon at a time, and only choose one such Pok\u00e9mon per round. If you stop Channeling a Pok\u00e9mon, they are no longer Imprinted as well.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.179"}}

Soothing Connection.embed: {"title":"Soothing Connection","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Pain Dampening, Master Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2 \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Channeled Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"Distribute 5 points in any way among Pok\u00e9mon you are Channeling. For each point you assign to a Channeled Pok\u00e9mon, they gain a Tick of Hit Points.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.180"}}

Ninja's Arsenal.embed: {"title":"Ninja's Arsenal","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ninja"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"}],"description":"You may craft an Antidote, Smoke Ball, Caltrops, or Toxic Caltrops for $100.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.184"}}

Ninja.embed: {"title":"Ninja","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Stealth, Novice Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Double Team and Poison Powder.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.184"}}

Kinjutsu.embed: {"title":"Kinjutsu","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Poison Weapons, Master Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Substitute and Toxic.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.184"}}

Divination.embed: {"title":"Divination","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Oracle"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Extended Action "}],"description":"You may perform an Augury or Scrying.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.186"}}

Tag In.embed: {"title":"Tag In","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Round Trip, Expert Acrobatics or Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You recall a Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"The next Pok\u00e9mon you send out is treated as if the recalled Pok\u00e9mon had used Baton Pass on it.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.101"}}

First Blood.embed: {"title":"First Blood","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Tag In, Master Acrobatics or Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You release a Pok\u00e9mon from its Pok\u00e9 Ball"}],"description":"If you have a Pok\u00e9mon turn available this round or next, your Pok\u00e9mon may use a Move as an Interrupt as soon as it is sent out. This consumes your Pok\u00e9mon turn for the round (or the following round) as normal.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.101"}}

Lay on Hands.embed: {"title":"Lay on Hands","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Sage, Expert Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose Blessed Touch or Healer. You gain the Chosen Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.189"}}

Oracle.embed: {"title":"Oracle","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mystic Senses, Novice Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Pickup Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.186"}}

Prescience.embed: {"title":"Prescience","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Unveiled Sight, Master Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Free Action "},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You are hit by an attack"}],"description":"The attack instead misses.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.186"}}

Highly Responsive to Prayers.embed: {"title":"Highly Responsive to Prayers","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Lay on Hands"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use the Blessed Touch or Healer Ability on an ally, or an ally receives an Injury"}],"description":"You may use the Sage Feature as a Free Action targeting the triggering ally. Multiple instances of Sage\u2019s effect that you use may stack when used this way.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.189"}}

Sage.embed: {"title":"Sage","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"An ally within 5 meters"}],"description":"The target gains Damage Reduction equal to your Occult Education Rank doubled or their Tick Value, whichever is higher, for one full round.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.189"}}

Sacred Shield.embed: {"title":"Sacred Shield","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Sage"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Reflect and Lucky Chant.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.189"}}

Haunting Curse.embed: {"title":"Haunting Curse","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ghost Step, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb 1 Curse Token","value":"The target loses a Combat Stage of your choice."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb 2 Curse Tokens","value":"The target becomes Cursed."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb 3 Curse Tokens","value":"The target becomes Suppressed."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb 4 Curse Tokens","value":"The target falls Asleep and gains Bad Sleep."}],"description":"While this Feature is bound, the target gains a Curse Token each time they use a Ghost-Type Move or Ghost Step. Ghost-Type Moves with a Set-Up and Resolution Phase give a Curse Token for each Phase. As a Standard Action during their turn, or as Free Action upon Fainting, the target may spend their Curse Tokens to apply conditions to a foe within 6 meters.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.124"}}

Weightless Step.embed: {"title":"Weightless Step","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ninja, Expert Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Infiltrator Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.184"}}

Mystic Defense.embed: {"title":"Mystic Defense","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Sage"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Light Screen and Safeguard.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.189"}}

Unveiled Sight.embed: {"title":"Unveiled Sight","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Oracle"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You can see through Illusions. This means you can spot Illusions from the Illusionist capability, Illusion Ability, and Genjutsu Feature as being fake. You are immune to Moves with the Illusion keyword, Double Team cannot be activated against you, and you bypass Substitutes. As a Standard Action, you can create a Burst 4, dispelling all Illusion effects within.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.186"}}

Small Prophecies.embed: {"title":"Small Prophecies","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Divination, Adept Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Swift Action"}],"description":"Roll 1d20 and note the result. Until the end of your next turn, you may choose to replace a single d20 roll you or a willing ally makes with the noted result.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.186"}}

Telepathic Warning.embed: {"title":"Telepathic Warning","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Telepathic Awareness, Expert Focus or Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You or an Ally use an Attack "}],"description":"You\u2019re able to give your allies heed of attacks. All allies that would be hit by the attack may take a Shift Action as an Interrupt to move out of the area of effect of the attack. Using this leaves discoverable Psychic Residue on each affected ally. You may only use Telepathic Warning as long as you have the Telepath Capability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.193"}}

Telekinetic Burst.embed: {"title":"Telekinetic Burst","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"PK Omega, Master Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Swift Action"}],"description":"You perform a Disarm, Trip, or Push Maneuver using your Telekinetic Capability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.191"}}

Warper.embed: {"title":"Warper","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Psychic), Novice Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Probability Control Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.195"}}

PK Alpha.embed: {"title":"PK Alpha","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Telekinetic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Kinesis and Barrier.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.191"}}

Power of the Mind.embed: {"title":"Power of the Mind","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Telekinetic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose Interference or Levitate. You gain the chosen Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.191"}}

Thought Detection.embed: {"title":"Thought Detection","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Telepathic Awareness"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Standard Action"}],"description":"You become aware of the number of living Humans or Pok\u00e9mon within X meters of yourself; X is equal to your Focus Rank tripled. Pok\u00e9mon or Trainers with the Mindlock Capability are not detected by this Ability. You may only use Thought Detection as long as you have the Telepathy Capability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.193"}}

Telepathic Awareness.embed: {"title":"Telepathic Awareness","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Telepath"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose Gentle Vibe or Telepathy. You gain the chosen Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.193"}}

Mental Assault.embed: {"title":"Mental Assault","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Telepath, Expert Focus or Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Extrasensory and Psyshock.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.193"}}

Honed Mind.embed: {"title":"Honed Mind","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Telepath"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Mind Reader and Calm Mind.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.193"}}

Space Distortion.embed: {"title":"Space Distortion","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Warper"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Teleport and Ally Switch.","footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Major Gift - Dead Zone.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Dead Zone","description":"Target: Area","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"For the next ten minutes, all wireless communication within ten meters of you fails to work. Radios stop receiving, WiFi shuts down, and cell signals fail to reach phones."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Intuitive Sabotage"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily\/15 - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.70"}}

Telepath (Feature).embed: {"title":"Telepath","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Psychic), Iron Mind, Novice Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Swift Action"}],"description":"You gain the Telepathy Capability for the rest of the scene.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.193"}}

PK Combat.embed: {"title":"PK Combat","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Telekinetic, Adept Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 1 AP \u2013 Standard Action"}],"description":"You may also wield weapons and items with your Telekinesis capability, as long as you are able to lift them. This means you may use Items and Melee Weapons that normally require you to be adjacent to your target at a range limited only by your Telekinesis. When wielding Weapons with your Telekinesis, you qualify for Moves using Focus instead of Combat and may add your Special Attack instead of your Attack Stat. The Attacks remain Physical, however.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.191"}}

PK Omega.embed: {"title":"PK Omega","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"PK Alpha, Expert Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Telekinesis and Psychic.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.191"}}

Experimental AI.embed: {"title":"Experimental AI","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Engineer Researcher Field]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Engineer, Master Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Increase the maximum complexity of all Pok\u00e9bots you create by 2, and increase the maximum complexity of Pok\u00e9bots you can control by 2. Recipe - Futuretech","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.80"}}

Long Shot.embed: {"title":"Long Shot","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Marksman Orders"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"The target\u2019s damaging ranged attacks have their range doubled until the end of their next turn, and deal X additional damage. X is equal to the distance in meters that the attack traveled. Long Shot does not increase the size of area of effect attacks. If attacks altered by Long Shot are Critical Hits, add the value of the Damage Dice Roll an additional time to the total damage.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.61"}}

Frost Touched.embed: {"title":"Frost Touched","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Ice), Novice Athletics, Novice Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose two out of Haze, Ice Shard, Mist, and Powder Snow. You learn the Chosen Moves.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.83"}}

Tutoring.embed: {"title":"Tutoring","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice General Education, Special (See Effect)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"One Time Use x3 \u2013 Extended Action"}],"description":"When activating this Feature, select a Move known either by yourself or by 3 Pok\u00e9mon you own. This Move is Mastered. As an Extended Action, you may have Pok\u00e9mon spend 2 Tutor Points to learn a Move you have Mastered. Pok\u00e9mon targeted this way can only learn Moves that they could learn by Level Up, TM, Egg Move, or Move Tutor. You may take Tutoring multiple times, each time gaining 3 uses of the Feature.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.59"}}

Command Versatility.embed: {"title":"Command Versatility","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Adept Command, Guile, or Pok\u00e9mon Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon takes its turn."}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may give up use of a Scene or Daily Move to regain use of a Scene or Daily Move which it has already used. Your Pok\u00e9mon may give up use of a Daily Move to regain use of a Scene Move, but not vice-versa. You may use Command Versatility only once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.59"}}

Stat Link.embed: {"title":"Stat Link","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Stat Ace"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"At the end of your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s turn, their Chosen Stat is at its default number of Combat Stages or less"}],"description":"The triggering Pok\u00e9mon gains +1 Combat Stage in your Chosen Stat. (Note: The \u201cDefault\u201d number of Combat Stages is usually 0)","footer":{"text":"Core: p.112"}}

Jailbreaker.embed: {"title":"Jailbreaker","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Jailbreaker Research Field]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Basic Balls"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"}],"description":"You may craft any Pok\u00e9 Ball Case Recipe for which you qualify. Recipe - Basic Cases","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.82"}}

Warped Transmission.embed: {"title":"Warped Transmission","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Farcast, Master Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You activate the Teleporter Capability or use the Move Ally Switch"}],"description":"All adjacent foes to the square you end in after teleporting or using Ally Switch have their Evasion lowered by 3 for one full round and cannot trigger Attacks of Opportunity against you for Shifting until the end of your next turn.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.195"}}

The Cold Never Bothered Me Anyway.embed: {"title":"The Cold Never Bothered Me Anyway","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Frost Touched"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Naturewalk (Tundra) Capability, are immune to being Frozen, and do not lose Hit Points from Hail.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.83"}}

Engineer.embed: {"title":"Engineer","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Engineer Researcher Field]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Pokebot Training"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You may craft any Engineer Recipe for which you qualify. Recipe - Robotics 101","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.80"}}

Robofighter.embed: {"title":"Robofighter","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Engineer Researcher Field]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Engineer, Adept Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"}],"description":"As long as this feature is Bound, you can command your Pok\u00e9bot using a Standard Action rather than a Pok\u00e9mon turn. Your Pok\u00e9bots may still only act once a round. Recipe - Firmware Update","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.80"}}

Overclock.embed: {"title":"Overclock","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Engineer Researcher Field]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Engineer, Expert Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9bot"}],"description":"The target is cured of all Persistent Statuses, resets all negative Combat Stages to default, and gains two Ticks of Temporary Hit Points. For the rest of the Scene, it deals and takes additional damage with all attacks equal to your Technology Education Rank. Recipe - Kitbash King","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.80"}}

Nuanced Performance.embed: {"title":"Nuanced Performance","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Coordinator, Expert Charm, Command, Guile, Intimidate, or Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon miss all targets with a Move"}],"description":"That Move\u2019s Frequency is not expended. This does not work with Moves that may fail to activate, such as moves with the Execute keyword.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.83"}}

Moment of Action.embed: {"title":"Moment of Action","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Cheer Brigade, Adept Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Up to two Allied Trainers"}],"description":"Each target gains 1 Temporary Action Point. These Action Points disappear after one full Round.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.93"}}

Pact Gift - Bolt Strike.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Bolt Strike","description":"You learn the Move Bolt Strike.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Zekrom and Shared Tao Trio Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.67"}}

Capture Specialist.embed: {"title":"Capture Specialist","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Acrobatics, Athletics, Stealth, or Survival at Novice; Guile, or Perception at Novice"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Capture Techniques","value":"Capture Skills, Curve Ball, Devitalizing Throw, Fast Pitch, Snare, Tools of the Trade, Catch Combo, False Strike, Relentless Pursuit"}],"description":"You gain two Capture Techniques of your choice. You must meet any prerequisites of the Technique.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.78"}}

Major Gift - Animate.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Animate","description":"Target: Materials","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Create a small golem out of the inanimate material of your choice. The material used will determine the Type of the golem. Scrap metal may create a Steel type, lava a Fire type, and granite a Rock type, for example. Distribute a number of Stat Points to the golem equal to your Trainer Level. The golem is small size, weight class 1, and has Overland 4, Jump 0\/0, and Power 2. It can make Struggle Attacks of its Type. The golem must be verbally commanded by you to act. It cannot regain HP and is destroyed upon Fainting. At the end of the day or if you Faint, the golem crumbles and is destroyed."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Primal Craftsmanship"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.66"}}

Major Gift - Sacred Sword.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Sacred Sword","description":"You learn the Move Sacred Sword.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Spirit of Justice"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.61"}}

Major Gift - Levitate.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Levitate","description":"You gain the Levitate Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Cloud Reading"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.61"}}

Go, Fight, Win!.embed: {"title":"Go, Fight, Win!","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Moment of Action, Expert Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Standard Action + Swift Action"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Show Your Best!","value":"Choose Defense or Special Defense. All allies on the field gain +1 Combat Stage in the Chosen Stat and become Motivated. "},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Don\u2019t Stop Now!","value":"All allies on the field gain Temporary Hit Points equal to your Charm Rank and become Excited. "},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb I Believe In You!","value":"All allies on the field gain a +2 bonus to Evasion for one full Round, and become Cheered."}],"description":"Choose and perform one of the cheers below. Reliable Performance.embed: {"title":"Reliable Performance","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Nuanced Performance, Master Charm, Command, Guile, Intimidate, or Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon makes an Appeal Roll, Accuracy Check, or Skill Check"}],"description":"For appeal rolls, instead of making the Appeal Roll, you gain 1 Appeal Point for each Dice you would have rolled. For Accuracy Checks, act as if you had rolled a 10. For Skill Checks, multiply 3.5 by your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Skill Rank, and use the resulting number as the result of your roll, rounded down. For all rolls, add or subtract any modifiers as normal.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.83"}}

Major Gift - Searing Blade.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Searing Blade","description":"Your next Struggle Attack with an equipped weapon deals +2 Damage Steps and deals Fire Type damage.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Chosen of Victory"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP - Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.66"}}

Advanced Capture Techniques.embed: {"title":"Advanced Capture Techniques","description":"You gain two Capture Techniques of your choice. You must meet any prerequisites of the Technique. Stat Training.embed: {"title":"Stat Training","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Stat Ace"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 1 Tutor Point"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Attack","value":"Swords Dance or Rage"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Defense","value":"Iron Defense or Reflect"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Special Attack","value":"Nasty Plot or Hidden Power"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Special Defense","value":"Amnesia or Light Screen"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Speed","value":"Agility or After You"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon loses 1 Tutor Point, and learns a Move based on your Chosen Stat, even if your Pok\u00e9mon cannot normally learn this Move:","footer":{"text":"Core: p.112"}}

Seed Bag.embed: {"title":"Seed Bag","description":"You become adept at harvesting Seeds and Spores from Pok\u00e9mon. Depending on the Rank of Seed Bag you have, you may target a willing Grass-Type Pok\u00e9mon that knows one of the moves listed below. Add this following moves to your Move list for the remainder of the day. You may not use Seed Bag to have multiple instances of the same move in your Move list. Seed Bag may be used twice per day per Rank.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"X Daily \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Green Thumb, Adept General Education or Survival"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":"Master General Education or Survival"},{"name":"Rank 1 Moves","value":"Sleep Powder, Stun Spore, or Poison Powder"},{"name":"Rank 2 Moves","value":"All Rank 1 Moves, along with Cotton Spore, Leech Seed, Spore, or Worry Seed"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Willing Pok\u00e9mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.143"}}

Major Gift - Primal Craftsmanship.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Primal Craftsmanship","description":"You pay 20% less when crafting items.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Hands of the Creator"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.66"}}

Sage's Benediction.embed:
{"title":"Sage's Benediction","description":"The triggering ally gains an additional benefit as follows, depending on the Move used. The benefit takes effect after the Blessing and the attack that triggered it are resolved.
» Reflect

» Safeguard

Accentuated Taste.embed: {"title":"Accentuated Taste","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Chef, Adept Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Whenever you create a Snack with a Chef Feature, you may assign it a Taste chosen from Salty, Sour, Spicy, Dry, and Sweet. Tasty Snacks must be assigned their corresponding Taste. Whenever a Pok\u00e9mon trades in a Digestion\/Food Buff from a Snack with an assigned Taste they do not dislike, they gain one of the following bonuses based on the assigned Taste","value":","},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Salty","value":"The user gains 5 Temporary Hit Points. This stacks with any Temporary Hit Points gained through Chef Features, the Lunchbox Ability, and the Digestion\/Food Buff."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Spicy","value":"Increase the user\u2019s Critical Hit Range by 1."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Sour","value":"Increase the user\u2019s Evasion against damaging attacks by 1."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Dry","value":"Increase the user\u2019s Effect Range of all attacks by 1."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Bitter","value":"The user gets a +1 Bonus to all Save Checks."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Sweet","value":"Increase the user\u2019s Initiative by 5."},{"name":"May Playtest Errata","value":"This bonus can only be gained once per item, even if Complex Aftertaste is used to give an additional Digestion\/Food Buff for the item."}],"description":"Recipe - Preserves","footer":{"text":"Core: p.131"}}

Major Gift - Water Absorb.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Water Absorb","description":"You gain the Water Absorb Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Elemental Soul"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.58"}}

Taskmaster.embed:
{"title":"Taskmaster","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Brutal Training, Novice Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will – Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You apply Brutal Training as a Training action"},{"name":"Mechanic – Hardened","value":"Hardened Pokemon receive the following benefits:
» They do not lose Hit Points from acting while Heavily Injured
» Injuries beyond the 5th do not lower their Maximum Hit Points
» If they have 1 or more injuries, they gain +1 to Critical Hit and Effect Range.
» If they have 3 or more injuries, they gain +1 Evasion and +5 to Initiative.
» If they have 5 or more injuries, they gain +5 Damage Reduction.
» If they have 7 or more injuries, they are immune to Loss of Hit Points (but not damage) from all effects.
» If they have 9 or more injuries, they resist all damage one step further."}],"description":"You may grant your Pokémon up to three injuries. If your Pokémon has at least one Injury, it becomes Hardened.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.105"}}

Type Ace.embed:
{"title":"Type Ace","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"2 Different Pokémon of the chosen Type, Type-Linked Skill at Novice
OR
Elemental Connection (of the chosen Type), 1 Pokémon of the chosen Type, Type-Linked Skill at Novice
See the attached image for details on the Type-Linked Skills."},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will – Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pokémon with at least 2 Tutor Points remaining."}],"description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points and learns the Last Chance or Type Strategist Ability for your Chosen Type. You may target a Pokémon only once with Type Ace.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.119"},"image":"https://imgur.com/7c6Egad.png"}

Sunlight Within.embed: {"title":"Sunlight Within","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Foiling Foliage, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"While this Stratagem is bound, your Pok\u00e9mon may activate Moves and Abilities as if they were in Sunny Weather.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.124"}}

Endurance.embed: {"title":"Endurance","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Tough Tumble Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily\/10 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon takes falling damage, begins to suffocate, or is Heavily Injured:  "}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon can ignore up to X meters of falling when calculating falling damage, act without beginning to suffocate for X additional rounds, or ignore the Hit Point loss effects from acting while Heavily Injured for X rounds. X is equal to half its number of Tough Dice from Poffins.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.117"}}

Cool Conduct.embed: {"title":"Cool Conduct","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 3d6 in their Cool Stat from Poffins may activate Cool Conduct as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves. X is the Rank of the chosen Move.\nRank 1: Focus Energy, Noble Roar\nRank 2: Roar, Double Team","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"X AP \u2013 Special"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Style Expert, Cool as Chosen Stat, Novice Command"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":"Expert Command"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.116"}}

Tyrant's Roar.embed: {"title":"Tyrant\u2019s Roar","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Dragon as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits with a Dragon-Type Move"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon creates a Burst 2, Slowing all Foes in the area and causing those foes to lose 1 Combat Stage in any Stat in which they have positive Combat Stages.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.121"}}

Trail Blazer.embed: {"title":"Trail Blazer","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Brightest Flame, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Fire-Type Pok\u00e9mon Shifts"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon sets the ground aflame and leaves a Fire Hazard in each square it shifts through this round, up to a maximum of 8 squares. Anyone who begins or ends their turn on a Fire Hazard are Burned. Anyone that passes through a Fire Hazard loses a Tick of Hit Points. If a Ground, Rock, or Water-Type Move targets a square (or a target in a square) with Fire Hazard in them, the Fire Hazards are destroyed. All effects that destroy Hazards extinguish Fire Hazards. Trail Blazer may only be used once per Scene.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.123"}}

Calculated Assault.embed: {"title":"Calculated Assault","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Smart Scheme Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Smart-Type Move"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Treat the Move as if it were one step more aligned with the Contest Type. If the Move would be opposing the Contest Type, it is instead neutral. If it is neutral, it is instead matching. You may activate this effect only once per Contest."},{"name":"Battle Effect","value":"Choose one: The triggering Pok\u00e9mon gains a +1 bonus on its Accuracy Roll for each ally that hit a target of its Move this round, or all allies get a +1 bonus to their Accuracy Rolls against targets of the triggering Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Move until the end of your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s next turn. You may activate Calculated Assault only once per Pok\u00e9mon per Scene."}],"description":",","footer":{"text":"Core: p.117"}}

Brightest Flame.embed: {"title":"Brightest Flame","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Fire as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s damaging Fire-Type Moves Burn their target on a roll of 18+. If a Move already has a chance to Burn a target, this Effect Range is instead increased by +3. Additionally, your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s damaging Fire-Type Moves deal additional damage equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank against Burned targets.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.123"}}

Shield Bearer.embed: {"title":"Shield Bearer","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Stalwart Bastion"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Swift Action"}],"description":"You may immediately ready a Shield, and do not become Slowed as a result. You may choose to grant an adjacent Ally the Evasion and Damage Reduction bonuses from your shield instead of gaining them yourself, but these bonuses only apply as long as the ally remains adjacent to you. If you do and the ally Shifts, you may Shift alongside your ally as a Shift Action Interrupt. This cannot cause you to shift more than your normal Movement.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.57"}}

Simple Improvements.embed: {"title":"Simple Improvements","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Extra Ordinary, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Normal-Type Pok\u00e9mon gains Initiative"}],"description":"Add your Type-Linked Skill Rank to all of your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s rolls this turn. Your Pok\u00e9mon gains Temporary Hit Points equal to twice your Type-Linked Skill Rank. Simple Improvements may only be used once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.126"}}

Medicinal Blend.embed: {"title":"Medicinal Blend","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Apothecary Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Apothecary, Master Medicine Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Ingredients","value":"Two Restoratives, or a Restorative and an X-Item"}],"description":"You fuse the two Ingredients, creating an Item that has the properties of both. If you choose two Restoratives, they cannot be Restoratives with the same effect (you could not for example, mix a Potion and a Super Potion). If a Restorative Patch is used as an Ingredient, the resulting item can only be used as an Extended Action. Recipe - Performance Enhancers","footer":{"text":"Core: p.141"}}

True Steel.embed: {"title":"True Steel","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Polished Shine, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Steel-Type Pok\u00e9mon is hit by a damaging attack"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains Damage Reduction against the attack equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank. Additionally, calculate Type Effectiveness with this attack as if your Pok\u00e9mon has no Typings besides Steel.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.128"}}

Archive Tutor.embed: {"title":"Archive Tutor","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Technique Album, Expert Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pok\u00e9mon with 2 Tutor Points"}],"description":"Select a Record in your Technique Archive that is of a Move that the target can learn by Level Up, TM or by Move Tutor. The target learns the Move and loses 2 Tutor Points. You can target someone else\u2019s Pok\u00e9mon only once with Archive Tutor; you may target your own Pok\u00e9mon any number of times with Archive Tutor, but they must still abide by any Move Pool Limitations (i.e.: no more than 3 of the target's Move Pool can come from TMs or Tutor Moves).","footer":{"text":"Core: p.134"}}

Stat Mastery.embed: {"title":"Stat Mastery","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Stat Maneuver"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Stat Mastery\u2019s Effect depends on your Chosen Stat","value":","},{"name":"Attack Effect","value":"When your Pok\u00e9mon successfully uses a Push, Disarm, or Dirty Trick Combat Maneuver, the target of the Maneuver loses a Tick of Hit Points."},{"name":"Defense Effect","value":"Whenever your Pok\u00e9mon do not spend their Shift Action to Shift during a turn, they gain +5 Damage Reduction for one full round."},{"name":"Special Attack Effect","value":"The Range of your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Special Non-Melee Moves is increased by +2. This does not affect the size of Area-Of-Effect moves (But does affect the range at which you can place Ranged Blasts)."},{"name":"Special Defense Effect","value":"Whenever your Pok\u00e9mon would lose a Tick of Hit Points from Status Afflictions, Weather, or other effects, they lose 5 fewer Hit Points, to a minimum of 1."},{"name":"Speed Effect","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may take Disengage Maneuvers as Swift Actions."}],"description":",","footer":{"text":"Core: p.113"}}

Breadth of Knowledge.embed: {"title":"Breadth of Knowledge","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[General Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice General Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain three Skill Edges for which you qualify. These Edges must be used to gain a Skill Edge with an Education Skill, or to gain an Edge that has an Education Skill as a Prerequisite that you meet.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.140"}}

Major Gift - Blaze Armor.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Blaze Armor","description":"You take damage from the next Attack that hits you as if you were Fire Type. Ancient Heritage.embed: {"title":"Ancient Heritage","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Paleontology Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fossil Restoration"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Fossil Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points remaining"}],"description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points and learns Ancient Power. Pack Master.embed: {"title":"Pack Master","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Pack Tactics, Expert Stealth, Expert Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"For you and your Pok\u00e9mon with Teamwork, Teamwork\u2019s effect now reads \u201cWhile you are adjacent to an opponent, allies targeting that opponent receive a +2 bonus to Accuracy Checks\u201d. Whenever you or your Pok\u00e9mon successfully hit a foe with Pack Hunt, they gain a +2 Bonus to Accuracy Rolls and a +5 Bonus to Damage Rolls against that foe until the end of their next turn.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.159"}}

Major Gift - Sprouter.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Sprouter","description":"You gain the Sprouter Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Catastrophe Sense OR Minor Gift - Plant Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.59, 60"}}

Training Regime.embed: {"title":"Training Regime","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Athlete"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Attack","value":"You gain a +2 Bonus on Accuracy Checks to hit with Combat Maneuvers."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Defense","value":"You gain 5 Damage Reduction when Intercepting attacks."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Special Attack","value":"You may add half your Special Attack Stat to Damaging Athlete Moves. Fossil Restoration.embed: {"title":"Fossil Restoration","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Paleontology Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Paleontologist, Novice Pokemon Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Fossil you are reviving"}],"description":"The resulting Pok\u00e9mon is born with 2 fewer Tutor Points, and gains its second Basic Ability. If it has only has one Basic Ability, it gains one of its Advanced Abilities, chosen by the GM. This Feature does not affect how the Pok\u00e9mon continues to gain Abilities.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.146"}}

Pact Gift - Roar of Time.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Roar of Time","description":"You learn the Move Roar of Time.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Dialga and Shared Creation Trio Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Pheromone Markers.embed: {"title":"Pheromone Markers","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Enhanced Embrace Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action "},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit a foe with a damaging Bug-Type attack"}],"description":"The triggering foe gains 1 Pheromone Stack. Your Bug-Type attacks gain a +2 bonus to Accuracy Rolls and +1 Critical Hit range against foes for each Pheromone Stack they have. Once per Scene per foe, when they gain their third or higher Pheromone Stack, you may choose to roll 1d6. On a result of 1 or 2, the foe becomes Confused; on a result of 3 or 4 the foe becomes Suppressed; on a result of 5 or 6 the foe becomes Enraged.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.63"}}

Major Gift - Teravolt.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Teravolt","description":"You gain the Teravolt Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Black Yin"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.67"}}
