Major Gift - Sight Sharing.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Sight Sharing","description":"You must take this Major Gift alongside another person also taking this Major Gift, one of you gaining it through Latias and the other through Latios. The two of you are considered Link Partners. Whenever you wish, you may share your senses with your Link Partner or attempt to use their senses as long as both you and your Link Partner give mental consent and are conscious. You and your Link Partner never hit each other with Area of Effect Moves unless you want to.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Loyal Heart, See Effect"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.59"}}

Major Gift - Gentle Vibe.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Gentle Vibe","description":"You gain the Gentle Vibe Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Motherly Compassion"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

Major Gift - Victory Star.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Victory Star","description":"You gain the Victory Star Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Chosen of Victory"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.66"}}

Channeler.embed: {"title":"Channeler","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mystic Senses"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pok\u00e9mon."},{"name":"Mechanic – Channeling","value":"While Channeling a Pokémon, it may communicate its intentions, emotions, and motivations to you and you may communicate similarly with them; neither party may be deceitful in this exchange. You also become aware of all of its Moves, Abilities, and Capabilities. Allied Channeled Pokémon may always attempt Intercept Maneuvers for each other, regardless of Loyalty. If you are Fainted, you stop Channeling all Pokémon. Whenever you Channel a Pokémon, you have a vague knowledge of what has happened in the Pokémon’s past hour as if they were your own memories."}],"description":"You Channel the target Pok\u00e9mon. If you attempt to Channel a Hostile Pok\u00e9mon, you must make an Intuition Check with a DC of 15 to Channel the target. You may stop Channeling a Pok\u00e9mon as a Free Action at any time. You may Channel a number of Pok\u00e9mon at a time up to your Intuition Rank. If a Channeled Pok\u00e9mon goes further than 20 meters from you, they stop being Channeled.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.179"}}

Powerful Motivator.embed: {"title":"Powerful Motivator","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Provocateur, two Provocateur Skills at Adept Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Baby-Doll Eyes","value":"The target cannot Critically Strike for 1 full round."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Confide","value":"The target cannot trigger Effect Ranges for 1 full round."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Leer","value":"The target is Slowed for 1 Full Round."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Sweet Kiss","value":"The target gains a -3 penalty to Evasion for 1 full round."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Taunt","value":"The target gains a -3 penalty to Accuracy Rolls 1 full round."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Torment","value":"The target gains a -10 penalty to Damage Rolls against your allies for 1 full round."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Lovely Kiss","value":"The target gains a -3 penalty to Save Checks for 1 full round."}],"description":"Baby-Doll Eyes, Confide, Leer, and your Provocateur Moves gain additional effects. These effects occur whether the Move hits or misses.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.166"}}

Fearsome Display.embed: {"title":"Fearsome Display","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Malice"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Swift Action "},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use Leer or a Roughneck Move"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Leer","value":"Attacks against affected foes gain a +2 Bonus to their Critical Range for one full round."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Chip Away","value":"The target is considered Vulnerable against this attack."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Headbutt","value":"The target has their Initiative set to 0 until the end of their next turn."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Glare","value":"The target loses 2 Speed Combat Stages. This occurs whether Glare hits or misses."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Mean Look","value":"The target is Suppressed."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Endure","value":"You gain two Ticks of Temporary Hit Points."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Slack Off","value":"You are cured of one Status Affliction."}],"description":"The Move gains additional effects.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.171"}}

Poison Weapons.embed: {"title":"Poison Weapon","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed] [Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ninja, Adept Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You make a Weapon Attack."}],"description":"The attack or Move Poisons its targets on 16+, and you may have it deal Poison-Type Damage if you wish.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.184"}}

Genjutsu.embed: {"title":"Genjutsu","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ninja, Adept Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Standard Action"}],"description":"You form an Illusion around yourself. This Illusion may be used to hide yourself in a shroud of darkness if in darkness, or to make yourself look like a mundane object (such as a crate, potted plant, or similar). The Illusion can even fool Aura, concealing you from Aura Sight for its duration. However, the Illusion requires complete concentration, and is broken if you take any actions at all. Anyone that interacts with the Illusion directly may make an Occult Education or Intuition Check with a DC equal to 10 plus your Stealth Rank; if they succeed, the Illusion is broken.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.184"}}

Overgrowth.embed: {"title":"Overgrowth","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Special]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Nature's Embrace Rank 3"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Swift Action "},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit with a Druid Move"}],"description":"One target of the triggering Move is afflicted with Overgrowth. As long as the target is afflicted, they are one step less Resistant to Grass-Type attacks, to a maximum of neutral damage, and they cannot recover Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points. Whenever they would do so, you gain those Hit Points or Temporary Hit Points instead. Overgrowth is removed when the target Takes a Breather or is hit by a damaging Fire, Ice, Poison, Flying, or Bug-Type attack. Overgrowth may only affect a target once per Scene.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.79"}}

Druid's Call.embed: {"title":"Druid's Call","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Special]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Green Path"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Standard Action "}],"description":"6 small saplings, flowery bushes, or mushroom patches (depending on your oath) suddenly grow within 6 meters of you, occupying 1 square each. This vegetation lasts until the end of the encounter, and acts as rough terrain that blocks line of sight for Pok\u00e9mon and Trainers without the Naturewalk (Forest) Capability. Whenever you use a Move learned through Nature's Embrace, you may have it originate from these Plants as if they were the user. This Feature must be used on soil, or terrain under which soil is hidden by only a few inches (such as most sidewalks, parking lots, gravel or woodchip lots, etc.)","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.79"}}

Extreme Weather.embed: {"title":"Extreme Weather","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Climatology Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Climate Control, Master Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You or your Pok\u00e9mon create a Weather Condition"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Hail","value":"All Trainers and Pok\u00e9mon that take Hail Damage take a -5 Penalty to all Damage Rolls."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Rain","value":"All Trainers and Pok\u00e9mon that are not Water or Grass typed are Slowed."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Sandstorm","value":"All Trainers and Pok\u00e9mon that take Sandstorm damage take a -2 Penalty to Accuracy Rolls."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Sun","value":"Trainers and Pok\u00e9mon that are not Fire or Grass Typed are Suppressed."}],"description":"The Weather is particularly intense and has additional effects.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.145"}}

Farcast.embed: {"title":"Farcast","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Space Distortion, Expert Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use the Move Teleport or activate the Teleporter Capability "},{"name":"Choose One Effect","value":"You activate Teleporter as if your Teleporter value were three times its normal value or you may take one willing Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer along with you as you teleport so long as you are touching them when you activate Farcast. You may expend two uses of Farcast at once to choose both effects."}],"description":",","footer":{"text":"Core: p.195"}}

Pok\u00e9 Ball Mods.embed: {"title":"Pok\u00e9 Ball Mods","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Jailbreaker"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You may craft any of the following Pok\u00e9 Ball Modifications:\nHabitat, Power, Type, Fabulous, Learning, Weather","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.82"}}

Type Sync.embed: {"title":"Type Sync","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection, a Type-Linked Class*, Adept Medicine, Occult, or Tech Education."},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"The Target gains the Type of your Elemental Connection as an additional Type, or has one of their Types replaced by that Type. See the Type Changes section (page 436) for more information and suggestions. A Pok\u00e9mon may be targeted by Type Sync only once. This Feature may be performed One Time for each Rank above Untrained you have of your highest of Medicine, Occult, or Tech Education, up to a maximum of 4 times at Master Rank.  *Type-Linked Classes include Type Ace and all Elementalist Classes, all of which are linked to their respective Types. Additionally, Aura Guardian is linked to Fighting; and Telekinetic, Telepath, and Warper are linked to Psychic. Obviously, your Type Linked Class must match your Elemental Connection to apply for Type Sync!","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.47"}}

Fusion Cases.embed: {"title":"Fusion Cases","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Jailbreaker Research Field]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Jailbreaker, Master Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Ingredients","value":"Two different types of Pok\u00e9 Ball Cases."}],"description":"You combine the two Pok\u00e9 Ball Cases into a single Fusion Case with both effects and types. Fusion Cases may not be used as Ingredients for this Feature. Recipe - Advanced Cases","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.82"}}

Upgrader.embed: {"title":"Upgrader","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Upgrader Research Field]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Medicine Education, Novice Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"}],"description":"You may craft any Augmentation Recipe for which you qualify and install them on yourself and willing Pok\u00e9mon and Trainers. Recipes - Datajack, Eye Augments","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.84"}}

Efficient Installation.embed: {"title":"Efficient Installation","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Upgrader Research Field]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Upgrader, Expert Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You and your Pok\u00e9mon gain a +2 boost to their maximum Augmentation Capacity and count their used Capacity as 2 lower for the purposes of Augmentation Shock. You and your Pok\u00e9mon can install multiple Augmentations in the same Slot. Recipe - Body Augments","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.84"}}

Emergency Reactivation.embed: {"title":"Emergency Reactivation","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Upgrader Research Field]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Upgrader, Adept Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You or your Pok\u00e9mon suffer Augmentation Shock"}],"description":"The triggering user does not suffer Augmentation Shock and their Augmentations are not disabled. This Feature may affect a target only once per Scene. Recipe - Limb Augments","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.84"}}

Glitch Shuffle.embed: {"title":"Glitch Shuffle","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glitch Bender, Expert Perception, Occult Education, or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Metronome and Topsy-Turvy","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.86"}}

Arcane Training.embed: {"title":"Arcane Training","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Occult Education, Elemental Connection or Mystic Senses"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You may use Arcane Weapons. Attacks made with your Arcane Weapons share the Type of your Elemental Connection. If you have Mystic Senses, these Attacks deal Normal Type Damage. Arcane Weapon users that qualified through Mystic Senses or Elemental Connection (Normal) gain a +5 Bonus to Damage Rolls and a +2 Bonus to Effect Range when using Arcane Weapon Attacks. When wielding an Arcane Weapon, you may resist Disarm Maneuvers with your Occult Education.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.47"}}

Power of Rage.embed: {"title":"Power of Rage","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Berserker"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose Enduring Rage or White Flame. You gain the chosen Ability.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.49"}}

Glitch Bender.embed: {"title":"Glitch Bender","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glitched Existence, Novice Focus, Occult Education, or Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Synchronize Ability.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.86"}}

Null Error.embed: {"title":"Null Error","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glitch Bender"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Snatch and Disable.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.86"}}

Smith.embed: {"title":"Smith","description":"You may craft any items of your rank of Smith or lower for the prices below.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2][+Attack]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Novice Focus, Novice Athletics"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":"Adept Focus, Adept Athletics"},{"name":"Rank 1 Items","value":"Simple Weapons for $1000; Light Shields for $1,500; Light Armor for $4,000."},{"name":"Rank 2 Items","value":"Fine Weapons for $2,000; Helmets for $1,125; Heavy Shields for $2,250; Heavy Armor for $5,000."}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.47"}}

Lessons In Rage And Pain.embed: {"title":"Lessons In Rage & Pain","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Berserker, Adept Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"While you have at least 1 Injury, add +X to your Damage Rolls with Rage, Flail, Fury Swipes, Thrash, and Weapon Attacks. X is equal to your Intimidate Rank plus the number of Injuries you have. You do not lose Hit Points from being Heavily Injured, and Injuries beyond the 5th do not lower your Maximum Hit Points.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.49"}}

Berserker.embed: {"title":"Berserker","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+HP] [Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Combat, Novice Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Rage and Flail. You may use these moves as a Weapon Attack when wielding Melee Weapons.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.49"}}

Corrupt Reality.embed: {"title":"Corrupt Reality","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glitch Bender, Adept Perception, Occult Education, or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Any roll made by an enemy"}],"description":"You may force the enemy to reroll that roll.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.86"}}

Glyph.embed: {"title":"Glyph","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Rune Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Unown that is not part of a Prime Unown"}],"description":"You may set the target Unown against any flat surface, and turn the Unown into a glyph. Glyphs have HP equal to your Level, and no other stats. Glyphs last until they are destroyed or intentionally de-activated, at which time the Unown returns to Unown Space, disappearing forever. You may have a number of active Glyphs equal to your Occult Education Rank. When setting a Glyph, you may have the Glyphs be either visible or invisible, as you prefer. At any time, as a Standard Action, you may Channel any Glyph you have set down. This causes the Glyph\u2019s eye to open and become visible if it was not. While you are channeling a Glyph, you are able to see through the Glyph, listen through it, and project your voice through it.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.51"}}

I Am Error.embed: {"title":"I Am Error","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glitch Bender"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You gain a Status Affliction:  "}],"description":"Roll 1d10 and change which Status Affliction is gained according to page 86 of the Do Porygon Dream of Mareep? splatbook. If the target already has that Status Affliction, roll again.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.86"}}

Code Injection.embed: {"title":"Code Injection","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Corrupt Reality"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer within 5 meters"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Object Not Found","value":"The target may not benefit from Equipment, Held Items, and consumable Items for one full round."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Access Denied","value":"The target is Slowed and may only take At-Will actions for one full round."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Blue Screen","value":"The target is Blinded and Vulnerable for one full round."}],"description":"You may use any of the Glitches below. They are treated as a Status-Class attack with an AC of 2. You may only use each Glitch once per Scene, and each target may only be affected by Code Injection once per Scene.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.86"}}

Explosive Runes.embed: {"title":"Explosive Runes","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Adept Occult Education, Glyph, Hidden Power"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Glyph you have put down, regardless of distance"}],"description":"You may use Hidden Power, originating the attack from the location of the targeted Glyph. Use your own Stats and Hidden Power values to calculate damage. Using this Feature causes the Glyph to become visible and glow for a minute afterwards.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.52"}}

Close Quarters Mastery.embed: {"title":"Close Quarters Mastery","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Fighting as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"},{"name":"Note","value":"Marked Foes provoke an attack of Opportunity from the Pok\u00e9mon that marked them if they Shift out of an adjacent square into a square that is not adjacent, even if they use a Disengage Maneuver. Targets cannot be Marked by more than one Pok\u00e9mon at a time."}],"description":"While this Feature is Bound, the target\u2019s Fighting-Type Moves cause foes to become Marked by the target for 1 full round. If the target is a Fighting- Type Pok\u00e9mon, they may also Mark the Foe for one full round when hitting with a Grapple, Trip, or Push Maneuver. ","footer":{"text":"Core: p.122"}}

Hidden Power (Feature).embed: {"title":"Hidden Power (Feature)","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Rune Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Move Hidden Power. Whenever you use Hidden Power, it may be either Physical or Special, adding the appropriate Attack Stat.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.51"}}

Crash and Smash.embed: {"title":"Crash and Smash","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP] [Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Frenzy, Expert Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Double Edge and Thrash. You may use these moves as a Weapon Attack when wielding Melee Weapons.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.49"}}

Push it to the Limit.embed: {"title":"Push it to the Limit","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Lessons in Rage & Pain, Expert Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit with a Berserker Move or Weapon Attack"}],"description":"Immediately gain one Injury before resolving the triggering attack. You gain a Tick of Temporary Hit Points and may cure yourself of a Persistent Status Affliction. The triggering attack doubles your damage bonus from Lessons in Rage and Pain.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.49"}}

Fight On and On.embed: {"title":"Fight On and On","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Lessons in Rage & Pain, Adept Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Hit Points are lowered to or below 0 while Enraged."}],"description":"You are not Fainted; you instead Faint upon reaching -50% of your Max Hit Points. If you have 5 or more injuries, you may use this Feature regardless of Frequency.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.49"}}

Words of Power.embed: {"title":"Words of Power","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Adept Occult Education, Hidden Power"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You or your Pok\u00e9mon use Hidden Power"}],"description":"Instead of a Burst, you may choose to have Hidden Power be a 1 Target Melee, 1 Target 6m, or Cone 2. Additionally, you and your Prime Unown always have STAB on Hidden Power as if you or they were of the same Type.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.51"}}

Pact Gift - Hypergeometry.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Hypergeometry","description":"Static Effect: You may always treat the distance between you and any other Trainer or Pok\u00e9mon as one meter greater or one meter less as you choose for the purpose of calculating range or distance of travel. You may not use this to avoid melee attacks by switching between making their distance greater or less - a value is chosen when an action is announced and cannot be changed afterwards.\n\nScene Effect: You may activate this Pact Gift once per Scene when hit by a single target attack. The attack instead hits a target of your choice in an adjacent square to you.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All MissingNo Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static | Scene - Standard Action, Interrupt"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.69"}}

Major Gift - Elemental Manipulation.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Elemental Manipulation","description":"You gain a Capability based on which Legendary Bird or Beast granted you this Feature. Articuno grants Freezer, Moltres and Entei grant Firestarter, Zapdos and Raikou grant Zapper, and Suicune grants Fountain.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Elemental Soul"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.58"}}

Rune Master.embed: {"title":"Rune Master","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Own 2 Unown, Novice Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Gather Unown capability, and your Unown gain the Letter Press Capability. When using Gather Unown, you are treated as a level 20 Pok\u00e9mon.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.51"}}

Rewrite.embed: {"title":"Rewrite","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Hidden Power"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily"},{"name":"Target","value":"Self or a willing Pok\u00e9mon with Hidden Power."}],"description":"Reroll the Type for an instance of Hidden Power the target knows If you target an Unown, you may transform the target into a different letter.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.51"}}

Wall of Iron.embed: {"title":"Wall of Iron","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fortress, Adept Combat or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the moves Iron Defense and Protect.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.57"}}

Unstoppable Will.embed: {"title":"Unstoppable Will","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Slow or Steady, Expert Combat or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Discipline Ability.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.57"}}

Marksman.embed: {"title":"Marksman","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Combat, Novice Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Sniper Ability.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.59"}}

Aiming Down The Sights.embed: {"title":"Aiming Down The Sights","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Marksman"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At Will \u2013 Shift Action"}],"description":"Your next Weapon Attack with a long-range Weapon gains +2 to its Accuracy Roll and Critical Hit Range. This effect lasts until used or until the start of your next turn.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.59"}}

Double Shot.embed: {"title":"Double Shot","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Marksman, Adept Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Standard Action"}],"description":"You may make two Struggle Attacks with a -2 penalty to Accuracy, each targeting the same foe. If the first attack gains the benefit of Aiming Down the Sights or Clear Shot, the second attack also gains the same benefits for free.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.59"}}

Metamagic.embed: {"title":"Metamagic","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Arcanist, Adept Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Swift Action "},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use a Special Move"},{"name":"Rank 1 Power Manipulations are","value":"Energy Finesse, Warp Energy, Directed Barrier, Power Overdrive"}],"description":"You may apply a Rank 1 Power Manipulation to your attack.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.54"}}

Fortress.embed: {"title":"Fortress","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Defense] [Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Combat, Novice Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You target an enemy with a Struggle attack or Weapon Attack and end your turn adjacent to the target."}],"description":"You Mark all targets of the attack until the end of your next turn. Marked foes take a penalty to Attack Rolls against any targets besides you equal to your Focus Rank. A Mark from a different source (such as a second Fortress or a Fighting Type Ace\u2019s Pok\u00e9mon) will overwrite your Mark.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.57"}}

Authentic Thaumaturgy.embed: {"title":"Authentic Thaumaturgy","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Arcanist, Expert Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Swift Action "},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use a Special Move "},{"name":"Rank 2 Power Manipulations are","value":"Berserk Blow, Energy Link, Enlarged Power, Lock of Fate"}],"description":"You may apply a Rank 2 Power Manipulation to your attack.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.54"}}

Stalwart Bastion.embed: {"title":"Stalwart Bastion","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fortress"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"}],"description":"While this Feature is Bound, you and all cardinally adjacent allies gain Damage Reduction equal to your Combat or Focus Rank.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.57"}}

Recoup Energy.embed: {"title":"Recoup Energy","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Arcanist, Expert Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action "},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Special Move misses all targets"}],"description":"You do not expend the Frequency of the triggering Move. If you applied a Power Manipulation to the triggering Move, you are refunded the AP for the Manipulation or do not expend the Frequency for it.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.54"}}

Soul Investment.embed: {"title":"Soul Investment","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Arcanist, Master Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Soul Bonded Weapon"}],"description":"Choose one Novice and one Expert Arcane Weapon Move. Your Soul Bonded Weapon adds those Moves to your Move List as long as this Feature is Bound. You gain the Chosen Ability.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.85"}}

Winter is Coming.embed: {"title":"Winter is Coming","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Frost Touched, Master Athletics or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Frostbite Ability","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.83"}}

Vile Body.embed: {"title":"Vile Body","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Miasmic, Adept Guile or Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose Absorb Force, Poison Point, or Poison Touch. You gain the chosen Ability.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.87"}}

Miasma's Call.embed: {"title":"Miasma\u2019s Call","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Vile Body, Expert Stealth or Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the moves Acid Armor and Sludge Bomb.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.87"}}

Glacial Defense.embed: {"title":"Glacial Defense","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Frost Touched"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose Ice Shield or Winter's Kiss. You gain the Chosen Ability.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.83"}}

Miasmic.embed: {"title":"Miasmic","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Poison), Novice Stealth, Novice Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Acid and Clear Smog.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.87"}}

Flexible Form.embed: {"title":"Flexible Form","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Miasmic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Your body becomes more malleable, and even your bones are able to flex when required. You do not gain Wounds from taking Massive damage, and you gain a +2 Bonus to any Acrobatics or Athletics Check made to bend, squeeze, or otherwise contort your body - including those to avoid Trip or Grapple maneuvers.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.87"}}

Corrupt Blood.embed: {"title":"Corrupt Blood","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Miasmic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You are immune to the Poisoned and Badly Poisoned statuses and resist Poison-type attacks one step further.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.87"}}

Major Gift - Corrupt Existence.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Corrupt Existence","description":"Target: Trainer or Pok\u00e9mon within 6 meters","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"For each AP spent on Corrupt Existence up to a maximum of 3, roll 1d20. The Target becomes one step weaker against a Type for each roll as follows: Bug on a result of 1; Dark on 2; Dragon on 3; Electric on 4; Fighting on 5; Fire on 6; Flying on 7; Ghost on 8; Grass on 9; Ground on 10; Ice on 11; Normal on 12; Poison on 13; Psychic on 14; Rock on 15; Steel on 16; Water on 17; and on a result of 18-20, reroll the 1d20. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter, even if the target is recalled."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Detect Heretic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"X AP - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.70"}}

Major Gift - He Who Cannot Be Shackled.embed: {"title":"Major Gift \u2013 He Who Cannot Be Shackled","description":"Trigger: You become Trapped, Slowed, Tripped or Grappled.","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"You evade the Status Effect or Combat Maneuver."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift \u2013 World Serpent\u2019s Embrace"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Major Gift - Touch of the Flayed One.embed: {"title":"Major Gift \u2013 Touch of the Flayed One","description":"Trigger: You inflict Injuries on a Target.","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"You inflict an additional Injury."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Death Dealer"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 - Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Pact Gift - Oblivion Wing.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift \u2013 Oblivion Wing","description":"You learn the Move Oblivion Wing.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Yveltal Major Gifts and Shared Mortality Duo Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Stone Cold Finish.embed: {"title":"Stone Cold Finish","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Shards of Stone, Master Combat or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Stone Edge and Head Smash","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.89"}}

Hydro Jet.embed: {"title":"Hydro Jet","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Call the Current Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use a damaging single target Water-Type Move"}],"description":"Hydro Jet\u2019s effect depends on if the triggering Move was Melee or Ranged.  \u00bb\u00bb If Melee, the Move gains the Pass keyword and you may change direction during the four meters of Pass (but may still only target any given Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer once). \u00bb\u00bb If Ranged, the Move becomes a Line 4 instead of its usual range.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.93"}}

Steelheart.embed: {"title":"Steelheart","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Defense] [Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Steel), Novice Athletics, Novice Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"When wielding metal Melee Weapons, you may use Athletics or Focus instead of Combat to determine the Damage Base of your Struggle Attacks, to qualify for a Weapon\u2019s Moves, and to resist Disarm Checks. Whenever your Weapon Attacks hit a foe who has previously hit you with a Melee attack in the same round, the foe loses a Tick of Hit Points.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.91"}}

Champion of Steel.embed: {"title":"Champion of Steel","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense] [Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Steelheart"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You make a Weapon Attack."}],"description":"The attack or Move increases your Defense by 1 Combat Stage on 16+ and you may have it deal Steel-Type Damage if you wish.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.91"}}

Steel Wind.embed: {"title":"Steel Wind","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense] [Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Steelheart"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Static Effect","value":"You learn the Moves Bullet Punch and Metal Claw. You may use these Moves as Weapon Attacks when wielding Melee Weapons."}],"description":",","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.91"}}

Impenetrable.embed: {"title":"Impenetrable","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Steelheart, Expert Athletics or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Bulletproof Ability.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.91"}}

Master of Arms.embed: {"title":"Master of Arms","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense] [Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Steelheart, Expert Athletics or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Call to Arms and Unlimited Steel Works Talents.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.91"}}

Man of Steel.embed: {"title":"Man of Steel","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense] [Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Steelheart, Master Athletics or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Meteor Mash and King\u2019s Shield. You may use these Moves as Weapon Attacks when wielding Melee Weapons.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.91"}}

Water's Shroud.embed: {"title":"Water's Shroud","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Call the Current Rank 2"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Choose Wash Away or Storm Drain. You gain the Chosen Ability.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.93"}}

Shards of Stone.embed: {"title":"Shards of Stone","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Stone Warrior, Expert Combat or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the Moves Rock Slide and Stealth Rock","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.89"}}

Maelstrom.embed: {"title":"Maelstrom","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Water), Novice Athletics, Novice Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Gilled Capability, and a +2 bonus to your Swim speed. Whenever your Water-Type Moves miss all targets, you gain a Tick of Temporary Hit Points.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.93"}}

Oceanic Feeling.embed: {"title":"Oceanic Feeling","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Water's Shroud, Master Athletics or Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"}],"description":"You may activate Oceanic Feeling when either Wash Away or Storm Drain would be triggered to gain that Ability for 1 full round, if you do not already have it, and immediately Trigger it. Activating an Ability this way ignores its usual Frequency. You may use each Ability once per Scene this way.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.93"}}

Reactive Armour.embed: {"title":"Reactive Armour","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Steelheart, Adept Athletics or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You gain an Injury or take a Critical Hit while wearing metallic Armor"}],"description":"All foes within a Burst 1 lose Hit Points equal to double your Athletics or Focus Rank, and you gain Damage Reduction equal to double your Athletics or Focus Rank for one full round.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.91"}}

Stone Stance Mastery.embed: {"title":"Stone Stance Mastery","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Stone Stance, Master Combat or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Whenever you bind Stone Stance, you may choose two Stances and apply the effects of both.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.89"}}

Major Gift.embed: {"title":"Major Gift","description":"You gain one of your Patron\u2019s Major Gifts. Thiis Major Gift may be of your GM\u2019s choosing. This feat is able to be taken multiple times based on your GM\u2019s discretion.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Touched, GM Permission"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.45"}}

Pact Gift.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift","description":"You gain your Patron\u2019s Pact Gift. Lower Pantheon Legendaries do not have Pact Gifts.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All of your Patron\u2019s Major Gifts, GM Permission"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.45"}}

Messiah.embed: {"title":"Messiah","description":"Your Connection with one of your Patrons has reached such a point that even you are capable of performing the miracles they are renowned and worshiped for. Expending a use of Messiah allows you to perform such a miracle. For example, in a Region where Shaymin is known to restore withered forests to their former glory, a Touched who is a Messiah of Shaymin might be able to cause a forest to start to rapidly recover from the a ermath of a wildfire. Such acts are usually, but not always, noticeably supernatural and divine.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Touched, GM Permission"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"One Time Use\/5 - Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.48"}}

Major Gift - Mental Suggestion.embed: {"title":"Major Gift \u2013 Mental Suggestion","description":"Mental Suggestion requires both you and the Mewtwo you are bound to be in the same vicinity. Make a Focus check as if you were using Telepath. On a success, you instill a thought or action into the Target\u2019s mind as if it were one of their own. They may not immediately act on it, and will question it if it is too alien from how they would normally act, but the thought will persist as long as they are unaware of its origin.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift \u2013 Expanded Horizons"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2013 Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.69"}}

Gift of Power.embed: {"title":"Gift of Power","description":"You gift your target with a Blessing of your own. Whether this makes them Touched, a Signer, or Branded is at your digression. The actual Blessings may not need be the one listed here for your Legendary Form, but ones of your own creation at your GM\u2019s discretion.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Pokemon Form Level 60"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"One Time Use"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Trainer"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.52"}}

Symbolsight.embed: {"title":"Symbolsight","description":"For the next ten minutes, you see the world through the lens of Symbolsight. You may end this effect early as a Free Action.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"GM Permission"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static | 1 AP - Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Self"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static Effect"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.54"}}

In My Name.embed: {"title":"In My Name","description":"You acquire a Blessing marked with the In My Name Rank you are gaining or lower. You must additionally meet any Prerequisites of the Blessing.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 4][PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Messiah, GM Permission"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Completed a task on behalf of your Patron, GM Permission"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" A Major Gift, GM Permission"},{"name":"Rank 4 Prerequisites","value":" A Pact Gift, GM Permission"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Note","value":" If your Patron does not have a Pact Gift, you instead require all their Major Gifts to attain Rank 4."}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.48"}}

Shared Strengths.embed: {"title":"Shared Strengths","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 3][PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Pokemon Form Level 20"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Pokemon Form Level 35"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" True Power, Pokemon Form Level 50"},{"name":"Rank 1 Effect","value":" You gain access to your Legendary Form\u2019s Abilities while in your Avatar form."},{"name":"Rank 2 Effect","value":" You gain your Legendary Form\u2019s Types while in your Avatar Form"},{"name":"Rank 3 Effect","value":" You gain access to your Legendary Form\u2019s Move List while in your Avatar Form."},{"name":"Note","value":" Your Legendary Form, by default, has access to all Capabilities, Abilities and Moves your Avatar does."}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.52"}}

True Power.embed: {"title":"True Power","description":"You gain one of the Domains and its corresponding Legendary Aura associated with your Legendary Form. This Feature may be taken multiple times, but with the second time at Pokemon Form Level 60, and the third at Pokemon Form level 75.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Shared Strengths Rank 2, Pokemon Form Level 40"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.52"}}

Gift of Command.embed: {"title":"Gift of Command","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"One Major Gift from Your Patron Legendary"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static | 2 AP - Standard Action, Interrupt"},{"name":"Static Effect","value":"You sense the presence of and can identify those with Gifts coming from your patron\u2019s subservient Poke\u0301mon. You know which Gifts someone has from your patron\u2019s subservient Poke\u0301mon by looking at them."},{"name":"2 AP Effect","value":"Target Trainer within 8 meters with a Gift from your patron\u2019s subservient Poke\u0301mon has the Gift of your choice from that subservient Poke\u0301mon disabled for the next ten minutes."}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.53"}}

Branded.embed: {"title":"Branded","description":"You have made a contract with a deity or other supernatural being and have been Branded for it. This Brand may or may not be of your choosing. The other party will uphold their side of the deal and expects you to do the same. Other Legendaries may be wary to grant you Gifts in the future based on the contents of this contract. Your Patron Stats for this feature are those of the being you made your contract with. If this being was not a typical Legendary, its Patron Stats are its two highest base stats.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"GM Permission"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.50"}}

Call The Current.embed: {"title":"Call The Current","description":"You learn 2 Moves chosen from the list below, marked with the Rank of this Feature you are gaining or lower.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 3][+Speed]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Maelstrom"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Adept Athletics or Acrobatics"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" Expert Athletics or Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.93"}}

First Aid Expertise.embed: {"title":"First Aid Expertise","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Medic Training, Expert Medicine Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Pokemon or Trainers"}],"description":"The target may remove one Injury, has all Hit Points restored, and is cured of all Status Afflictions. You may use First Aid Expertise only once per day per target. First Aid Expertise requires access to a First Aid Kit.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.64"}}

Fire Breather.embed: {"title":"Fire Breather","description":"Learn two Fire Bringer Moves from the list below. You may choose any Move marked with the Fire Breather Rank you are taking or lower.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack and Special Attack]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Fire Bringer, Expert Focus or Combat"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Master Focus or Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.73"}}

Enhanced Embrace.embed: {"title":"Enhanced Embrace","description":"Learn two Moves from the list below at the Rank of Enhanced Embrace you are taking or lower. Moves marked with an Embrace require that Embrace to be chosen.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Swarmlord"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Adept Command or Survival"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" Expert Command or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.63"}}

Nature's Embrace.embed: {"title":"Nature's Embrace","description":"You learn 2 Moves chosen from the list below, marked with the Rank of this Feature you are gaining or lower.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 3][+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Druid"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Adept Survival or General Education"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" Expert Survival or General Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.79"}}

Storm Wizard.embed: {"title":"Storm Wizard","description":"You may learn two Moves from the list below, marked with the Storm Wizard Rank you are gaining or lower.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 3][+Speed]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Spark Master"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Expert Acrobatics or Focus"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" Master Acrobatics or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.69"}}

Raging Winds.embed: {"title":"Raging Winds","description":"You may learn two Moves from the list below, marked with the Raging Winds Rank you are gaining or lower.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 3][+Speed]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Wind Runner"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Expert Acrobatics or Perception"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" Master Acrobatics or Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.75"}}

Pact Gift - Dark Void.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Dark Void","description":"You learn the Move Dark Void.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Bad Dreams"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.65"}}

Major Gift - Winter's Kiss.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Winter's Kiss","description":"You gain the Winter's Kiss Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Elemental Soul OR Major Gift - The Empty Tao"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.58"}}

Major Gift - Air Adept.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Air Adept","description":"You gain the Guster Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Clear Skies"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.63"}}

Major Gift - Oneiromancy.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Oneiromancy","description":"You gain the Dream Reader Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Dream Mastery"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.65"}}

Rock Power.embed: {"title":"Rock Power","description":"Each Rank, choose one of Sturdy, Rock Head, Run Up, or Sand Veil. You gain the chosen Ability. If you choose Sand Veil, you may consider sand a \"solid surface\" for the purposes of Stone Stance.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2][+Defense]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Stone Warrior, Adept Combat or Survival"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Expert Combat or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.89"}}

Earth Mother's Blessing.embed: {"title":"Earth Mother's Blessing","description":"Each Rank, choose Arena Trap or Lightning Rod. You gain the chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2][+Defense]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Earth Shaker, Adept Focus or Intuition"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Ground Out, Master Focus or Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.81"}}

Pact Gift - Crush Grip.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Crush Grip","description":"You learn the Move Crush Grip.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Regigigas Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.66"}}

Winter's Herald.embed: {"title":"Winter's Herald","description":"You may learn two Moves from the list below, marked with the Rank of Winter's Herald you are gaining or lower.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2][+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Frost Touched, Expert Athletics or Survival"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Master Athletics or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.83"}}

Press On!.embed: {"title":"Press On!","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Taskmaster, Expert Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Expert","value":"When your Pokemon Faints, you may pay 1 AP. If you do, your Pokemon Faints at -30% Hit Points instead."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Master","value":"While acting at 0 Hit Points or less, your Pokemon\u2019s Critical Hit, Effect Range, Evasion, Initiative, Damage Reduction, and Resistance Bonuses from being Hardened are doubled."}],"description":"Your Hardened Pokemon gain the following benefits, based on your Intimidate Rank","footer":{"text":"Core: p.105"}}

Enduring Bloom.embed: {"title":"Enduring Bloom","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Foiling Foliage, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Grass-Type Pok\u00e9mon is hit by a damaging Bug, Fire, Flying, Ice, or Poison attack that deals Super-Effective Damage"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains Temporary Hit Points equal to twice your Type-Linked Skill Rank, and gains +1 Combat Stage in the Stat of your choice. If it is Sunny, they may gain +1 Combat Stage in a second, different Stat. You may activate Enduring Bloom only once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.124"}}

Stat Embodiment.embed: {"title":"Stat Embodiment","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"4 Stat Ace Features, Expert Command or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains an Ability, based on your Chosen Stat, for the remainder of the Scene. Switching does not end this effect. Stat Embodiment may only grant one Ability to a Pok\u00e9mon at a time. If it is used a second time on the same target, it replaces the first granted Ability. \u00bb\u00bb Attack Aces give Sheer Force or Defiant \u00bb\u00bb Defense Aces give Filter or Battle Armor \u00bb\u00bb Special Attack Aces give Tinted Lens or Competitive \u00bb\u00bb Special Defense Aces give Multiscale or Tolerance \u00bb\u00bb Speed Aces give Speed Boost or Vanguard","footer":{"text":"Core: p.113"}}

Usurper.embed: {"title":"Usurper","description":"Your human form is now considered your Avatar, and you gain a second set of stats for your Poke\u0301mon form. This form is that of the Legendary you usurped, starts at level 1 with the nature and abilities of your choice, and may gain experience as if it were a Poke\u0301mon you owned. Switching between your human form and this one takes a Standard Action. Usurpers cannot receive Gifts or Blessings from other Legendaries, as they are divinity themselves now. Any Touched, Branded, Messiah, and Signer Edges and Features you possessed up until this point are refunded. The Patron Stats for this Feature and all other Usurper Features matches the stats of the Legendary you Usurped.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"You have slain a God and through occult ritual or technology have absorbed its essence."},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.52"}}

Major Gift - Invert Balance.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Invert Balance","description":"Target: Area","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"The area becomes Inverted for the next 5 rounds. While Inverted, all Pok\u00e9mon and Trainers have their weaknesses and resistances exchanged. Double resistance and steps of resistance or immunity beyond that become double weaknesses, normal resistances become normal weaknesses, normal weaknesses become normal resistances, and double weaknesses become double resistance."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"One Tao Trio Major Gift"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.66"}}

Major Gift - Magma Spirit.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Magma Spirit","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"For the next three rounds, foes within 6 meters of you do not gain the benefits of Sunny Day. Their Fire Type Moves do not deal extra damage, Solar Beam retains the default charge time, Abilities based on Sunny Weather do not activate, and Moves such as Synthesis do not gain added benefit. All detrimental effects of Sunny Day still apply."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Landmaster"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.63"}}

Major Gift - Dreamspinner.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Dreamspinner","description":"You gain the Dreamspinner Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Oneiromancy, Major Gift - Dream Augury"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.65"}}

Major Gift - Wavecrasher.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Wavecrasher","description":"You gain the Fountain Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Seamaster"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.63"}}

Pact Gift - Aeroblast.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Aeroblast","description":"You learn the Move Aeroblast.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Lugia and Shared Tower Duo Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

Major Gift - Doom Desire.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Doom Desire","description":"You learn the Move Doom Desire.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Eye of Truth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.59"}}

Major Gift - Storm of the Century.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Storm of the Century","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"At the beginning of your next three turns, push all foes within 5 meters of you 1 meter away, and they lose a Tick of HP."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Tower\u2019s Rejuvenation"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

Major Gift - Eye of Truth.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Eye of Truth","description":"Target: Trainer or Pok\u00e9mon","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"You can determine whether or not a professed desire by the Target is being sought for altruistic reasons or not."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Watchful Sleep"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.59"}}

Pact Gift - Shadow Force.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Shadow Force","description":"You learn the Move Shadow Force.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Giratina and Shared Creation Trio Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Divine Wind.embed: {"title":"Divine Wind","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Sage's Benediction, Master Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Free Action \u2013 Interrupt"},{"name":"Target","value":"Blessings you generated with a Sage Move"}],"description":"Choose a type of Blessing you can generate with a Sage Move. All Blessings you generated of another type become Blessings of the chosen type. This may not be used to generate more uses of a Blessing than the original Move creates. For example, three Lucky Chant Blessings would become two Reflect or Light Screen Blessings, not three. You may only choose a Blessing type once per Scene.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.189"}}

Wilderness Guide.embed: {"title":"Wilderness Guide","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP][Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Survivalist, Expert Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x3 \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Grassland or Forest","value":"All allies gain the Stealth Capability and a +2 bonus to their Overland Speed for one full round."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Ocean or Wetlands","value":"All allies gain 5 Damage Reduction and a +2 bonus to their Swim Speed for one full round."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Desert or Tundra","value":"All allies do not lose Hit Points from Weather and ignore the effects of foes\u2019 Sand Veil and Snow Cloak Abilities for one full round."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Mountain or Cave","value":"All allies do not trigger Hazards and are not Blinded in Low-Light conditions for one full round."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Urban","value":"All allies gain +1 Evasion and a +2 bonus on Accuracy Rolls and Skill Checks to perform the Dirty Trick and Manipulate Combat Maneuvers for one full round."}],"description":"Wilderness Guide\u2019s effect depends on your current terrain.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.150"}}

Dance Form.embed: {"title":"Dance Form","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Dancer"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Mechanic – Dance Moves","value":"Dance Moves you create with the Dance Form Feature look like the Move on the right. First, name the Dance Move whatever you like. Secondly, choose two Combat Stage gains for the effect. This may either be +2 Combat Stages to a single Stat, like Swords Dance, or +1 Combat Stage to two different Stats, like Dragon Dance. Once chosen, this cannot be changed. Dragon Dance, Quiver Dance, and Swords Dance count as Dance Moves for the purposes of Dancer Features as well. A Dance Move’s Contest Type must be chosen from a Contest Type associated with a Stat that the Dance Move affects. Cool is associated with Attack, Tough is associated with Defense, Beauty is associated with Special Attack, Smart is associated with Special Defense, and Cute is associated with Speed."}],"description":"Create and learn two Dance Moves, plus one more for each other Dancer Feature you have. Whenever you gain another Dancer Feature, create and learn another Dance Move.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.157"}}

Musician.embed:
{"title":"Musician","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Charm, Novice Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Mechanic: Songs","value":"Musician Songs can be triggered one of four ways. Regardless of the Area of Effect, Songs always affect the user.
» When using a Move with the Sonic keyword, Songs may be triggered as a Swift Action, and the Song’s Area of Effect is the same as the triggering Move’s.
» When using a Dance Move, Songs may be triggered as a Shift Action with an Area of Effect of Burst 2.
» As a Standard Action, you may trigger one Song, with an Area of Effect of Burst 4.
» As a Full Action, you may trigger two Songs, each with an Area of Effect of Burst 4."}],"description":"You may use Musician Songs.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.164"}}

Bottled Lightning.embed: {"title":"Bottled Lightning","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Storm Wizard, Adept Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP - Standard Action "},{"name":"Target","value":"An item made of conductive material"}],"description":"Choose one of your Electric Type Moves with a target. You Charge the target item with this Move. Bottled Lightning counts as using the Move for frequency purposes. You may expend this Charge as a Swift Action on your turn to use the Move the item was charged with, originating from the item. If a Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer touches a Charged item, you may instead activate this Swift Action as if it had the Priority keyword. At the end of a Scene, all items lose their Charge, and you may only have X items Charged at a time where X is half your Focus Rank.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.69"}}

Fey Law.embed: {"title":"Fey Law","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glamour Weaver"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit a foe with a damaging Fairy attack"}],"description":"Choose one of the following: Status-Class, Combat Maneuver, attacks with an unmodified Damage Base 10 or higher, or an Elemental Type. The triggering foe is Bound; they suffer a -X penalty to all rolls made to use attacks with the chosen trait. X is equal to half your Charm or Occult Education Rank. The Bound condition lasts until the end of a Scene. You may unbind someone as a Free Action at any time. A target may not have multiple instances of Bound applied at once.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.71"}}

Arcanist.embed: {"title":"Arcanist","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Arcane Training"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action "},{"name":"Target","value":"An Arcane Weapon "}],"description":"You create a Soul Bond with the target Weapon. You may make a Soul Bond with only one weapon at a time. If you create a new Soul Bond, previously Soul Bound weapons lose the Bond. Soul Bound Weapons gain the following benefits: \u00bb\u00bb Increase the Damage Base and Effect Range of Struggle Attacks and Arcane Weapon Moves made with your Soul Bonded Weapon by +1 for each Occult Education Rank you have above Novice, up to a maximum of +3 at Master Rank. \u00bb\u00bb As a Shift Action, you may beckon your Soul Bonded Weapon to your hands if it is within 10 meters. If it is being held by someone else who does not want to let go of the weapon, make an Occult vs Athletics Opposed Check. If you win, they their lose grip on your Weapon and it flies to your hand as normal.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.54"}}

Overwatch.embed: {"title":"Overwatch","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Marksman, Adept Perception or Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Standard Action"}],"description":"Create a Line X, and place a Blast 3 with at least three meters overlapping the Line\u2019s area. X is equal to your Weapon\u2019s Range. For one full round, if a foe moves in or out of that area, you may make a Ranged Weapon attack, Frequency allowing, against that foe as a Free Action. You may not attack a specific foe more than once per round this way. While this is in effect, if you Move from your current location, Overwatch\u2019s effect is lost.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.59"}}

Frenzy.embed: {"title":"Frenzy","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Berserker, Adept Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Condition","value":"You must be Enraged to use this Feature"}],"description":"You may immediately take your turn with Priority. If you do, you are instantly cured of Slowed and Stuck, and for the rest of this turn gain a +2 Bonus to Critical Hit Range, +2 Bonus to Movement Speed, and +2 Bonus to Acrobatics, Athletics, Combat, and Intimidate Checks.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.49"}}

Major Gift - Storm of the Fallen World.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Storm of the Fallen World","description":"Target: Area","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"For 5 rounds, the area becomes Bugged. While Bugged, all combatants are treated as if they have had the Move Heal Block applied to them, all combatants become Typeless and all effects deal only Typeless damage. At the beginning of each round, all combatants lose 1\/16th of their maximum Hit Points."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Detect Heretic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.70"}}

Pact Gift - Spacial Rend.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Spacial Rend","description":"You learn the Move Spacial Rend.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Palkia and Shared Creation Trio Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Major Gift - Knight of the Fallen God.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Knight of the Fallen God","description":"You gain the Giftsapper Feature regardless of prerequisites, and you are not bound by its requirements with respect to Gifts. Giftsapper when gained this way has no effect on Gifts granted by MissingNo.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Detect Heretic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.70"}}

Major Gift - Soundproof.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Soundproof","description":"You gain the Soundproof Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Dazzling the Stage"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.61"}}

Apparition.embed: {"title":"Apparition","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Attack] [Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Ghost), Novice Intimidate, Novice Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"When wielding Melee Weapons, you may use Occult Education or Intimidate instead of Combat to determine the Damage Base of your Struggle Attacks, to resist Disarm Maneuvers, and to qualify for a Weapon\u2019s Moves. Your Weapon Attacks always treat you as having the Reach Capability, and foes may not activate Reaction effects against them that specify being hit by a Melee Attack.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.77"}}

Signature Manipulations.embed: {"title":"Signature Manipulations","description":",","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2][+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Metamagic"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Authentic Thaumaturgy"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Rank 1 Effect","value":" Select a Rank 1 Power Manipulation. This Manipulation maybe used twice per Scene without spending AP to activate."},{"name":"Rank 2 Effect","value":" Select a Rank 1 Power Manipulation. This Manipulation maybe used twice per Scene without spending AP to activate. OR Select a Rank 2 power Manipulation. This Manipulation may be used once per Scene without activating Authentic Thaumaturgy's Frequency."}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.54"}}

Prismatic Alignment.embed: {"title":"Prismatic Alignment","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"4 Prism Features, Master Charm or General Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use a Prism Move"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Flash","value":"Flash also Blinds all targets it hits until the end of their next turn."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Swift","value":"Swift instead has a range of 8, 3 Targets."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Tri Attack","value":"Roll twice for Tri Attack\u2019s Accuracy Roll and take the better result. If you trigger its Effect Range, you may choose the effect instead of rolling for it."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Weather Ball","value":"You use Weather Ball as if you were in the Weather of your choice."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Hyper Beam","value":"Hyper Beam instead has a Range of Burst 2, Smite or 10, Ranged Blast 3, Smite."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Morning Sun","value":"You use Morning Sun as if you were in Sunny Weather, and you may cure yourself of one Status Affliction."}],"description":"The effect of this Feature depends on the Triggering Move. You may only use Prismatic Alignment with each Move once per Scene. ","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.85"}}

Stone Stance.embed: {"title":"Stone Stance","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Stone Warrior"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"\u2022 Falling Boulder Stance","value":"You gain a +5 bonus to all Damage Rolls, but lose 5 HP from Recoil whenever you hit with an attack."},{"name":"\u2022 Moon Mountain Stance","value":"Your initiative is lowered by -5, but you gain 5 Damage Reduction and are immune to Push or Pull effects."},{"name":"\u2022 Roiling Earth Stance","value":"After a successful Intercept action, you may make a Struggle Attack against a foe within range."}],"description":"You adopt one of the stances below, gaining the effects of the stance while this Feature remains bound. You may switch your active Stance as a Standard Action without rebinding your AP. The benefits from this Feature do not apply if you are not standing on a solid surface, such as deep mud or snow, or if you are outright swimming or even flying. ","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.89"}}

Major Gift - Nomad.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Nomad","description":"You gain the Transporter Ability. Note that this automatically grants you the Move Teleport.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Spatial Awareness"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Sign Mastery.embed: {"title":"Sign Mastery","description":"You acquire two Blessings in the form of Signs, marked with the Sign Mastery Rank you are gaining or lower. You must additionally meet any Prerequisites of the Blessing.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 4][PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Signer, GM Permission"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" A Major Gift, GM Permission"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" All your Patron\u2019s Major Gifts, GM Permission"},{"name":"Rank 4 Prerequisites","value":" A Pact Gift, GM Permission"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Note","value":" If your Patron does not have a Pact Gift, you instead require all their Major Gifts to attain Rank 4."}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.46"}}

Major Gift - Courage.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Courage","description":"You gain the Courage Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Spirit of Justice"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.61"}}

Major Gift - Lightning Rod.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Lightning Rod","description":"You gain the Lightning Rod Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Elemental Soul"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.58"}}

Pact Gift - Magma Storm.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Magma Storm","description":"You learn the Move Magma Storm.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Heatran Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.65"}}

Major Gift - Pressure.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Pressure","description":"You gain the Pressure Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Death Sense"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Major Gift - Black Yin.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Black Yin","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"All allies within 5 meters may choose to decrease their movement speeds by 1 and raise their evasion by 2 for the next three rounds."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Hero of Ideals"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.67"}}

Martial Achievement.embed: {"title":"Martial Achievement","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Special]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Martial Artist"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Guts","value":"Wrestlemania"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Inner Focus","value":"Heightened Intensity"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Iron Fist","value":"Pummeling Momentum"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Limber","value":"Bend Like the Willow"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Reckless","value":"Soft Landing"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Technician","value":"Whirlwind Strikes"}],"description":"You gain a Martial Achievement based on your chosen Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.162"}}

Trapper.embed: {"title":"Trapper","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Survivalist, Adept Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2 \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Dust Trap \u2013 Grassland or Desert","value":"A foe that runs into this Hazard is Blinded until the end of their next turn."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Tangle Trap \u2013 Forest or Wetlands","value":"A foe that runs into this Hazard is must immediately stop Shifting, and they are Stuck instead of Slowed until the end of their next turn."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Slick Trap \u2013 Ocean or Tundra","value":"A foe that runs into this Hazard becomes Vulnerable until the end of their next Turn."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Abrasion Trap \u2013 Mountain, Cave, or Urban","value":"A foe that runs into this Hazard lowers their Defense and Special Defense by 1 Combat Stage."}],"description":"You create a consumable item that creates 8 meters of Hazard within 6 meters. All 8 meters must be adjacent with at least one other space of the Hazard. These Hazards cause foes that run into them to become Slowed until the end of their next turn and have an additional effect based on the terrain in which the item was made. When foes run into these Hazards, they are destroyed after their effects resolve. Pok\u00e9mon and Trainers with Naturewalk for the terrains associated with a Hazard are immune to its effects. These items must be used the same day they are created or they lose all effect.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.149"}}

Magical Burst.embed: {"title":"Magical Burst","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Enchanting Transformation, Passionato Harmony"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Condition","value":"You must have Enchanting Transformation Bound to use Magical Burst"}],"description":"Use a Glamour Weaver Move as if it had the range Burst 3, Friendly, Exhaust, Smite. All allies within the area-of-effect gain a Tick of Temporary Hit Points or cure themselves of one Volatile Affliction. Enchanting Transformation immediately becomes Unbound, and the AP used to bind it becomes spent instead of becoming available again.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.71"}}

Martial Training.embed: {"title":"Martial Training","description":"You learn two Martial Artist Moves marked with the Rank of this Feature you are taking or lower.
