Moves marked with an Ability require that Ability to be chosen","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 3][Special]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Martial Artist"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":"Expert Combat"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":"Master Combat"},{"name":"Rank 1 Moves","value":" Acupressure (Limber), Arm Thrust (Technician), Double Kick, Focus Energy, Karate Chop (Inner Focus), Low Sweep, Mach Punch (Iron Fist), Rolling Kick (Reckless), Vital Throw (Guts)"},{"name":"Rank 2 Moves","value":"Brick Break, Circle Throw (Guts), Comet Punch (Iron Fist), Counter (Limber), Low Kick (Inner Focus), Jump Kick (Reckless), Power Trick (Limber), Quick Guard (Technician)"},{"name":"Rank 3 Moves","value":"Cross Chop (Inner Focus), Close Combat, Triple Kick (Technician), High Jump Kick (Reckless), Sky Uppercut (Iron Fist), Storm Throw (Guts)"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.161"}}

Cinematic Analysis.embed: {"title":"Cinematic Analysis","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"4 Chronicler Features, Master Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Character Study \u2013 Profile Archive","value":"You may trigger Character Study when you or an ally makes a Charm, Command, Guile, Intimidate, or Intuition Check targeting the subject of your Record. Make a Perception Check and substitute the triggering Skill Check with the result."},{"name":"Recreation \u2013 Technique Archive","value":"Recreation may be triggered as your Pok\u00e9mon gains Initiative. Select a Record of a Move in your Technique Archive that your Pok\u00e9mon can learn by Level Up, TM, or Move Tutor. Your Pok\u00e9mon may perform that Move as if it was on its Move List. You may select a specific Move only once per day."},{"name":"Situational Awareness \u2013 Travel Archive","value":"You may only use Situational Awareness if you analyze a Record of your current Location. When used this way, you may activate it as an Interrupt. Choose an ally; that ally may take their next action as an Interrupt."}],"description":"You analyze a Record in one of your Archives. Cinematic Analysis\u2019s effect depends on the Archive the Record is in. Each of these effects may only be used once per Scene.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.135"}}

World of Darkness.embed: {"title":"World of Darkness","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Shade Caller, Adept Guile or Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"}],"description":"You create a zone of Shifting Darkness in a Burst 2 around you, which persists until the end of the encounter. All targets without Darkvision attacking from or i nto the Shifting Darkness receive a -3 penalty to Accuracy. You may count Shifting Darkness as complete darkness for the purposes of activating your Living Shadow. As a Static effect, you also gain the Darkvision Capability.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.65"}}

Major Gift - Ashes of the Phoenix.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Ashes of the Phoenix","description":"Target: Adjacent Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Treat the target as if you had used a Revive on it. The target regains 25% of its maximum HP"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Tower\u2019s Rejuvenation"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

Major Gift - Bounty of Life.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Bounty of Life","description":"Target: A Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer.","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"The Target is cured of all Injuries and Status Ailments."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Rejuvenating Aura"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Major Gift - Banish.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Banish","description":"Target: Pok\u00e9mon or Trainers","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Remove a single Target within 8 meters from the encounter for 1d2+1 rounds. The Target experiences no loss of time. They reappear in the same spot that they disappeared from, or in the nearest unoccupied space."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Realm Portal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Major Gift - Turboblaze.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Turboblaze","description":"You gain the Turboblaze Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - White Yang"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.67"}}

Major Gift - Drought.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Drought","description":"You gain the Drought Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Landmaster"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.63"}}

Play Them Like a Fiddle.embed: {"title":"Play Them Like a Fiddle","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Powerful Motivator, a Provocateur Skill at Expert Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x3 \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit with Leer, Confide, Baby-Doll Eyes, or a Provocateur Move"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Baby-Doll Eyes","value":"The target becomes Infatuated with you for the rest of the Scene, and cannot be cured of this condition by any means, including Taking a Breather. This does not bypass immunity to Infatuation."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Confide","value":"You choose a Move the target has used this Scene. That Move becomes Disabled for the target."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Leer","value":"The target\u2019s Defense is lowered an additional Combat Stage, and their Special Defense is lowered by 2 Combat Stages."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Sweet Kiss","value":"While the target is Confused, they may not perform Disengage Maneuvers, and whenever they hit themselves in Confusion, they provoke an Attack of Opportunity from all of their adjacent foes."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Taunt","value":"For 1 full round, the next damaging attack to hit the target of Taunt deals +3d8+10 Damage."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Torment","value":"The target\u2019s Ability is disabled until the end of the encounter. If the target has more than one Ability, you choose one of them to disable."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Lovely Kiss","value":"The target\u2019s Evasion is lowered by 2 for the rest of the Scene."}],"description":"The Move gains additional effects as listed below. You may use the effects of each Move only once per Scene.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.167"}}

Experimental Designs.embed: {"title":"Experimental Designs","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Upgrader Research Field]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Upgrader, Master Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action "},{"name":"Target","value":"You or your Pok\u00e9mon with Augmentations"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Enhanced Sight","value":"The user gains the X-Ray Vision Capability."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Smart Vision","value":"The user learns the Move Feint without taking a Move Slot."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Synthetic Muscle","value":"The user recovers from Injuries twice as fast and heals one more Injury per day."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Embedded Weaponry","value":"The weapon is Fine and gains Deadly Strike as a Master Move."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Wired Reflexes","value":"The user gains one more Reflex Point per Scene and may also spend Reflex Points to gain +2 Critical Hit Range for one full round."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Medical Nanobots","value":"Once a Scene, the user may cure themselves of all Persistent Status Afflictions as a Standard Action."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Dermal Plating","value":"The user may also activate Dermal Plating to resist Special Damage."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Thermal-Optic Camo","value":"While active, the user is invisible to Aura Reading and Thought Detection."}],"description":"Choose an Augmentation the target has and apply the upgrade below. Experimental Designs may affect a target twice. Recipe - Dermal Augments","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.84"}}

Psionic Overload.embed: {"title":"Psionic Overload","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"PK Combat, Expert Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Swift Action "},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit with Psychic or use another Telekinetic Move "},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Kinesis","value":"The user of the triggering attack becomes Confused."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Barrier","value":"Place 2 additional segments of Barrier, and you may place the Barriers anywhere within 6 meters of yourself. They do not need to remain contiguous, nor does one segment have to touch you."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Psychic","value":"The target becomes Vulnerable for one full round."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Telekinesis","value":"At the end of each turn that the target remains Lifted, they lose a Tick of Hit Points."}],"description":"The effect of this Feature depends on the Triggering Move.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.191"}}

Duelist's Manual.embed: {"title":"Duelist's Manual","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Expend Momentum, Effective Methods, Expert Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon under the effects of Focused Training"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb 1 Momentum","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon doubles their bonuses from Tolerance or Exploit until the end of their next turn and may change their Tolerance Ability into Exploit, or vice versa, until the end of their next turn."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb 2 Momentum","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s next Pass, Cone, Close Blast, or Burst attack becomes a single target Melee attack, or their next Line or Ranged Blast attack becomes a single target Ranged attack. If this attack hits, the target becomes Vulnerable for one full round and has their Initiative set to 0 until the end of their next turn."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb 3 Momentum","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may act while ignoring the Confused, Rage, Infatuation, and Suppressed Volatile Status on their next turn as long as they attempt to attack a Tagged foe. May only be used once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon."}],"description":"Apply one of the following effects. To choose an effect, your Pok\u00e9mon must have a certain amount of Momentum. (Duelist\u2019s Manual does not spend Momentum).","footer":{"text":"Core: p.97"}}

Alarm Runes.embed: {"title":"Alarm Runes","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glyph"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 1 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Glyph you have put down, regardless of distance"}],"description":"You give the Glyph a Trigger, which may be as vague or as precise as you like (i.e.: \u201cIf anyone enters the room\u201d, \u201cif James peeks in my diary\u201d, \u201cIf a Torkoal uses Surf while I scream the word \u2018Gelato\u2019\u201d). If the trigger is met within the Rune\u2019s 30 meters, the Rune will become visible, and will begin screeching loudly, alerting anyone nearby. You are capable of hearing this screeching noise in your head, regardless of your current distance. Glyphs will remember their Triggers as long as the AP spent on the Feature is Bound. If you have the Explosive Runes or Sentry Runes Features, you may instruct this Glyph to automatically use the chosen Feature as a Free Action when it is triggered if you have the AP to spend. You may have only one Glyph use Explosive Runes per round, even if multiple Runes are triggered at the same time.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.51"}}

Glitch Burst.embed: {"title":"Glitch Burst","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glitch Shuffle, Master Focus, Occult Education, or Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit with Topsy-Turvy or use another Glitch Bender Move"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Disable","value":"The target of Disable is also Suppressed."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Snatch","value":"Regain one use of a Glitch Bender Move. This may only affect each Move once per Scene."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Metronome","value":"Generate three random Moves instead of one, and choose which Move to use."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Topsy-Turvy","value":"The target of Topsy-Turvy becomes Confused. They are automatically cured The Glitch Pok\u00e9mon of this Confusion at the end of their next turn."}],"description":"Glitch Burst\u2019s effect depends on the triggering Move.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.86"}}

Major Gift - Mirage.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Mirage","description":"Target: Area","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"You create a small Illusion, covering a cubic area two meters on each side. The Illusion can emulate visual and auditory senses only. Seeing through the Illusion is a DC 15 Perception Check, with a +5 bonus to the check if the Illusion is emulating something very familiar to the observer. The Illusion may be sustained for up to ten minutes as a Swift Action each round."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Motherly Compassion"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily\/25 - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

Stat Maneuver.embed: {"title":"Stat Maneuver","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Stat Ace, Adept Command or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Stat Maneuver\u2019s Effect depends on your Chosen Stat","value":","},{"name":"Attack Effect","value":"You may activate this Feature to cause one of your Pok\u00e9mon to use a Physical \u201cMelee, 1-Target\u201d Move as if its range was \u201cMelee, Pass\u201d or \u201cMelee, 3-Targets\u201d instead."},{"name":"Defense Effect","value":"You may activate this feature whenever your Pok\u00e9mon is hit by a Physical Attack to receive the blow as if your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Defense Combat Stages were at +6 instead of their current value."},{"name":"Special Attack Effect","value":"You may activate this Feature to allow your Pok\u00e9mon to use a Special Burst, Cone, Close Blast, Ranged Blast, or Line of any size as a Burst 1, Cone 2, Close Blast 2, or Line 4 instead."},{"name":"Special Defense Effect","value":"You may activate this feature whenever your Pok\u00e9mon is hit by a Special Attack to receive the blow as if your Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Special Defense Combat Stages were at +6 instead of their current value."},{"name":"Speed Effect","value":"You may activate this Feature at any time to cause your Pok\u00e9mon to use a Move as Priority or a Priority Move as Priority (Advanced)."}],"description":",","footer":{"text":"Core: p.112"}}

Reality Bender.embed: {"title":"Reality Bender","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Warper, Expert Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2013 Free Action"}],"description":"You are able to subconsciously alter the fabric of reality to change small facts or circumstances. If your character is confronting a \u201crandom\u201d event such as a die roll, coin flip, or cards being dealt, the character may activate this Feature to influence the event. In this scenario, the GM provides you with two possible outcomes, and you pick one of them to actually occur. This means you always decide the outcome of binary events such as a coin flip; cheating cards or slot machines is much harder, as there are multiple outcomes and you only get to pick between two. This Feature can also be used to generate common items worth $250 or less that the character might normally possess, such as a Potion or Pok\u00e9 Ball, when in a pinch. The character just happens to find the needed item among their belongings. This Feature can only create items you wish to use at that moment, and of which you have none available; such as needing to heal a Pok\u00e9mon but having no Potions left. Items created with Reality Bender must be used quickly after activating the feature and cannot be stored for later.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.195"}}

Surprise!.embed: {"title":"Surprise!","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Hunter, Adept Stealth or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"X AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You make an attack against a foe that does not anticipate an attack or is adjacent to your Pok\u00e9mon with Pack Hunt or Teamwork"}],"description":"Make two attack rolls for the triggering action, and use the better result to finalize the attack. If both attacks would hit, the target is Flinched. Surprise! may be used only once per Scene per target. If the triggering attack was a Pok\u00e9 Ball, Hand Net, Weighted Net, Glue Cannon, or Struggle Attack, Surprise! costs 1 AP to activate; otherwise, it costs 2 AP.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.159"}}

Perfect Aim.embed: {"title":"Perfect Aim","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Precision Orders"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"The next damaging attack the target performs before the end of your next turn automatically hits and ignores Defensive Abilities but deals damage as if it were resisted one step further than normal. You may still roll to trigger any Effect Ranges or Critical Hits. All targets of the attack may not activate any Blessings in response, and the attack may not be Intercepted or avoided in any way (ex: with Dodge, Shield Moves, etc).","footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Captured Momentum.embed: {"title":"Captured Momentum","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Advanced Capture Techniques Rank 2"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You successfully Capture a Pok\u00e9mon"},{"name":"Choose One Effect","value":","}],"description":"\u00bbYou or your Pok\u00e9mon gain a +2 bonus to their next Accuracy Roll during this combat. \u00bbYou subtract your highest Skill Rank out of Acrobatics, Athletics, Stealth, Survival, Guile, or Perception from your next Capture Roll during this combat. \u00bbYou gain 1 Temporary Action Point that disappears after one full round.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.78"}}

Tough Tumble.embed: {"title":"Tough Tumble","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 3d6 in their Tough Stat from Poffins may activate Tough Tumble as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves. X is the Rank of the chosen Move.\nRank 1: Scary Face, Spite\nRank 2: Glare, Bide","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"X AP \u2013 Special"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Style Expert, Tough as Chosen Stat, Novice Intimidate"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":"Expert Intimidate"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.117"}}

Clever Ruse.embed: {"title":"Clever Ruse","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Dark as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon misses all targets with a Dark-Type attack on their turn"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may apply two of the effects below after the triggering attack is resolved. Your Pok\u00e9mon may also take a Standard Action to trigger this Feature. This Feature may be triggered only once per round. \u00bb\u00bb They gain +4 Evasion for one full round. \u00bb\u00bb Their attacks ignore Evasion from Stats until the end of their next turn. \u00bb\u00bb They may immediately Disengage as a Free Action.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.120"}}

Smashing Punishment.embed: {"title":"Smashing Punishment","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Close Quarters Mastery, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"A Marked Foe provokes an Attack of Opportunity from your Fighting-Type Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"The Attack of Opportunity automatically hits, deals Fighting-Type Damage, and is a Critical Hit.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.122"}}

Fashionista.embed: {"title":"Fashionista","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Two of Charm, Command, Guile, Intuition, or Intimidate at Novice"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Special","value":"When you take Fashionista, choose two of Charm, Command, Guile, Intimidate, or Intuition to become your Fashionista Skills. The Skills you choose must be at Novice Rank or higher."}],"description":"You may craft any Fashionista Recipe for which you qualify.  Recipes - Contest Trends, Adorable Fashion(Charm), Elegant Fashion(Intuition), Rad Fashion(Command), Rough Fashion(Intimidate), Slick Fashion(Guile)","footer":{"text":"Core: p.137"}}

Weather Systems.embed: {"title":"Weather Systems","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Climatology Research Field] [Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Climatology, Expert Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pokemon with at least 2 Tutor Point"}],"description":"Your Pokemon loses 2 Tutor Points, and learns your choice of Hail, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Sunny Day. The target must be able to learn the chosen Move through Level-Up, TM, or Tutor Moves. If the target has the chosen Move in their Level-Up List, Weather Systems costs no Tutor Points.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.145"}}

Adaptive Geography.embed: {"title":"Adaptive Geography","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"4 Survivalist Features, Master Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You or your Pok\u00e9mon gains Initiative"}],"description":"The triggering target takes their turn as if they were in a terrain adjacent to the terrain they are in on the following list. For example, if you are standing in Wetlands terrain, you may act as if you are standing in Forest or Ocean Terrain. This affects Survivalist Features, Naturewalk Capabilities, Moves with the Environ Keyword, etc. Grassland - Forest - Wetlands - Ocean - Tundra - Mountain - Cave - Urban - Desert - Grassland","footer":{"text":"Core: p.150"}}

Burst of Speed.embed: {"title":"Burst of Speed","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"5 Tumbler Features, Master Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You end your turn"}],"description":"Select an Initiative Count equal to half of your own Initiative or less; you may take an extra turn at that point in the round.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.173"}}

Two-Second Preview.embed: {"title":"Two-Second Preview","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"3 Oracle Features, Expert Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You gain the Instinct Ability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.186"}}

Utility Drop.embed: {"title":"Utility Drop","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ninja's Arsenal, Expert Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You Shift"}],"description":"You may use a Smoke Ball, Caltrops, or Toxic Caltrops as a Free action during your Shift. Instead of the Move\u2019s usual area of effect, you leave one square of Smokescreen, Spikes, or Toxic Spikes on each square you leave as you Shift. Once you place 8 meters of Smoke, Spikes, or Toxic Spikes you may not place any more.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.184"}}

Fabulous Max.embed: {"title":"Fabulous Max","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Beautiful Ballet Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Beauty-Type Move"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Treat the Move as if it were one step more aligned with the Contest Type. If the Move would be opposing the Contest Type, it is instead neutral. If it is neutral, it is instead matching. You may activate this effect only once per Contest."},{"name":"Battle Effect","value":"The move gains the keyword Burst 1 if Melee, or Blast 2 if ranged. If the move is already a Burst, Blast, or Cone, increase the size of the Move\u2019s Range by 1. This does not cause a target to be hit multiple times. You may activate Fabulous Max only once per Pok\u00e9mon per Scene."}],"description":",","footer":{"text":"Core: p.115"}}

Tough as Schist.embed: {"title":"Tough as Schist","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Gravel Before Me, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Rock-Type Pok\u00e9mon"}],"description":"While this Feature is Bound, allied Stealth Rock Hazards within 4 meters of your Pok\u00e9mon are not used when a foe triggers them unless you want them to be. Whenever the target takes Super-Effective Damage from a Water, Grass, Ground, Fighting, or Steel Type Attack, they may consume an allied Stealth Rock Hazard within 4 meters to create temporary armor that grants them Damage Reduction equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank for one full round.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.127"}}

Arctic Zeal.embed: {"title":"Arctic Zeal","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glacial Ice, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Ice-Type Pok\u00e9mon uses an Ice-Type Move"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses the Move Mist as if it were on their Move List. When used this way, in addition to its normal effects, your Ice-Type Pok\u00e9mon may expend uses of the Mist Blessing to do the following: \u00bb\u00bb As a Swift Action on their turn to cause a foe within 5 meters to take a -5 penalty to Damage Rolls and become Slowed for one full round. \u00bb\u00bb As a Free Action when being hit by a Fighting, Fire, Rock, or Steel-Typed attack dealing Super-Effective Damage to add their Tick Value to their Damage Reduction gained from Glacial Ice. \u00bb\u00bb As a Swift Action on their turn to increase their Defense or Special Defense by 1 Combat Stage.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.125"}}

Spirit Boost.embed: {"title":"Spirit Boost","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Channeler"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Channeled Pok\u00e9mon"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Attack","value":"The target gains Bonus Damage when using Physical attacks equal to your Intuition Rank."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Defense","value":"The target gains Damage Reduction against Physical attacks equal to your Intuition Rank."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Special Attack","value":"The target gains gain Bonus Damage when using Special attacks equal to your Intuition Rank."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Special Defense","value":"The target gains Damage Reduction against Special attacks equal to your Intuition Rank."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Speed","value":"The target gains a bonus to their Initiative equal to your Intuition Rank."}],"description":"When you use Spirit Boost, choose a Channeled Pok\u00e9mon. You may choose the target of Spirit Boost if you wish. While Spirit Boost is Bound, the target has one of the following effects, depending on the highest Combat Stat of the chosen Pok\u00e9mon. (In the event of a tie, you choose which Stat to use)","footer":{"text":"Core: p.179"}}

Sentry Runes.embed: {"title":"Sentry Runes","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Expert Occult Education, Explosive Runes, Hidden Power"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Glyph you have put down, regardless of distance"}],"description":"The target Glyph becomes an Unown of your Trainer Level, its Stats allocated as you wish. This Unown knows a single instance of Hidden Power, identical to your own. The Glyph can fight on its own without needing you to command it. At the end of the encounter, or after 5 minutes, the Unown returns to Unown Space forever, destroying the Glyph. You may only have one Glyph active in this way at a time; if various Alarm Glyphs are triggered to become Sentries at the same time, only one does so; the others will do so once the previous one has been destroyed if the Trigger condition is still being met.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.52"}}

Flip Out.embed: {"title":"Flip Out","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Aerialist, Adept Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Aerial Ace","value":"If you choose not to test for a Critical Hit, Aerial Ace gains the Pass Keyword."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Splash","value":"Once a Scene, you may use Splash as if it had the Interrupt keyword upon getting hit with an attack. If you do, you gain Damage Reduction against that attack equal to twice your Acrobatics Rank."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Acrobatics","value":"You may activate Acrobatics\u2019s extra damage even while holding an Item."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Bounce","value":"When you use Bounce, you don\u2019t trigger Hazards that turn and may choose to destroy all Hazards in your landing square and adjacent squares."}],"description":"Your Tumbler Moves gain additional effects.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.173"}}

Sword of Body and Soul.embed: {"title":"Sword of Body and Soul","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Aura Guardian, Adept Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use a damaging Aura Guardian Move against an adjacent foe"}],"description":"You may have the triggering Move deal damage as if it was your choice of Physical or Special Classes. Regardless, add both your Attack and Special Attack Stats to the Damage Roll, and this attack ignores Damage Reduction. This does not stack with Twisted Power.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.177"}}

Natural Fighter.embed: {"title":"Natural Fighter","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Survivalist"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Special"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Grassland","value":"Cotton Spore"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Forest","value":"Grass Whistle"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Wetlands","value":"Mud Slap"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Ocean","value":"Aqua Ring"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Tundra","value":"Haze"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Mountain","value":"Smack Down"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Cave","value":"Astonish"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Urban","value":"Fling"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Desert","value":"Sand Attack"},{"name":"May Playtest Errata","value":"Urban terrains allow you and your Pok\u00e9mon to use the Move Spikes instead of Fling."}],"description":"You and your Pok\u00e9mon become adept at using the environment to your advantage in battle. You or your Pok\u00e9mon may activate Natural Fighter as a Standard Action to use the Move below corresponding to the current terrain. You and your Pok\u00e9mon must still follow all Frequency limitations for the Move.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.149"}}

Fairy Lights.embed: {"title":"Fairy Lights","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace, Fairy as Chosen Type"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Special"},{"name":"Special","value":"Fairy Lights also provide mild lighting, comparable to a candle. As an extended action your Pokemon can control the lights individually, but they must stay within 6 meters of the Pokemon that created them."}],"description":"Your Fairy-Type Pokemon may activate Fairy Lights as a Standard Action to create 3 Fairy Lights that hover around themselves. Whenever the target is attacked by a foe within 6 meters, they may expend a Fairy Light to either immediately gain a Tick of Temporary Hit Points, or to use the Move Fairy Wind as a Free Action. ","footer":{"text":"Core: p.122"}}

Frozen Domain.embed: {"title":"Frozen Domain","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Frost Touched, Expert Athletics or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Standard Action "}],"description":"Set 6 square meters of Frozen Domain within range 6. All 6 meters must be adjacent with at least one other space of Frozen Domain. All legal targets passing through these squares must make an Acrobatics check with a DC equal to 4 + twice your Survival Rank. On failure, the target is Tripped. Pok\u00e9mon who are flying, levitating, or have the Naturewalk (Tundra) Capability are immune to this effect. When standing on a square affected by Frozen Domain, you may act as if you were in Hail weather. When a Fire-Type attack originates from or targets a square of Frozen Domain, that square of Frozen Domain melts and is cleared. Frozen Domain is considered a Hazard.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.83"}}

Miasma Unleashed.embed: {"title":"Miasma Unleashed","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Miasma\u2019s Call, Master Stealth or Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"You learn the moves Sludge Wave and Toxic.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.87"}}

Miasmic Spray.embed: {"title":"Miasmic Spray","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Miasma\u2019s Call, Master Stealth or Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit with Acid, Clear Smog, Sludge Bomb, Sludge Wave, or Toxic; or use Acid Armor:  "},{"name":"Acid","value":"Instead of its usual effect, Acid lowers the Special Defense of all targets hit by -2 Combat Stages."},{"name":"Clear Smog","value":"Clear Smog\u2019s target loses 5 HP for each combat stage lost."},{"name":"Sludge Bomb","value":"The Target receives a -3 penalty to Accuracy Rolls until the end of your next turn."},{"name":"Sludge Wave","value":"All targets in Sludge Wave's Burst are Slowed until the end of their next turn."},{"name":"Toxic","value":"The target's Badly Poison Hit Point Loss begins at 10 instead of 5."},{"name":"Acid Armor","value":"You are not slowed while liquefied and resist all special damage one step."}],"description":"The Effect of this feature depends on the triggering move.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.87"}}

Living Shadow.embed: {"title":"Living Shadow","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Shade Caller"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Your own Shadow can attack others; you may have your Dark Type Moves originate from any Square adjacent to you. If you are fighting among complete darkness, you may have your Dark Type Moves originate from any square within X meters that is completely dark, where X is the higher of your Guile or Stealth Rank. Attacks originating from Living Shadow do not trigger effects that rely on being hit with a melee attack.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.65"}}

Case Specialist.embed: {"title":"Case Specialist","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Jailbreaker Research Field]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Jailbreaker, Adept Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit a target with a Pok\u00e9 Ball with a Spray, Flash, Bounce, or Zap Case applied to it."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Spray Case","value":"After resolving the effects of the Case, the target loses a Tick of Health Points for each Persistent or Volatile Status Affliction they have. This may only affect a target once per Scene."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Flash Case","value":"The Case uses the Move Flash as a Burst 2 instead of a Cone 2"},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Bounce Case","value":"The Pok\u00e9 Ball bounces an additional time. This may not cause it to hit a target more than once."},{"name":"\u00bb\u00bb Zap Case","value":"The target can only use At-Will actions until the end of their next turn. This may only affect a target once per Scene."}],"description":"The Case has additional effects according to its type(s). Recipe - Trick Cases","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.82"}}

Giftsapper.embed: {"title":"Giftsapper","description":"As long as Giftsapper\u2019s user is conscious, all Trainers within 10 meters must make a Focus Check with DC equal to three times the highest Skill Rank of Giftsaper's user between Focus, Intimidate, or Command in order to activate their Gifts. This Check is made each time a Trainer attempts to use an activated Gift, and a failure means neither any resources such as AP nor the frequency of the Gift is expended. For Gifts with Static or ongoing effects, the Check is made each turn, and a failure ends the effect for that turn. Giftsapper\u2019s user may never gain Gifts.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Any Stat]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"GM Permission, No Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Target","value":"Self"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.54"}}
